item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Secret of the Mimic plunges people into the structure of Murray Costume Manor, an abandoned workshop containing unresolved questions. The characters must explore its depths to uncover the secret left behind by Edwin Murray, the solitary creator of this place. This location offers a space where any dark area can hide information or a secret passage, directly affecting the gameplay and understanding of past events.

item.title: Mr. Meat
item.description: Game Description Mr. Meat represents a story that begins after the long period of isolation ends with a find in the refrigerator. A speaking piece of meat appears there, which voices his only desire to the main character. For food, he needs human flesh, which puts the only inhabitant of the house in a difficult position, because he is locked in four walls. The character will have to decide what to do with the demand of the creature: to obey and feed him, or to go against his will.

item.title: MindsEye
item.description: Game Description MindsEye is a world where the boundaries between reality and illusion are blurred. You step into the role of Jacob Diaz, a man with a dark past that is slowly slipping away from his grasp. With a neural implant that should help him recall memories but instead leads to even more confusion, Jacob must navigate a landscape fraught with danger. The American landscape of the near future is riddled with stories of corporate deceit, political intrigue, and the ever-present shadow of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Master Crafted Edition
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine - Master Crafted Edition puts the player in the center of large -scale conflict, where battles and constant pressure do not leave time for respite. Captain Titus from the Order of Ultramarinov heads a detachment of hardened fighters sent to restrain the invasion of the orcs on an industrial planet. These worlds produce equipment and weapons for the endless war of mankind, and the loss of one of them can lead to catastrophic consequences.

item.title: Hopeless Sea
item.description: Game Description Hopeless Sea imagines a world submerged after climate catastrophe melts the polar ice caps. A sea level rise of more than 50 meters has rendered 90 of the planet’s coastal cities uninhabitable, forcing survivors to move inland to escape powerful storms. Soon, a new threat emerged from the ocean depths - mutated aggressive sea creatures that began to attack the last strongholds of people. To save civilization, a final mission is sent to the sea to find the source of the creatures and eliminate the root cause of the disaster.

item.title: Bank Simulator
item.description: Game Description Bank Simulator is a simulator dedicated to creating from scratch and then managing a banking organization. The player takes on the primary role in managing all operational aspects, starting with the initial construction of the facility. Key responsibilities include selecting and supervising personnel to perform required functions. This management extends to maintaining customer accounts and making strategic decisions that influence the bank’s development trajectory. The goal is to guide the company through the various stages of its growth.

item.title: Unlighted
item.description: Game Description Unlighted is a journey into a dystopian world teetering on the edge between oblivion and memory, where a great secret hidden from humanity awaits to be revealed. At the heart of this world is the phenomenon of Umbralite - rare stones with previously unseen properties. These mysterious materials are invisible to the naked eye and only take on physical form when bathed in a stream of light. It was the study of the origin of these anomalies that became the main task of the Umbral Alchemy Corporation.

item.title: Parallel Experiment
item.description: Game Description Parallel Experiment is an intense and addictive co-op adventure that will test your detective skills. You and your partner will have to carefully communicate and solve a series of intricate puzzles posed by the insidious Cryptic Killer. Can you buy time, outwit your captor and escape the laboratory before time runs out? As two seasoned detectives, you’ll have to work together to crack codes, decipher numbers, and unravel the mystery of the Cryptic Killer.

item.title: Pro Cycling Manager 25
item.description: Game Description Pro Cycling Manager 25 puts players in the role of team managers guiding the riders. The range of tasks includes selecting partners, recruiting cyclists and leading races on the tracks. The performance of these functions during the competitive season affects the final performance of the team. This project provides a framework for leading a professional cycling club with sporting goals. In Pro Cycling Manager 25, attracting funding involves taking into account the criteria put forward by the funding parties.

item.title: DecayZ Origin
item.description: Game Description Decayz Origin is the story of a desperate struggle for life in a world that was destroyed by a viral disaster. In the center of the story is a man whose only goal is to save his loved one from a deadly infection, which makes him go to the very heart of the epidemic. The journey of the protagonist runs through the ruins of civilization, where terrifying mutations and traces of the former tragedy await at every step.

item.title: Popucom
item.description: Game Description Popucom opens a joint journey for researchers on an unknown planet. Adventurers reach this celestial body to study its territory with his comrades. The process of passage is built on a change of flowers, the use of shells in the type of three in a row and relics of artifacts for overcoming difficulties, maintaining the movement forward and assistance in the revival of the world. This sortie contains various circumstances and a lot of aspects for detecting involved players.

item.title: Paranormal Cleanup
item.description: Game Description Paranormal Cleanup is a cooperative horror with a first -person view. You can play it together, three or four via the Internet. There is also a single mode. The characters are controlled through the mouse and the keyboard. In addition, there is support for gamepads, but only partial. This project is distinguished by its concept, gameplay and atmosphere from other indie chorrorists. The players are assigned to the roles of employees of the cleaning company.

item.title: Missing Banban
item.description: Game Description Missing Banban begins with the fact that the sheriff of Toadster, the main character, is faced with the mysterious disappearance of his friend. At the same time, in his world, experiencing shock, dark power begins to act. The players are assigned the role of this sheriff-jibs, the only one who is able to withstand the threat and understand what is happening over the course of many stages. The central task is the search for a missing comrade - a mission pushing the protagonist to adventures.

item.title: Near-Mage
item.description: Game Description The magic universe in Near-Mage shows the adventures of the young girl Illy Vraj, who was invited to live in Transylvania for the summer. The girl will meet with her cousin Dominica, who wants to tell her about the secret witch’s kind. The heroine will receive the opportunity to enter the Transylvanian Institute of Magic, where he will master the art of witchcraft. The girl will go to the preparatory summer school to become a full -fledged caster.

item.title: Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo
item.description: Game Description Pipistrello and the Cursed Yoyo is a 2D top-down action adventure focused on urban exploration. Gamers navigate vast environments, mastering yo-yo maneuvers for movement and direct confrontation. The task is to counter rival criminal leaders and their henchmen in different areas of the metropolis in order to regain the influence of the Pipistrello family. This project combines combat, movement and puzzles, all presented in a plot that reveals corporate intrigue.

item.title: Alien Market Simulator
item.description: Game Description Alien Market Simulator begins with the player tasked with running a market on a space station in a remote location, as a direct result of a connection with the Intergalactic Police. Restoring freedom depends on the success of the enterprise, requiring daily reports to authorities through the complex’s system. The main task is to develop the facility, which requires modernization, into a point with a large volume of trading operations for alien buyers.

item.title: TDS - Tower Defense Strategy
item.description: Game Description TDS - Tower Defense Strategy appears as a unique hybrid. This adventure game defies easy classification, combining elements of tower defense and real-time strategy. Let’s understand the basic mechanics of this intriguing game. It is based on the concept of vessels. These multi-faceted creatures serve as both units and towers. As a gamer, you control them by obtaining resources, participating in battles and building defensive structures. The world in TDS - Tower Defense Strategy is teeming with danger, and your Pool - the last bastion - must withstand the relentless Tides.

item.title: Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon
item.description: Game Description The player in Tainted Grail: The Fall of Avalon will have to unravel the secrets of the guards of menhirs, threatening the main character of the main character. The role -playing adventure will occur in an open world based on rethought classical legends about King Arthur. The user will be able to design his own deck of various cards with unique features and use. The plot begins with the death of Avalon.

item.title: Tinkerlands
item.description: Game Description Tinkerlands offers game experience where the characters find themselves in unknown islands. Survival becomes the main task that encourages the study of these new territories, the creation of the necessary tools and contacts with various inhabitants of these lands. Gamers gradually build personal shelters that can develop into large settlements. Interaction with the environment also opens access to magic, giving additional ways to overcome difficulties. The Tinkerlands universe consists of the main continent, three other large islands and many small islands, each of them provides unique conditions, resources and tests.

item.title: Deliver At All Costs
item.description: Game Description Deliver At All Costs is a courier simulator that allows you to experience the real madness and bustle of this profession. Trying to deliver a package, you will end up in constant traffic jams, ridiculous situations, etc. You need to move around the city in your used pickup truck. However, it has one feature: the ability to accelerate using nitro. Deliver At All Costs is a project that places a huge emphasis on humor and madness.

item.title: Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping
item.description: Game Description Duck Detective: The Ghost of Glamping introduces Eugene McCryaklin, a duck detective who is currently experiencing depression, the consequences of a recent divorce and documented traction to bread, noticeably complicating its everyday life. His mission is to understand the situation in the camping territory, a place with the alleged paranormal activity, where there was no murder. In the process of completing this task, McRryakclina will have to study important subjects, find connections between facts and deal with episodes of her own past.

item.title: Loss
item.description: Game Description Loss represents a narrative concentrated on a teenager who is faced with family tragedies. He wakes up one night and discovers the disappearance of his family members from their house, which encourages him to begin the trial. The gameplay includes the movement of housing, collecting objects and keys to open new areas, as well as a solution to riddles to understand what is happening. The study of the situation becomes important for restoring the chain of events that led to its isolation.

item.title: Mindkatt: first stud
item.description: Game Description mindkatt: first strike represents a setting in which cats with developed intelligence use mechanical structures to interact in human society. This project puts players in a futuristic environment, where despotistical orders reign. These cats, having passed serious mental evolution, are in contact with the world through robotic devices. Their life in this difficult era, subject to people, forms the core of history. In the general world, Mindkatt: First Strike, human groups are kept under the control of Mindkatt - a developed type of cats facing slavery.

item.title: Out of Sight
item.description: Game Description Out of Sight is a project where a young girl, deprived of direct vision, should find a way through the building, temporarily receiving the ability to see through her toy. She turned out to be locked inside and tries to get out at any cost. Those who keep her here are actively looking for her and seek to stop her, creating a constant direct threat of her freedom and life.

item.title: Survive the Fall
item.description: Game Description The disaster in Survive The Fall occurred in 2023, when a huge asteroid crashed into the ground. Most of the population died, and those who were in distant places in the world survived. The player moves to the post -apocalyptic environment, where it is necessary to engage in the construction of settlements, using tactical and strategic elements. An extensive and open world includes many good lands, forests or destroyed cities.

item.title: Windward Horizon
item.description: Game Description Windward Horizon immerses you in a vast open world with a focus on exploration and naval combat. As a captain, not tied to any faction, the player begins a journey through a unique map, randomly generated in each new playthrough. The project offers freedom of choice: you can trade, complete quests, look for treasures, or simply enjoy the atmosphere of a relaxing sea voyage. Windward Horizon can be played either solo or in co-op.

item.title: Pieces of me
item.description: Game Description Pieces of me begins with Grisha’s return to his hometown in 2009. He is going to visit his younger sister, but does not find her or any signs of his usual life on the spot. The streets look familiar, but there is no movement in them. There is silence all around and rare traces, as if someone left them on purpose, trying to convey something. The school building, in which the most difficult and memorable years passed, is greeted with the absence of sounds and a strange feeling, as if something was left unfinished here.

item.title: Regulators
item.description: Game Description Regulators sets before a detachment of mercenaries the task of stripping the city from mutating villains with weapons, gadgets and special abilities. The team penetrates into buildings from streets, roofs or sewers to fulfill the goals leading to the scientist, commander of the antagonists. The situation began after the fall of an asteroid that released the alien substance of the UZ. It was soon found that this material has narcotic potential and causes mutations in all its exposure, including the detachment fighters themselves.

item.title: Tales of Seikyu
item.description: Game Description Tales of Seikyu places players on an island retreat far from human lands and filled with magic. Yokai live here and can take on human form. In their homeland, gamers develop the land, contribute to the development of the city, and discover information about the island, as well as a long-lost family. The character uses transformation abilities to help manage the farm and explore the world around him.

item.title: Kathy Rain 2: Soothsayer
item.description: Game Description Kathy Rain 2: Soothsayer is set in 1998, taking place in the urban environment of Cassidy, where disturbing events occur. The player takes on the role of private detective Katie Raine, who is faced with serious personal problems that require financial resources. Her vehicle is in need of fuel, her food supply is nearly exhausted, and she is facing eviction. At this moment, information appears about a large monetary reward for solving a series of murders that shocked the city’s residents.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition puts the player in the role of Major Degtyarev, an intelligence officer sent to the cover under the cover. Its task is to find out the causes of the failure of the military operation and the disappearance of the detachment. Events unfold in the Pripyat region, where everything is permeated with dangers: anomalies, radiation, hostile groups and an unstable situation. In Stalker: Call of Prypiat - Enhanced Edition, each action has consequences.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Clear Sky - Enhanced Edition transfers a gamer to the role of a mercenary named Scar, forced to survive among warring groups, unstable abnormalities and deadly emissions. The action takes place to the events of the previous title of the series, demonstrating the origins of the territorial split in the zone. The basis of the mechanics is the system of wars of fractions - with its help, the user is able to change the alignment of forces between armed formations.

item.title: S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition
item.description: Game Description S.T.A.L.K.E.R.: Shadow of Chornobyl - Enhanced Edition transferred gamers to the alienation zone around the Chernobyl nuclear power plant, where anomalies, armed groups and mutants act outside the law framework. Movement in this territory depends on food supplies, the level of radiation, the number of cartridges and relations with other characters. Plot tasks can be performed in different ways using research, shootings and dialogs. The environment is a constant danger, which requires attention to details, and not following the finished routes.

item.title: The Last Visit: 98th
item.description: Game Description The Last Visit: 98th is a first-person psychological horror game set in a post-Soviet winter setting. The gameplay immerses you in adventure and exploration, increasing the sense of fear through the developing story. This path passes through familiar places, involving you in the gloomy reality of the late 1990s. The project imagines a world where tension is formed from personal memories and environmental details. In 1998, the central character returns to the places of his childhood.

item.title: The Siege and the Sandfox
item.description: Game Description The Siege and the Sandfox - this is exciting fantasy steam -metrousing, in which you will find a dangerous adventure in the besieged kingdom. You will become a legendary sandy fox, master of parkour and secrecy, and go in search of evil hiding in the sands. It is necessary to explore the palace and ancient dungeons, using all your skills to find out where the source is located. Run, jump, slide, balance and swing to go through a complex world filled with useful objects, new equipment and skills.

item.title: Galaxy HighWays
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Highways puts a player at the head of a star pilot after the discovery of alien gate to mankind led to the destruction of the Earth. The surviving representatives of civilization founded the colony of the last hope - a settlement, which is constantly threatened by the same alien force, striving to detect it. As a pilot of the special forces, the main function is to protect the colony by completing tasks, including attacks on enemy attitudes, the defense of friendly caravans and the seizure of aliens for research.

item.title: Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo
item.description: Game Description Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo puts the gamer in the role of Kulebra, an entity that helps the inhabitants of Limbo. Walking without legs, Culebra explores this dimension to collect clues, special items and evidence. The collected elements play an important role for the inhabitants of Limbo to find peace and move beyond their current situation. The process involves interacting with characters and exploring locations to understand their difficulties.

item.title: MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR
item.description: Game Description MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR gives gamers the opportunity to manage the creation and development of a shopping complex. This project offers tools for the construction and expansion of commercial properties. Every operational decision made impacts revenue generation, site footfall and customer satisfaction. Inside the MALL MANAGER SIMULATOR, players manage individual retail premises, oversee advertising campaigns, improve the presentation of the property and maintain cleanliness to stand out from competitors. This supervision involves determining the cost of goods, observing how customers respond to those prices, and making necessary adjustments.

item.title: Manifest Destiny
item.description: Game Description Manifest Destiny is a meta-pixel adventure in which the protagonist, as the creator of the virtual world, gains almost unlimited power over it. Instead of the usual weapons for battles and solving puzzles, he uses fundamental development tools. The process of overcoming obstacles is tied to creativity and imagination, allowing you to change the very logic of the environment. The opponents here are not just enemies, but elements of code that can be reprogrammed.

item.title: Cubic Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Cubic Odyssey is a large -scale project with an open setting that combines the elements of research, survival and creativity. Users move according to procedured planets, interact with a variety of ecosystems and fight with the upcoming force known as red darkness. In the universe there are planets with a changing environment, ancient ruins and settlements inhabited by NPC fraction. Each place is complex tasks and opportunities that require strategic resource management and adaptation.

item.title: Once Upon a Mind - A Little Too Friendly
item.description: Game Description Once Upon a Mind - A Little Too Friendly tells about the 23 -year -old Emily who moved to Brooklyn in search of a calm life. A cozy apartment, work in a small cafe nearby and a friendly hostess create a feeling of stability. Everything seems simple and understandable, until anxious changes appear in the usual routine. Details are gradually opening in small things that are difficult not to pay attention to.

item.title: Labyrinth Of The Demon King
item.description: Game Description Labyrinth Of The Demon King places the gamer in a first-person perspective in a monster-infested environment inspired by feudal Japan. You will take on the role of Ashigaru, a foot soldier whose master was deceived and killed by a powerful demonic entity. The main objective involves navigating a complex maze, encountering hostile creatures, and finding the specific demon responsible for the master’s death in order to take revenge.

item.title: Ketz: Galactic Overlords
item.description: Game Description KETZ: Galactic Overlords is a game in a science fiction setting, where gamers participate in the Rowli-hord survival with RPG elements. Each gamer chooses a character and collects items to create unique assemblies using the possibilities received from galactic leaders. These gamers overcome tireless clashes, trying to survive and understand why these powerful figures provide assistance. In Ketz: Galactic Overlords, users improve their combat capabilities through specialized systems. Progresses implies an improvement in the resulting equipment.

item.title: Dino Path Trail
item.description: Game Description Dino Path Trail shows the world where dinosaurs survived to the era, similar to the wild West, setting a person to survive in this altered land. The main goal includes the search and salvation of a stolen sister through the intersection of various lands full of dangers. The chances of surviving are strongly dependent on the solutions and actions of the player as part of the structure of this action-rowlaine, where it is necessary to repulse predators, hostile people and elements.

item.title: Revenge of the Savage Planet
item.description: Game Description Revenge of the Savage Planet throws the player into alien locations. The character turns out to be thrown on the edge of the space by the former corporate employer. The central task is to move around alien territories, collecting resources and finding improvements to organize home and revenge the corporation, guilty of its position. The study of the area includes the detection of hidden objects and the interaction with the environment.

item.title: Midnight Special
item.description: Game Description Midnight Special is a survival horror with point-and-click elements that invites users into a world where every corner hides a secret. Set in the late 1980s on the isolated Boyd estate, gamers take on the role of Sarah, a nanny whose night shift quickly turns into a nightmarish ordeal. What starts as a simple evening of babysitting two children turns into a creepy game of survival when strange events unfold in the house.

item.title: Spirit of the North 2
item.description: Game Description Spirit of the North 2 allows the gamer to manage a fox as part of a third -person adventure. The scene is the ancient world full of ruins, where the red -haired heroine is in isolation, far from the native edges. Accompanied by a wise companion-warrior, the protagonist goes in search of missing guards. The main task is to free these creatures from the influence of a shaman named Grimnir, as well as in the return of the fox home.

item.title: The Midnight Walk
item.description: Game Description The Midnight Walk invites on a shadow journey around the world where fire and darkness are found. Title is an adventure based on dark fantasy and manual work. In the role of Pogorelets, gamers unite with Potbo, a Fund-Fund with an inexhaustible flame in order to navigate in a world full of dangers. Along the way, users should outwit terrible monsters who seek to extinguish the light, adding a tense layer to an already terrible environment.

item.title: Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch
item.description: Game Description Vambrace: Dungeon Monarch weaves together multiple genres to create a tapestry of strategy and decision-making that keeps players on their toes. It is based on the role of the monarch - a figure chosen by higher powers to protect the dungeon from invasion. The Dungeon is not just a place, it is a realm of wealth and power, coveted by those who think they can lay claim to its treasures.

item.title: Trench Tales
item.description: Game Description Trench Tales is a game project that introduces gamers to a dark alternative reality, the events of which take place between the First and Second World Wars. You take control of a lone fighter, transported to the strange dimension of Verdun by the actions of unknown forces. The story is told in third person, focusing on the action in this dysfunctional environment with elements of horror and dark fantasy.

item.title: Codename: Ocean Keeper
item.description: Game Description Codename: Ocean Keeper - this survival role-playing adventure game plunges users into the mysterious depths of an underwater planet, where space pirates explore the secrets hidden under the waves. The mechanics take inspiration from games like Dome Keeper and Vampire Survivors, while the atmospheric elements echo StarCraft, Stormgate and Project Entropy. In Codename: Ocean Keeper, gamers control a crab-like robot tasked with exploration, mining, and combat. The game takes place in three separate cycles.

item.title: Sipssassin
item.description: Game Description Sipssassin offers a gamer to devastate glasses of unsuspecting personalities, using secrecy tactics, special gadgets and near -battle weapons. A long -standing confrontation unfolds between the Sipssassins and the villains of the villains, because the latter strive for world domination through control of drinks. Your task is to methodically drain every affordable container for detecting secret opponents and disrupting their operations. This project provides 5 unique missions for execution in an arbitrary sequence, offering a nonlinear advancement in the plot.

item.title: Vellum
item.description: Game Description Vellum throws gamers into a world filled with strategic combat and decision-making. Go it alone or team up with others to overcome challenges and gain control of your journey. The main highlight of Vellum is the innovative mechanics of influencing the enemy’s development. This gives the strategy an extra layer that goes beyond simply winning the next fight. The heart beats with collaboration. Team up with friends to overcome obstacles together.

item.title: Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World
item.description: Game Description Stickman Strikes: Conquer Fantasy World immerses gamer into a fantasy environment after turning into a steakman with a dragon flame. This universe accepts unusual inhabitants, allowing the style of the stickman to fit into local life. The player will have to achieve goals like capturing castles, the acquisition of land or command of a detachment in this world. The activity is not limited to battles and covers the study of the dungeons, the search for values, trade, farming and the creation of things.

item.title: gogh: Focus with Your Avatar
item.description: Game Description Gogh: Focus with Your Avatar combines focus tools and simulation gameplay mechanics, allowing you to create a character and design a location. Gamers interact with a virtual hero and a companion creature in a variable room. This project includes time management tools in addition to customization capabilities. The main task is to help with work sessions through a combination of these elements of the simulation game. In gogh: Focus with Your Avatar, a person arranges his own room by arranging furniture, choosing decor and choosing a palette.

item.title: Approaching Infinity
item.description: Game Description Approaching Infinity offers a fast-paced, never-ending adventure through space. The title is built on the basis of a huge procedurally generated universe, which gives users the freedom to create their own path. Gamers can do a variety of things: conduct tactical battles, mine asteroids, trade goods, create items and explore mysterious alien worlds. At its core, Approaching Infinity allows for endless development, each time offering a new challenge.

item.title: Path of Kung Fu
item.description: Game Description Path of Kung Fu throws you headlong into the world, filled with intrigues of martial arts. You start like no one, a nameless face in a huge crowd of supper Kung fu. But this is not some pre -destined path - you yourself determine your fate. Forget about hard classes and linear plot lines. Path of Kung Fu allows you to go to the sandbox overflowing with capabilities. Hundreds of martial arts techniques are waiting for them to master.

item.title: Badlands Crew
item.description: Game Description Badlands Crew transfers to the gamer control over a combat vehicle in the world of lawlessness that arose after a global catastrophe. Key tasks include the construction of transport, its modification and use against hostile groups for the search and salvation of the survivors. You collect your mobile fortress from individual components, selecting elements such as flamethrowers, sniper turrets, rate of fire machine guns, observation tower and medical points.

item.title: Necrophosis
item.description: Game Description Necrophosis is not a typical horror with jumping. This first -person puzzle throws you headlong into a nightmare, blurring the boundaries between reality and the world created on the basis of our gloomy fears. The alarming atmosphere hangs with a heavy load, being a permanent companion when you move through landscapes, smelling of decay. Do not expect the story to be given from the spoon. Here, the narrative unfolds like mysterious poetry, and each puzzle - as a verse, whispering secrets.

item.title: Survivalist: Invisible Strain
item.description: Game Description Survivalist: Invisible Strain - continuation of the game Survivalist. Events take place near Vancouver in Canada. The zombivirus epidemic has been going on for 10 years. People managed to erect settlements, well -guarded from revived dead. However, the defense of the shelters fell for unknown reasons. The survivors go to the hill, hoping to build new outposts. In the game, the survivor: an invisible strain can create your own community.

item.title: Amerzone - The Explorer's Legacy
item.description: Game Description Amerzone - The Explorer’s Legacy takes you on a journey to the Great White Birds, who live in a secluded land full of many secrets. The player takes on the role of a young journalist fulfilling the last wishes of a deceased researcher and embarking on a mission across the globe. The destination is the forgotten Latin American country of Amerzon, a place where outsiders rarely set foot.

item.title: Clair Obscur: Expedition 33
item.description: Game Description Clair Obscur: Expedition 33 throws you headlong into a world where fashionable French hats meet fire-breathing monsters. This turn-based RPG with real-time mechanics turns combat into a frantic dance between strategic thinking and burning reflexes. You lead Expedition 33, a group set out not on a treasure hunt, but on a life-or-death mission. What is your goal? An artist whose artistic talents are too… lethal. Every brushstroke brings destruction, and you must stop her creativity forever.

item.title: Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero
item.description: Game Description Phantom Brave: The Lost Hero introduces Marona, a young girl with the ability to communicate with the spirits of the departed. She travels through the oceanic game world of Ivoire with the ghost Ash, assisting residents along the way. Their travels are interrupted by an attack by a fleet of ghost ships, leading to Marona’s separation from Ash. This event kicks off her campaign against the sea aggressors.

item.title: Dinkum
item.description: Game Description Dinkum is a life and farming simulator made on the Unity engine. It has a change of seasons and temperatures. The player ends up on the island of Choc-A-Bloc. In the story, the character he created gets tired of his old city and moves to live in the Australian wild. At first, only the camp is available to the protagonist. Gradually he turns it into a small village. And then, with his participation, the settlement grows into a small town.

item.title: Oppidum
item.description: Game Description Oppidum takes the player to the island of Insul, where they will have to master the mechanics of survival alone or in a team of up to four people. The characters find themselves in a land of widespread decline due to a deep-rooted corruption that has fractured the local society. Key gameplay elements include setting up a central camp, systematically gathering supplies scattered throughout Insul, and navigating its varied zones.

item.title: CyberCorp
item.description: Game Description CyberCorp is a top-down shooter made in a cyberpunk setting. The gameplay is aimed at dynamic shooting and looting. As the main character, you will have to fight for the future of humanity. Both single player campaign and co-op play are available. Events take place in the 25th century. CyberCorp Corporation has learned to create robotic human bodies by transferring the consciousness of living people into them. The first subjects were the military.

item.title: Darkwater
item.description: Game Description Darkwater gives gamers to command a submarine, which ended up in an ice trap on a foreign planet. This is a cooperative horror, designed to work from 1 to 4 people. Survival implies navigation in a hostile environment, clashes with enemy courts and underwater life forms, as well as an active search for resources necessary for further work of submarine. Success depends on the implementation of the necessary actions for existence in underland conditions.

item.title: True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3
item.description: Game Description True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3 is the final installment in the psychological thriller series. This final chapter, True Fear: Forsaken Souls Part 3, uses point-and-click interaction methods for player input. Moreover, it includes puzzles that require solutions to advance the player through the stages. The game also features cinematic cutscenes at various points throughout the game. Players navigate the world, advancing the narrative towards its planned conclusion. The storyline focuses on resolving remaining issues and bringing the trilogy to its intended end point.

item.title: Tower Unite
item.description: Game Description Tower Unite is a very unusual MMO. Here, users walk and get acquainted on a large central hub called Plaza and Island. In fact, this is such a large amusement park. At the same time, one can play here alone. The project was first made on the basis of Garry’s Mod. Over time, it turned into a full -fledged separate product. The game allows gamers to create their own creativity inside it and share with others.

item.title: BodyRecords
item.description: Game Description BodyRecords presents gameplay primarily through a body camera view. Microphones directly impact the digital environment; Sounds made by players, including speech, may attract the attention of entities. Participants move through specific locations in search of specific data. This information is necessary to determine and provide an exit route. Successful progression relies heavily on group coordination, especially when solving integrated puzzles encountered during exploration. This element of cooperation is a necessity for players seeking to overcome the challenges presented together.

item.title: Echoes of yi: samsara
item.description: Game Description Echoes of yi: samsara - an action that includes elements of Chinese culture. Gamers will take on the role of a student of the master of the sword. He was instructed to confront enemies and investigate the circumstances associated with the Jiangu tree. The narrative puts a situation where the player must decide whether to face the opening truth or go in a different way. This adventure includes a study of the world of spirits in an attempt to prevent global cataclysms.

item.title: Mirage: ignis fatuus
item.description: Game Description In Mirage: Ignis Fatuus, the city of illusions is on the verge of destruction due to mana exhausting in the world. Players take control of the cubic character of Kyubead in order to save his native lands, deciding a series of isometric puzzles. The main task is to go through 50 levels dissimilar to each other, scattered through 5 unique worlds. Each location has its own features that affect the trials that the hero has to face.

item.title: It
item.description: Game Description IT’s on the Mouse combines a cafe management with a 3D platformer, providing players with control over the main characters of Holly. Being a tiny maid, she is forced to use a special navigation method in the working environment due to her growth. The gamer has to jump and run around the tables and racks to get to customers and submit orders to them. This movement system is central mechanics for receiving applications and delivery of the desired dishes.

item.title: Bionic Bay
item.description: Game Description Bionic Bay is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. The plot tells about the adventures of an ordinary person in an unusual world. The story is told without words or full cut scenes. The game has a dark and mysterious atmosphere. The project is divided into levels. Already completed maps can be replayed. Their selection is available through the main menu. The gameplay is built around unique physics and the hero’s ability to change places with certain objects.

item.title: Laser Tag Massacre
item.description: Game Description Laser Tag Massacre puts the player in the script in the spirit of slasers of the 1980s. Events unfold on the night of Halloween, when a group of 5 friends is going to celebrate a holiday in a large abandoned gym. This dilapidated structure is located in the remote part of the Campinas, Brazil, which isolates the characters from any external assistance. Their plan for the usual match in the laser tag is sharply interrupted by the appearance of a hostile presence, shifting the focus from resting for self -preservation.

item.title: Chains of Freedom
item.description: Game Description Chains of Freedom puts the gamer under control of an elite military unit in a fictional dystopian Eastern European country. This title falls into the turn-based tactics genre, focusing on strategic combat scenarios from an isometric perspective. Users complete tasks aimed at uncovering a conspiracy that threatens the state. Achieving goals depends on the correct use of team members and adaptation of formations during clashes. The core gameplay in Chains of Freedom involves turn-based combat, where players plan every move for their squad members.

item.title: Forever skies
item.description: Game Description Forever skies is an atypical survival in the world of post -apocalypse, where the player will become the captain of the airship. Unfortunately, the protagonist is the only crew member, but even this does not reduce the number of his problems. After all, he still needs food, which is practically no in the air with the exception of rare birds. And the technique tends to break, and it requires constantly replacing old details.

item.title: RuneScape: Dragonwilds
item.description: Game Description RuneScape: Dragonwilds introduces gamers to Ashenfall, the forgotten continent of the RuneScape universe where dragons have awakened. This open world experience challenges 1-4 players to survive together or alone. The gameplay is based on collecting resources, constructing buildings, developing skills and creating things. The main task is to hunt down the dragons and fight their Queen. Survival in RuneScape: Dragonwilds is constantly complicated by the threat of dragons that roam the lands.

item.title: Milord
item.description: Game Description Milord is a role -playing game about the management of medieval ownership, combined with elements of urban development. You take under direct control of the Earth, where your specific instructions determine the fate of the inhabitants and general prosperity. Preservation of reserves is a constant factor affecting all aspects of management and requiring careful planning. Through a petition system, subjects directly turn to the ruler for help, intervention or solving various local issues.

item.title: Bureau of Contacts
item.description: Game Description Bureau of Contacts throws you into the digital kingdom, which is simultaneously strategic and adventurous. This is not just pressing the buttons - here you need the ability to think. An intricate story unfolds in different areas, each of which is filled with puzzles and interesting characters encountered on the way. Be prepared to reveal secrets, gaining unexpected allies and a complex choice that can decide or break your progress.

item.title: Monaco 2
item.description: Game Description Monaco 2 invites the player to assemble a specialized squad to carry out cunning heist operations. The main setting is the city of Monaco, presented as a location with many valuable targets due to the wealth concentrated there. Gamers embody members of an international group of criminal specialists seeking to exploit these conditions for material gain. Success requires careful movement through locations, bypassing security and retrieving intended valuables in a tense environment.

item.title: Traveler's refrain
item.description: Game Description Traveler’s Refrain talks about the wanderings of a protagonist with the name traveler in a forbidden forest who seeks to find his lost lover. It carries a special tool, Buzuki, which begins to vibrate and make sounds when approaching a certain mechanism in this closed area. The tool pronounces the words with a voice devoid of reason, indicating the traveler to find 3 destinies and thereby setting the direction to his subsequent steps.

item.title: Crashlands 2
item.description: Game Description Crashlands 2 Returns you to the crazy world of Wuanop. Flux Deibs, all the beloved intergalactic trucker, was again in a difficult position. This time forget about the transportation of goods. It is about reunite with old friends and getting new, eccentric. But these are not only calls to the old cosmic friends. We are talking about the connections that you create. Friendship with Voanop’s colorful character opens the door, and literally.

item.title: FIND ALL: Bunker
item.description: Game Description FIND ALL Bunker - coloring the monochrome world with colored inks that become available as you find various items. Events unfold both in an underground shelter and on the surface of the earth, where the threat of a nuclear explosion looms. The main task is to carefully search for skillfully hidden objects, which requires maximum care and observation from the player. The atmosphere of complete immersion is created thanks to specially selected musical accompaniment.

item.title: Hollow Survivors
item.description: Game Description Hollow Survivors is Rogue -Like Dungeon Crawler, in which gamers take on the role of one of the last rational Hollow in the world captured by terrible monsters. Then the users have to fight with the endless waves of enemies, rising to the tower, which is under the control of the ominous cult. Along the way, you will find a variety of weapons, improvements and synergistic effects that will help you survive and survive.

item.title: All in Abyss: Judge the Fake
item.description: Game Description All in Abyss: Judge the Fake introduces us to Asuha Senahara, a self-proclaimed gambling genius who seeks dominance in a special area where gambling rules. After challenging the ruling Witch of the gambling district, Asuha suffers her first defeat due to a mysterious power and falls into despair. Determined to take revenge, she begins an adventure of high-stakes poker, uncovering fraud, and amassing wealth. Her journey involves challenging her opponents to duels to the death, where either she or the Witches will die.

item.title: Asgard's Fall - Viking Survivors
item.description: Game Description Asgard’s Fall - Viking Survivors offers a Scandinavian roguelike that focuses on fighting against multiple opponents. The characters will have to make their way through crowds of creatures in the Nine Realms, seeking to challenge the gods of Asgard. The choice of protagonists, such as Warrior or Huntress, offers different starting options, each with unique skill trees to level up; these decisions influence the gamer’s approach to upcoming battles.

item.title: Junkyard Builder
item.description: Game Description Junkyard Builder puts gamers in charge of an abandoned junkyard full of potential. The key is to transform unwanted items into valuable resources with your own hands. You will have to travel to different locations and inspect the area in search of materials suitable for restoration and sometimes unique finds. The process revolves around the restoration, systematic waste disposal and day-to-day management required to operate a waste sorting facility to eventually build a large scrap metal business.

item.title: South of Midnight
item.description: Game Description South of Midnight is not a typical adventure action. Of course, there is a study and battles here, but this game plunges into the southern folklore, erasing the boundaries between real and mythical. This is an experience that breaks out of the usual genre mold. You play for Heisel, moving along the shadow underground of the deep south. This is a beautiful but disturbing place where the destroying landscapes whisper the secrets of the past.

item.title: Babushka's Glitch Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Babushka’s Glitch Dungeon offers the player to do methodical cleaning of a huge magical basement. Armed with a broom, the heroine sweeps dust, confronts the monsters and destroys insects surrounded. The protagonist also masters bright witch’s magic, fundamentally changing established rules. The study of the world involves the solution of puzzles and the detection of hiding places, while each creature has a unique mechanics that requires a special approach to overcome it.

item.title: The Last of US Part 2 Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Last of US Part II Remastered goes to the PC and transfers the narrative experience of the Naughty Dog to a new platform. Players fall into a world where survival intersects with personal revenge, following the main characters of Ellie and Abby along the interconnected plot lines. The game takes place in the post -pandemic landscape and transfers participants in territories, transformed infection and human conflicts. Jackson, Wyming, serves as an initial background on which the characters are in the framework of the survivor community.

item.title: Elroy and the Aliens
item.description: Game Description Elroy and the Aliens is set in an alternate version of the 1990s. In the story, Elroy and Peggy search for their long-lost father while unraveling mysteries involving ancient alien technology, sentient robots, and the paranormal. The scenario moves across two planets and more than 60 locations, and features more than 60 heroes with unique characters. The title combines humor and emotion, exploring themes of family, loss and perseverance.

item.title: Lurking Danger
item.description: Game Description Lurking Danger is a survival horror gaming experience where two waitresses, Elena and Regina, become embroiled in the mystery of a regular customer’s disappearance. Their investigation quickly moves into an altered reality, where familiar places are distorted and familiar logic ceases to work. Gamers will have to face a hostile environment alone or using local co-op in split screen. The key goal is to locate the missing person while simultaneously dealing with threats to the transformed reality.

item.title: Veil of Sanity
item.description: Game Description Veil of Sanity is an intense psychological horror game where survival depends on your ability to remain lucid under constant threat. The basis of the whole action is the relentless pursuit by a creepy clown in the territory of an abandoned carnival. Every creak and rustle can give away your location, turning any mistake into a fatal one. Resisting mental pressure and controlling your own fear become key to maintaining your sanity.

item.title: STORROR Parkour Pro
item.description: Game Description STORROR Parkour Pro is a parkour simulator set in the Isle of Dogs, London. Users navigate these urban environments using a set of motor abilities derived from the discipline of parkour. Available actions include jumping, climbing, overcoming obstacles, somersaulting, sliding, swinging and running across rooftops and streets. The character’s movement is provided by an animation system that combines motion capture data from parkour athletes with physics calculations to depict dynamics.

item.title: Godstone
item.description: Game Description Godstone users will make their way through dark dungeons filled with monsters. 5 different sorcerers are available for a choice, for which you can go to study the ruins of Wiritian. The main task for the protagonist will be the search for a valuable divine stone, which is lost in the depths of gloomy catacombs. The game is an atmospheric dungeon-crawler with elements of the Rowl, where you need to wander the character through two-dimensional locations with the side of the side.

item.title: Sultan's Game
item.description: Game Description Sultan’s Game allows you to play the role of a minister managing the treacherous court of a ruthless ruler. Each week, the Sultan requires participation in a ritual during which a card is played, each representing a different challenge. Quests can range from indulging in excess and satisfying dangerous desires to conquest and bloodshed. If you fail to complete the task within seven days, you will be executed.

item.title: Within the Cosmos
item.description: Game Description Within the Cosmos is a first -person science fiction role -playing advent of which takes place in 2278. Gamers wake up in a secluded star system, where they face a split human society. This society fights with a growing threat from androids, which leads to serious stress. The background is the star system of Adallio, where users were once part of a mission launched by the united space agency of the Earth.

item.title: Rus vs lizards 2
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards 2 is a continuation of its predecessor, a cooperative action game in an alternative historical setting, where warriors confront reptilian invaders. The title is a medieval world, permeated with a conspiracy plot and elements of martial arts. Users participate in large-scale battles using a combination of traditional sword fighting and unconventional tactics. The world features villages, fortresses and industrial zones repurposed by the enemy. LIZARDS MUST DIE 2’s narrative revolves around renewed conflict as the heroes of Rus once again rise to fight the lizard invasion.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beyond Horizons abandons the linear path and throws gamers into a vast, ever-changing world. Buckle up and get ready to explore - procedurally generated landscapes make every game unique. Leave your comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel across vast deserts, lush forests, and any kind of road (or lack thereof). But this is not just a sightseeing trip. Drive Beyond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that remain to be unraveled.

item.title: Splintered
item.description: Game Description Splintered brings a fresh twist to the genre. In this game, the setting is not static, it changes unpredictably after each major victory, thanks to the villain’s ability to randomize the environment. What starts out as a traditional RPG with a simple mission to avenge your king soon turns into something much more complex. As you progress, users will encounter new challenges that arise thanks to the randomized world, cities, items and enemies.

item.title: LOOK OUTSIDE
item.description: Game Description Look outside is an RPG in the Survival Horror genre, the action of which completely unfolds in one residential building. After an inexplicable event, people who looked out turn into altered creatures, which leads to a collapse of society. Look Outside sets the players to search the building in search of food, supplies and tools. During the study, interaction with various inhabitants occurs - both people and nonhumans. Resource management plays a key role.

item.title: Metal Garden
item.description: Game Description Metal Garden is a first-person shooter game set in a vast megastructure overgrown with vegetation. The title follows a lone traveler navigating a setting abandoned to its original purpose. The remains of past civilizations are scattered throughout the vast and multi-layered industrial ruins. The main character will have to go through this environment, facing unknown threats and obstacles. Progress depends on exploring the terrain, discovering lost knowledge, and adapting to the dangers present in the changing landscape.

item.title: Sapo 3D
item.description: Game Description In Sapo 3D, the player takes control of a frog who must collect golden flies to unlock portals. These transitions lead to new, linearly constructed levels. The gameplay offers a journey through four unique worlds, where the main goal is to collect enough insects. This is necessary to open the huge gate in the central hub and get to the ending of this platformer. Representatives of aggressive flora and fauna will stand in the way of the protagonist of Sapo 3D: from plants that shoot seeds to chickens with explosive eggs and ladybugs with axes.

item.title: Asylum
item.description: Game Description Asylum-an adventure indie-chorror in the first person, immersing a gamer into a mystical, frightening atmosphere. The developers were inspired by the stories of Lovecraft and Fulchi to create the most gloomy setting that makes every rustle be scared behind their backs and be constantly in suspense. A single -user campaign takes place at the mental institute of Hanwell, where brutal crimes and experiments are taking place on people. The walls of this room saw a lot, and some objects of the environment will tell about what happened to the main character of the story, and the occurrers of hallucinations and sharp schemers will confuse the cards.

item.title: Fate: Reawakened
item.description: Game Description Fate: Reawakened returns the classic experience of passing dungeons with a modern bias. This collection included all four games of the cult series of FATE, offering to visit the old Growl city again and go through the constantly changing gates of the dungeons. Yuzers will have to fight as a procedurally generated dungeons, each of which offers new trials and awards. There are several games in one release, so you will have something to do, and not one of the two adventures will be the same.

item.title: Call of Boba
item.description: Game Description Call of Boba transfers to a small, bizarre town, where they find themselves in the role of assistants, helping to revive the destructive Bob tea store. At first, the task is simple: to cook delicious drinks, attract customers and develop business. But underground is hiding something more. With the onset of night, a completely new world opens, and this is where real adventures begin. Armed with the ingredients for Bob milk tea, users fight enemies to get inspiration for the creations of the store.

item.title: Warm Monkey
item.description: Game Description Warm Monkey is about a desperate struggle for survival in the heart of a concrete jungle, where a troop of small monkeys multiplies under the scorching sun. Instead of the traditional health scale, there is an inexorably decreasing thirst indicator, forcing you to constantly look for saving moisture. The behavior of their relatives, appearing every 10 seconds, is unpredictable: they can fall from a height or run out onto the roadway under the wheels of scooters.

item.title: Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone
item.description: Game Description Chernobylite 2: Exclusion Zone takes you into the shadowy reality of the Chernobyl Exclusion Zone, where radioactive material has transformed the landscape into something both familiar and alien. Players navigate a post-apocalyptic landscape as planet walkers in search of an energy-rich substance called Chernobyl, while battling nightmarish creatures for survival. The project offers switching first- and third-person perspectives, allowing you to fully appreciate the carefully recreated environment based on the real exclusion zone.

item.title: Dragonkin: The Banished
item.description: Game Description Dragonkin: The Banished throws you into the world, devastated by dragon blood. Evil creatures that have become a result of dragon blood lurk in the shade. Four heroes rise to challenge this spoiled world. Each of them has unique skills and a chance to rewrite the future. The ice warrior in Dragonkin: The Banished, a barbarian, feeding on the blood of a white dragon, embodies gross power. He wields an ax and hammer, becoming more and more when he cuts and breaks enemies due to his resistance.

item.title: I Am Legion: Stand Survivors
item.description: Game Description I Am Legion: Stand Survivors combines combat and strategy, offering gamers a wide variety of choices. The central mechanic involves summoning powerful fighters, each with their own abilities, to fight waves of enemies. As users progress, they encounter various difficulties, including unlocking new characters and equipment. This allows for continuous development and adaptation of the game, adding an extra layer of complexity to the gameplay. The core loop of I Am Legion: Stand Survivors revolves around synthesizing and upgrading your warriors.

item.title: Immortal Hunters
item.description: Game Description The Immortal Hunters action begins in a world that has forever changed as a result of one fateful act. The church, which once served as a lighthouse of light and leadership, went to a radical step, killing God. That is how - God is dead, and behind this is the church. This is not an ordinary story about faith and devotion; This is a story about power, manipulations and survival.

item.title: Everhood 2
item.description: Game Description Everhood 2 is an unconventional role-playing game (ARPG) that throws traditional combat out the window. Instead of standard battles, users encounter enemies accompanied by music. You are guided by the celestial Raven, who promises to help you regain your voice if you can defeat the fearsome Dragon of the Mind. This quest will take you through a surreal world where the line between life and death is blurred, and every victory seems like a step deeper into the unknown.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced
item.description: Game Description Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced is a significant update for players looking for a new experience from the already classic gameplay. Rockstar Games has turned the popular GTA 5 into a more powerful version aimed at new generation platforms. Gamers will experience improved performance across several technical parameters and significant updates to the core environment. Los Santos in GTA 5 continues to serve as the backdrop for the narrative, with the three main characters navigating complex crime landscapes.

item.title: Knights in Tight Spaces
item.description: Game Description Knights in Tight Spaces takes place in a medieval fantasy setting. Your main task is to control the environment and assemble a squad to face various bandits and supernatural threats. The mechanic is based on deck building, where strategic choice and card synergy play a crucial role in defeating your enemies. You will need to carefully plan each move, taking into account the environment, team composition and available resources.

item.title: Blood Typers
item.description: Game Description Blood Typers offers a unique twist on survival horror gameplay, combining traditional horror elements with unusual control mechanics. Users find themselves in a cursed film studio, where the line between fiction and reality is blurred, and monsters from horror films invade the real world. Whether you play alone or in a group of up to four gamers, the challenge remains the same: survive the chaos and escape. The title takes place on procedurally generated levels, making each session different from the previous one.

item.title: PASSIONERS
item.description: Game Description PASSIONERS is a visual novel, the action of which takes place on board a spaceship setting off to colonize a distant planet. Having woken up prematurely from cryosleep, the main character finds himself isolated on a ship where women are kept in numerous cryopods. The mission has gone off course, and now the main character must decide which women to awaken and how to interact with them. The dynamics of the emerging relationship and the direction of plot development will depend on the choice made.

item.title: Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider IV-VI Remastered combines three cult parts from the series, representing them in an updated format for both veterans and beginners. Each offers a unique look at Lara Croft’s further path. Having entered its place, gamers fall into a world filled with ancient prophecies lost by tombs and shadow conspiracies. From the battle with the Egyptian god Seth to the investigation of mysterious murders - the bets cannot be higher.

item.title: Recall: Empty Wishes
item.description: Game Description Recall: Empty Wishes immerses you in a dark atmosphere of exploration, where you have to wander as different characters through frightening locations and understand mystical events. A group of friends one day encounters the disappearance of Tommy Lin, a smart and attentive boy. The guys decide to go in search of the young man in order to save him from possible troubles. The game is made in the horror genre, drawn in an anime style.

item.title: SteamDolls - Order of Chaos
item.description: Game Description SteamDolls - Order of Chaos - Metro -Aviation in steampunk stylistics, characterized by a rich gameplay and incredible cruelty. There is a huge amount of blood and dismemberment. There is a time to play for a thief and anarchist named a whisper. Its task is to penetrate the well -protected territory. You need to act as quieter as possible and try not to enter into a direct confrontation with protection.

item.title: Reality Break
item.description: Game Description Reality Break takes a unique approach to the ARPG genre, combining fast-paced action with roguelite elements for fresh and unpredictable gameplay. At its core, this is a management game. You play as a mercenary who suddenly gains the ability to distort reality, throwing you into a whirlwind of constant change and danger. As you progress, you will face challenges that require more than just combat skills - it is your mastery of reality control that will determine the outcome.

item.title: Star Knightess aura
item.description: Game Description Star Knightess aura - Anime -Nella, the main character of which is a girl with an unusual name of the aura. She falls into a fantastic world called Roya. The heroine is cursed by the king of demons. Its task is to deal with otherworldly monsters every night. At the same time, it is very important not to lose yourself. The girl has insanity and she begins to consider herself a completely different person.

item.title: A Game About Digging A Hole
item.description: Game Description A Game About Digging A Hole offers a simple but intriguing idea: dig in the house you just bought. You start with basic tools, but with each shovel the game unfolds. There’s no rushing to some grand conclusion or fighting monsters—just you, a shovel, and the promise of discovering something hidden beneath the surface. As you dig, you will find various items that you can sell to make a profit.

item.title: Underward
item.description: Game Description Underward is a cooperative horror in which gamers will work together in a deadly underground hospital. Here, up to four users take on the roles of investigators who are instructed to extract the monsters of Test-Subject from the depths of this abandoned object. The task is clear: to convey dangerous capsules to the elevator and escape, but the path is far from simple. Users will encounter unpredictable enemies, traps and dangerous environmental factors, making their way through labyrinths.

item.title: Kingdom Come Deliverance 2
item.description: Game Description Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 is a continuation of the most realistic medieval simulator, developed by Daniel Vavra, the creator of the first Mafia. The gameplay places great emphasis solely on realism, offering to live the life of an ordinary person who lived during the time of the Holy Roman Empire. The gameplay provides you with a large open world to explore. Your hero has human needs for food, sleep and food.

item.title: Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector
item.description: Game Description Citizen Sleeper 2: Starward Vector is a dice RPG set in a vast, chaotic sci-fi universe. You play as the Sleeper, an android with a malfunctioning body and a past you can’t remember. With a price on your head, you find yourself on the run in the Starbelt, a collection of habitats built in the asteroid belt and relentlessly pursued by their creators. The world is full of difficult decisions, dubious contracts and the constant need to balance survival and moral choices.

item.title: FlyKnight
item.description: Game Description FlyKnight is an old-school first-person Dungeon Crawler that places you in a world twisted by the curse of a powerful witch named Lunamotha. Your task as the squire of Flyknights is to break the witch’s spell, because of which the inhabitants of this world cannot grow wings. Early on, you find yourself separated from your comrades after being ambushed, but the mission remains clear: stop Lunamoth. Whether you choose to travel alone or team up with others, the journey will be filled with danger and potential.

item.title: Au Revoir
item.description: Game Description Au Revoir takes gamers to 2071, where the world has switched to synthetic brains to preserve human consciousness. People can live forever by transferring their minds into new bodies - concept. The main character, Tristan, works as a Guardian tasked with extracting these consciousnesses. However, what begins as a routine mission soon develops into something more complex. Tristan begins to doubt his own existence and the integrity of his synthetic brain, which creates the basis for a deeper exploration of the very nature of the world around him.

item.title: Whispers of the Eyeless
item.description: Game Description Whispers of the Eyeless is set in a dark fantasy world where every decision has weight. Users take on the role of the First Prophet, tasked with rebuilding the destroyed city and managing a growing cult. As you navigate the regions of Aranthor, you must balance ambition, survival, and the looming influence of the Dead Gods. The title revolves around tactical turn-based combat, where planning and foresight are the key to victory.

item.title: The Stone of Madness
item.description: Game Description The Stone of Madness is a real-time tactical stealth game that immerses gamers in the claustrophobic halls of an 18th century Spanish monastery. In the bleak setting of a Jesuit stronghold deep in the Pyrenees, five prisoners must combine their skills to overcome a web of fear, paranoia and supernatural threats. With their lives on the line, they must confront their own traumas and the madness that threatens to consume them.

item.title: Dreamcore
item.description: Game Description Dreamcore is a psychological study that immerses the limits of line spaces. Here you have to move through huge, confusing environment, which seem to extend between ordinary and unusual. The design of these levels is such that every turn can bring you closer to a clue or deeper into a secret. The users have to roam these spaces, solving the logic of their strange schemes, and at the same time experience a sense of discomfort, which only intensifies as it passes.

item.title: IDUN
item.description: Game Description Idun throws you into a hostile world, teeming with resources and teeming with enemies. This is a genre mixing in which in real time the strategy is combined with the protection of the tower, which gives a unique experience. Your mission? To capture all the most valuable and get out alive. But this is not a light walk. Enemy hordes are teeming on the battlefield, tirelessly pursuing your base.

item.title: Somber Echoes
item.description: Game Description Somber Echoes is a single -user gloomy scientific and fantastic Metroidvania, immersing gamers into the terrible and mysterious depths of the abandoned spaceship atromytos. From the very beginning, users take on the role of addressing, which should withstand their twin sister, harmony before it can untie the space catastrophe. Title weaves elements of Greek mythology into a futuristic setting, mixing two different worlds to create an atmosphere that seems at the same time ancient and alien.

item.title: Cyclopean: The Great Abyss
item.description: Game Description Cyclopean: The Great Abyss shows the labyrinth of the underworld, full of oddities and difficulties. Locked in a place where there is little what your character should be guided in this dark kingdom with the help of available instruments, unions and decisions. The world is formed by a choice, from battle to dialogue, and each action can open or close the path. Users should manage limited resources such as gold, health and even sanity, to pave their way through a huge, mysterious environment.

item.title: Diddy
item.description: Game Description Diddy begins with a mission to destroy a dark party held in a private estate. Players in the Company of Eminam and 51 Centers must stop the owner’s atrocities and stop the meeting. The main task is the salvation of Justin B, who is in the territory after the accumulation of a state fraud. The detachment confronts the army of Selebri, acting as a guards, ready to defend the estate and its owner.

item.title: Arken Age
item.description: Game Description Arken Age is a virtual reality adventure that immerses gamers in Bio-Chasm, a world shaped by the mysterious Grand Arborist. Stepping into the shoes of a member of the Nara race, users must navigate this bizarre, terraformed environment that has been corrupted by an all-consuming force known as Hyperion’s neural corruption. Physics-based combat mechanics include both sword and gun combat, influenced by the unique properties of Arkenite, the world’s main resource.

item.title: Endless Alice
item.description: Game Description endless alice - this is an adventure from a third person with an intriguing combination of elements of the Rowlaik and visual design, inspired by anime. Title invites gamers to explore a huge, constantly changing world, where each solution can determine their path. Six characters to choose from, each of which offers its own set of abilities and styles of battle, allow users to combine them in accordance with their style.

item.title: Heroes of Hammerwatch 2
item.description: Game Description Heroes of Hammerwatch 2 expands the hack-and-slash experience by transporting users into a vast world filled with danger, quests and loot. The action takes place on Hammer Island, and users find themselves in the heart of a kingdom in turmoil, where an evil army has seized power and forced the kingdom’s allies into hiding. The gamer’s task is simple: gather resistance, challenge the forces of oppression and restore the land to its former glory.

item.title: Hyper Light Breaker
item.description: Game Description Hyper Light Breaker is a three -dimensional cooperative adventure, the action of which takes place in an expanding universe. In this new part, gamers are sent to Overtergrowth - a new land that is full of opportunities for studying huge dynamic environment. There are both single and multi-user online solutions that allow users to test the new world alone or with friends. The main attention is paid to the disclosure of hidden secrets, the fight against evil monsters and survival in the dangers that lurks around every angle.

item.title: The Roottrees are Dead
item.description: Game Description The Roottrees are Dead invites gamers to immerse themselves in the intricacies of a family history shrouded in the mystery of tragedy. Set against the backdrop of the December 1998 plane crash that claimed the lives of the Roottry family, the title challenges users to uncover the mysteries surrounding a famous candy-making family. Through research and deduction, participants embark on a quest to piece together a complex family tree, identifying both known and little-known relatives.

item.title: Airborne Empire
item.description: Game Description Airborne Empire. Want a city-building adventure with a twist? This game throws you straight into the clouds, tasking you with building and managing a city that floats among them. Think SimCity and sky pirates and exploration. The basis is strategic planning and resource management. You will have to keep your city afloat, in the literal sense of the word. Every decision you make affects how well your air metropolis functions.

item.title: Super Puzzle Cat
item.description: Game Description Super Puzzled Cat is a 2D puzzle platformer where the user has to guide a cat through various challenging stages. The title features time manipulation mechanics built into the game, offering a unique twist on traditional platforming. Users use tools such as jetpacks, portals, bombs and bubble gum to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. The title has over 150 levels, featuring a variety of environments and scenarios that require strategies to complete.

item.title: The Haunting of Joni Evers
item.description: Game Description The Haunting of Joni Evers takes gamers into the isolated world of Joni, a woman living in a mansion in Harvest, Oklahoma. The plot tells a complex tale of family, loss and the unsettling presence of something dark in an old house. Joni’s life, once marked by distance from her family, begins to unravel after a tense argument with her only friend. Subsequent events in The Haunting of Joni Evers draw the user deeper into the secrets of the house, revealing fragments of the past, painful and mysterious.

item.title: Mystic Rest Stop
item.description: Game Description Mystic Rest Stop offers a unique twist on the psychological horror genre. The title follows 22-year-old Arthur Brooks, who takes a summer job working the night shift at a lonely gas station. When he gets used to the role, it seems to him that something is wrong. There is an uneasy tension in the atmosphere that continues as customers come and go. But these aren’t just ordinary clients: Arthur’s encounters quickly escalate, blurring the lines between the mundane and the horrific.

item.title: My Summer Car
item.description: Game Description My Summer Car is a life simulator of a Finnish, a 19-year-old boy who lives in a dacha in picturesque forests. His relatives on vacation in Tenerife, the whole house, and most importantly, garage, at his disposal. Created on Unity, thanks to the flexibility of this engine, and it became possible to add so much mechanic, which are below. Your main occupation will be the restoration of the ancient Satsuma AMP car made on the basis of a real car - Datsun 100a.

item.title: Sea Fantasy
item.description: Game Description Sea Fantasy Transes users to the water world, where the war changed the landscape. Seventy percent of the continent is under water, and two young islanders named Rod and Axel find themselves in the center of the crisis. Their mission is to catch the mysterious Seaaz, which is an important part of the plan to prevent the return of a nightmare of biological weapons - a black dragon. Forget about idyllic fishing.

item.title: Amenti
item.description: Game Description Amenti will take gamers deep into the heart of Ancient Egypt. The journey begins with the protagonist, a historian and photographer, entering the newly discovered tomb of Pharaoh Rudamon, hidden 50 meters below the surface of the earth. According to the plot, if the tomb is disturbed, the spirit of the pharaoh and his royal family will move into it, which will mark the beginning of an unfolding disaster.

item.title: Tactics of World War I
item.description: Game Description Tactics of World War I, as the name suggests, uses the setting of the First World War.
