A Deep Slumber. **begins with gamers stepping into the shoes of Juan Aguirre, a young and ambitious photojournalist making his way through the streets of post-revolutionary Mexico City. At this time, the dust from the Mexican Revolution was just beginning to settle, and the political landscape was still in flux. Here users find themselves in the thick of things, following Juan, who is trying to uncover the truth about the murder of President Alvaro Obregon.

item.title: Nocturnals
item.description: Game Description Nocturnals is not your typical action thriller. Instead, he dives into the narrative, telling the story of Ted, a lonely soul stranded in the desert town of Ruddleside. Together with his newfound companion Diego, Ted fights for survival in a world devastated by an unknown force. The Heart is an exploration of the ghostly atmosphere of Ruddleside. No need to blow up aliens or collect coins, here you have to solve puzzles and reveal the secrets of the city.

item.title: Caravan Sandwitch
item.description: Game Description Caravan Sandwitch takes you to a fictional desert planet where the protagonist ends up as a result of a spaceship crash. The only thing that survived the fall was a small truck. It turns out that the new world is also inhabited by people who have exactly the same problems as on Earth. As part of the journey, the protagonist needs to explore a huge planet in search of secrets.

item.title: EVOTINCTION
item.description: Game Description EVOTINCTION is a futuristic hacking and stealth game that puts gamers in the role of Dr. Liu, a scientist running a research facility that has been taken over by rogue AIs. The core gameplay centers on using hacking skills to overcome robotic threats and uncover secrets vital to humanity’s survival. The facility is teeming with enemies, ranging from ordinary service robots to deadly, specially created killer bots. These robots follow specific patrol routes and work together under the guidance of a sophisticated artificial intelligence system.

item.title: Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines
item.description: Game Description Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines is a 2D action platformer that follows the adventures of Pablo and Luna. Users move through different dimensions, using unique abilities to overcome obstacles and enemies. It combines swinging, jumping and explosions to provide dynamic gameplay. In the title, gamers alternate between the characters Pablo and Luna. Pablo uses a grappling hook to progress through levels, while Luna brings her own set of skills to the table.

item.title: REKA
item.description: Game Description REKA is an atmospheric adventure game that takes you on a journey through the breathtaking nature of central Europe. Embarking on an adventure as a witch, you’ll wander through forests and swamps, collecting plants and creating magical items for the locals. Experience rural Europe in the late 19th century as you play as a herbalist witch traveling through the countryside with her homemade chicken-legged house. With an extensive witch’s cottage base building system, you can build and furnish your own witch’s house, making it unique with a variety of furniture and decorative elements.

item.title: Stardiver
item.description: Game Description The underwater world ofStardiver amazes with its diversity. Under the water column lies an entire civilization that has adapted to this way of existence so that other forms of life do not bother them and do not start wars. Nevertheless, for humanity, a planet completely covered with water turned out to be more than a curious subject of research. The main character is the head of a scientific group for the study of extraterrestrial forms of civilization.

item.title: Demolish and Build 3
item.description: Game Description Demolish and Build 3 is a first-person simulator that puts you in the driver’s seat of a demolition company. You will complete orders and lead your team to victory using a variety of tools and heavy equipment. This game will test your skills as you manage your business and complete every project with precision and efficiency. A completely new realistic model of destruction will make you marvel at what you see more than once, since each fragment is physically simulated.

item.title: Paws for Adventure
item.description: Game Description Paws for Adventure is a project where magical melodies performed by meowing are used to interact with the world and influence the environment. Unique skills are acquired by the protagonist while sleeping on the graves of deceased relatives, whose spirits share their experiences with him. This unusual way of character development is part of a larger journey that the main character, a black cat named Cocoa, must make after he is separated from his owners.

item.title: Elsie
item.description: Game Description Elsie is a side-scrolling action platformer with simplified roguelike elements. Each subsequent playthrough is different from the previous one. With any new run, levels are created randomly from hand-crafted parts. The order of loot also always changes. The locations themselves are non-linear. Before starting, you can add or remove modifiers to increase or decrease the difficulty accordingly. In the indie game you can run, jump, dash, bounce off walls, and shoot at opponents.

item.title: Nightwatch: Closer
item.description: Game Description Nightwatch: Closer is a first-person horror game that places gamers in a tense, closed environment. The goal of the game is to survive for ten minutes, preventing unknown anomalies from entering a small post. The user is left alone, he has only a flashlight and ingenuity to fight off these threats. The title creates an atmosphere of tension and isolation, forcing users to remain vigilant and resourceful. Nightwatch: Closer’s mechanics revolve around managing various factors such as psyche level, noise level, room lighting, and time.

item.title: Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland
item.description: Game Description Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland is a new action-platformer that brings beloved characters from the 1990s Nickelodeon series into a vibrant, imaginative world. Together with Tommy, Chucky, Phil and Lil, users will go on an adventure inspired by their favorite video game character, Reptar. The title features a unique co-op design that allows gamers to form teams and complete various levels located in the Pickles' home. The gameplay of Rugrats: Adventures in Gameland revolves around exploration and teamwork.

item.title: Satisfactory
item.description: Game Description Satisfactory is an open-world first-person adventure where you build industrial buildings, explore, and fight. Explore a new planet alone or with other users. Build huge structures and do whatever you want in assembly line paradise. You are an employee of FICSIT Corporation. Players can build wherever they want. Expand production in all directions, install factories in the mountains, forests or plains. Mine natural resources found all around you. Build complex networks and transport routes, automate all mechanics, without forgetting about safety.

item.title: Towerborne
item.description: Game Description Towerborne is an action-adventure game set in a world where humanity’s cities have been destroyed by a mysterious evil. The only refuge is the Bell Tower, a tower that holds secrets and dangers. Gamers take on the role of Ace, a hero tasked with protecting the inhabitants of the Belfry and uncovering the truth about the evil threatening humanity. Here gamers explore a huge world filled with various creatures and challenges.

item.title: Yars Rising
item.description: Game Description Yars Rising is an exciting adventure game that will take gamers on an exciting journey through a dystopian future. In the role of Emi Kimura, an experienced hacker, you have to infiltrate the mysterious QoTech corporation. This shadowy organization holds secrets that could potentially change the world. The gameplay is a delightful mixture of 2D platforming, stealth and hacking. As Amy, you’ll navigate intricate levels, dodging laser bars, outsmarting security drones, and solving challenging puzzles.

item.title: Shadow Bounded
item.description: Game Description Shadow Bounded is a horror adventure game in which users play the role of a member of the Paranormal Research Foundation. Tasked with investigating the disappearance of a couple in the Alaskan mountains, gamers must navigate a dark and eerie house while unraveling the secrets hidden within. A relentless AI enemy stalks each player, creating a constant sense of tension and fear. The cabin, with its history of strange events dating back to the 1950s, provides the perfect backdrop for this thrilling adventure.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 is a cinematic 3rd person sci-fi action game set in a dystopian future where humanity is under siege by an implacable enemy - the Tyranids. As a Space Marine, you take on the role of a superhuman warrior tasked with defending the Imperium from an impending threat. Gamers are offered the opportunity to embody the image of the greatest warrior and show their incredible skill and cruelty in epic battles on distant planets.

item.title: The Corpsmen
item.description: Game Description The Corpsmen is a title that offers users a unique task: create and lead teams of creatures in battles with a variety of monsters. From the very beginning, gamers collect monster parts to build creatures of their own design. Each assembled part - be it a leg, tail or head - provides certain skills, leaving room for experimentation. The title relies heavily on strategic planning and creativity. You don’t just throw parts together and hope for the best.

item.title: Ace Attorney Investigations Collection
item.description: Game Description Ace Attorney Investigations Collection, a collection of two games featuring the famous prosecutor Miles Edgeworth, invites users to step into his shoes and go on an exciting investigation. Unlike the courtroom drama of the original series, this collection focuses on the detective work that precedes the trial. Gamers will have to collect evidence, interview witnesses and solve intricate mysteries using logical deduction. The collection includes various quality of life improvements to make gameplay more enjoyable.

item.title: Castle of Lord Velimir
item.description: Game Description Castle of Lord Velimir takes users on a dangerous journey with the titular hero, a warrior seeking atonement for the sins of humanity. As Velimir journeys through the dungeons, wastelands, and mysterious underworld of Agartha, he will face countless challenges and uncover the secrets of his world. The gameplay is a mixture of strategic combat and exploration. Users must master a variety of fighting techniques to defeat a variety of enemies, each requiring a different approach.

item.title: CORPUS EDAX
item.description: Game Description CORPUS EDAX is an exciting first-person action RPG with close combat that will take you to a distant planet. Create your own character and unleash your inner warrior as you fight, sneak, or escape difficult situations. The choice is always yours - and it is always the right one. Use your body, ingenuity, and improvised weapons to make your way through this stunning new world. Thanks to the A.

item.title: Smells Like a Mushroom
item.description: Game Description Smells Like a Mushroom is a sci-fi third-person shooter that takes gamers on a journey through the Milky Way. At the center is an invasion of creatures known as Magic Mushrooms. Users take on the role of Carrotado, a brave character tasked with preventing disaster. The gameplay includes platformer and shooter mechanics, and missions take place on various planets in the solar system. Smells Like a Mushroom’s narrative is driven by an absurd story and features both single-player and co-op modes.

item.title: Ale and Tale Tavern
item.description: Game Description Ale and Tale Tavern is a first-person, open-world co-op fantasy tavern simulator. Gamers step into the role of a tavern owner tasked with restoring an abandoned establishment to its former glory. The title offers a variety of activities including cooking, fishing, hunting and exploration. Users can complete a variety of quests, interact with unique characters, and manage various aspects of the tavern, such as decoration and crafting. The gameplay of Ale and Tale Tavern allows you to play both alone and in co-op - up to four users can work together.

item.title: Ghoulscrapers
item.description: Game Description Ghoulscrapers puts the player under the control of Eggrol, a new employee of the company of the same name. This heroine has to face a significant personal problem: a duty to the government, reaching the amount of one Gazillion dollars. The main plot is built around its desperate attempts to pay this debt until the allotted time has expired. The company also provided it with a shotgun who acts as a tool for new professional activities in the supernatural world.

item.title: Hit of Chernobyl
item.description: Game Description Hit of Chernobyl immerses users in a post-apocalyptic environment where survival is of paramount importance. Finding themselves in an area contaminated by an unspecified disaster, gamers take on the role of an adventurer. He must navigate a landscape full of dangers, not only from the environment, but also from other characters. The world is populated by marauders, journalists and thrill seekers, each with their own motives. Finding unique artifacts becomes the main task, requiring users to overcome a landscape replete with difficulties.

item.title: Selfloss
item.description: Game Description Selfloss is an atmospheric adventure set in a fantasy setting. The plot centers on a lonely old man, and the game itself is inspired by ancient Russian and Icelandic legends. Travel through the isometric world using your magic staff. Fight against numerous mythical creatures from Slavic fairy tales and myths. Help everyone who needs it. Pass many tests to perform a secret self-floss ritual that can heal a wounded soul.

item.title: Skoof Simulator
item.description: Game Description Skoof Simulator will introduce gamers to the life of Skoof, an ordinary worker whose everyday life is not like a routine. The title combines simulation and adventure elements, offering a unique and sarcastic look at everyday activities. Players guide Skuf through a variety of missions, ranging from factory shifts to humorous and unexpected situations. Users will have to manage Skuf’s life, making decisions that affect the outcome of his adventures.

item.title: Don't Stare
item.description: Game Description Don’t Stare is a stealth platformer that weaves together gameplay and storytelling in a thoughtful and engaging way. You enter the world as an introvert, navigating an environment filled with extroverts who want to make small talk, invite you to a party, or just chat about their day. However, the introvert has his own mission, much more personal than just making new acquaintances. You are not here to join the crowd, but to reunite with old friends who, for unspoken reasons, have grown apart.

item.title: Envelope
item.description: Game Description Envelope is an immersion into a surreal world where a routine night shift turns into a series of strange and sinister events. The initially linear narrative gives way to the exploration of a small open location filled with eccentric characters and hidden possibilities. The fate of the protagonist, an unhappy soul tired of his job and an oppressive boss, turns out to be intertwined with something much larger than one could imagine.

item.title: Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open
item.description: Game Description Paper Ghost Stories: Third Eye Open is a supernatural adventure that follows the journey of a young girl named Ting who can see spirits. Set in a small Malaysian suburb, the story spans five years of Ting’s childhood as she masters her unique ability. Gamers interact with friends, family, and ghosts while solving puzzles and avoiding dark spirits. The title dives into the culture and traditions of Malaysia, offering a combination of cultural exploration and supernatural elements.

item.title: The Moon 2044
item.description: Game Description The Moon 2044 takes place in a secret research facility on the Moon, where gamers take on the role of a genetically modified commando codenamed XV-11. The mission is to retrieve priceless samples from the depths of a lunar base that has fallen into darkness and is now overrun by hostile creatures. The facility, originally intended for experimental cancer research, hides many dark secrets that users will have to uncover.

item.title: BAKERU
item.description: Game Description The adventure ofBAKERU, set in fantasy Japan, revolves around a tanuki boy named Bakeru. His mission is to restore order after the chaos unleashed by Oracle Saitaro and his Festival Army. Armed with a mystical drum, Buckaroo sets out on a journey to free Japan from evil spirits. BAKERU takes place across 50 scenes inspired by Japanese prefectures. This vibrant world combines modern Japan with echoes of period dramas to create a captivating backdrop.

item.title: Star Trucker
item.description: Game Description InStar Trucker imagine yourself speeding through space, a lone trucker in a galaxy of endless possibilities. Welcome to a game that combines the spirit of the open road of American trucking with the vastness of space. You are not just a driver, you are the captain of your destiny in a space suit. What is your mission? Transport cargo, search for salvaged items and communicate with other truckers across the galaxy.

item.title: The Casting of Frank Stone
item.description: Game Description The Casting of Frank Stone is an interactive, dramatic horror video game that promises to delve into the dark and twisted depths of a small town haunted by its past. Developed by Supermassive Games and set within the Dead by Daylight universe, the adventure will put gamers in the shoes of a group of young friends and uncover the chilling truth about the infamous Frank Stone. A shadow hangs over Cedar Hills, a town forever scarred by the brutal deeds of Frank Stone.

item.title: We Heist Too
item.description: Game Description We Heist Too takes place in Rivadorium, a city where nothing ever stays the same. Users get used to the role of a thief, move silently through the streets, plan and carry out high-stakes robberies. This world doesn’t require much care, and from the very beginning you will notice that every corner of the city is fraught with opportunity. But the tricky part is knowing which opportunities are worth pursuing.

item.title: Sumerian Six
item.description: Game Description Sumerian Six is not your typical war story. Sure, it throws you right into the middle of World War II, but it’s an alternate history where whispers of folklore and conspiracy theories are as real as the Nazi threat. You take command of Enigma Squad, a strange team of scientist-soldiers. These are brainy people who can outwit and outwit their enemies. Their mission? Prevent the Third Reich from getting its hands on occult weapons.

item.title: Together in Between
item.description: Game Description Together in Between is an intriguing cooperative puzzle adventure game. In this mysterious and enchanting world, two users move forward by working together, overcoming obstacles and complementing each other. The original concept blends seamlessly with innovative puzzle mechanics to create a fun experience. The plot centers on imprisonment inside a magic book. Users find themselves trapped with their partner, existing in different dimensions but sharing the same space.

item.title: Escape The Garage
item.description: Game Description Escape The Garage begins with a jolt as the gamer wakes up in an abandoned train station. The eerie silence and desolate surroundings immediately set the stage for an intense adventure. The user’s main task is simple: get to the car and drive home. However, as the machine approaches, a mysterious figure appears, abducting the user and imprisoning him in a dark, terrifying garage. Once trapped, the user must solve a series of challenging puzzles to escape from the garage.

item.title: FALLEN
item.description: Game Description FALLEN is an adventure game that immerses gamers in a post-apocalyptic world where the main goal is survival. Users navigate desert landscapes, encountering various challenges that test their resourcefulness and decision-making skills. The title places an emphasis on exploration and interaction with the environment, requiring gamers to scavenge for supplies and manage their inventory efficiently. In FALLEN, users encounter a variety of characters, each with their own story and motivation.

item.title: Kamikaze Lasplanes
item.description: Game Description Kamikaze Lassplanes is a visual novel that combines the plot of a novel with the action of a shoot-‘em-up game. Set in a steampunk world, the dramatic storyline involves two powerful weapons, Lassplanes, and two girls who become them. Gamers navigate a war-torn kingdom and make choices that affect not only the fate of the kingdom, but also their own hearts. The project introduces Alba Trosset and Hannah Brandenburg, two girls who transform into deadly warplanes.

item.title: LUNARiA -Virtualized Moonchild-
item.description: Game Description LUNARiA -Virtualized Moonchild- is a narrative-driven adventure game that explores the intersection of virtual reality and human connection. The story centers on T-BIT, a high school student and exceptional gamer who finds himself in a mysterious virtual space known as the Moon World. Here he encounters an AI avatar named LUNAR-Q, who is the mascot of the lunar exploration project. The adventure focuses on the developing relationship between T-BIT and LUNAR-Q as they overcome the difficulties of the Lunar World.

item.title: Satellite Odyssey: Prologue
item.description: Game Description Satellite Odyssey: Prologue is a first-person adventure game with horror elements. You play as Laska, a Soviet biologist who awakens from hibernation to discover that the crew of the spaceship Icarus is missing and its life support systems are malfunctioning. The narrative unfolds as you explore the ship, find clues, and interact with the artificial intelligence Zarya, who observes and influences your actions. The action takes place in a retrofuturistic world inspired by classic Soviet science fiction.

item.title: Akimbot
item.description: Game Description Akimbot throws you into a metal menagerie! Teaming up rogue robot Exe with unexpected partner Shipset, this game throws down the galactic gauntlet. Imagine: you are fighting your way through hordes of robotic enemies, spaceships at the ready, and all this in order to stop a universal catastrophe. Fasten your seat belts, because this is not an easy ride. Akimbot isn’t all button-mashing chaos. It’s a strategic dance with enemies to dodge and outwit in every level.

item.title: Call of Sentinels
item.description: Game Description Call of Sentinels plunges you headlong into an epic struggle against the forces of darkness. Choose your champion from a growing list, each with unique skills and fighting styles. Hone your combat skills against the relentless hordes in the Arena, or take on dangerous journeys across varied landscapes in Campaign. Unleash devastating combos and master tactical maneuvers to defeat treacherous enemies and colossal bosses. Each victory unlocks valuable upgrades, expanding the hero’s capabilities and shaping his legend.

item.title: ENDLESS DAYS Z
item.description: Game Description ENDLESS DAYS Z immerses gamers in a desolate, post-apocalyptic world devastated by DeltaVirus-7. As the leader of a group of survivors, you must overcome treacherous obstacles, collect vital samples, and confront hordes of the undead as you desperately search for a cure. The gripping narrative and intense gameplay make the game appealing to fans of survival horror and action games. The gameplay of ENDLESS DAYS Z is based on exploration, combat and resource management.

item.title: Everlasting Flowers - Where there is a will, there is a way
item.description: Game Description Everlasting Flowers - Where there is a will, there is a way is a story about two young women. Studio SPRITE created this cinematic romance. Mina, a loner, withdraws from the world. School becomes a battlefield for her. Her hideout? A room filled with dried flowers. Captive of her thoughts, she wanders through endless days. Meanwhile, Ran, born into wealth, discovers the emptiness beneath the gilded cage. Her perfect life is falling apart.

item.title: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
item.description: Game Description Gori: Cuddly Carnage is a dynamic action game with platformer and horror elements. You find yourself locked in with crazed toys out for blood. Using a special surf, you will have to cut circles around the location and chop up monsters. You will play as an anthropomorphic kitten riding a hoverboard. Chop unicorns and don’t get caught by a huge gorilla, eager to devour the protagonist. The gameplay of Gori: Cuddly Carnage has been jokingly described as Skate and Slash.

item.title: Squirrel with a Gun
item.description: Game Description Squirrel with a Gun offers a unique experience. Users control a squirrel armed with a gun. Target? Collect golden acorns in a secret underground vault. The squirrel that haunts the neighbors becomes a hero. Gamers move through a sandbox filled with puzzles and enemies. The facility serves as a playground for chaos. To survive, the squirrel uses weapons, claws and teeth. The gameplay combines shooting and platforming. Users collect golden acorns - a squirrel’s obsession.

item.title: Star Command Galaxies
item.description: Game Description Star Command Galaxies is a space simulator in which you play as a ship captain. You need to build your own shuttle, recruit staff and go explore the randomly generated expanses of outer space. Manage your staff, collect resources, fight the alien threat and upgrade your ship. Clear the galaxy from enemies and various parasites. Fight pirates, zombies and many other opponents. You need to monitor the status of your team.

item.title: Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash
item.description: Game Description Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash is a colorful spin-off that departs from the traditional racing focus. The title is evolving into a playful, party-oriented title. Gamers are immersed in a pixelated world teeming with familiar Umamusume. The Slapdash Grand Prix, the centerpiece, unfolds like a chaotic school festival. Four different events promise laughter, competition and unexpected twists. The pixel relay will spark the fun. Time plays a crucial role in Umamusume: Pretty Derby - Party Dash.

item.title: Kamitsubaki City Ensemble
item.description: Game Description Kamitsubaki City Ensemble represents a post -apocalyptic world in which music is the key to revival. Girls of artificial intelligence, awakened after the cataclysm, use the magic of songs to restore the destroyed reality. However, their existence is still shrouded in secret. Advencura musical library boasts a variety of compositions from Kamitsubaki Studio and the Musical Isotope series. More than 48 compositions in the basic version of the game and many additional tracks in seasonal pass allow users to explore an extensive musical landscape.

item.title: The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria
item.description: Game Description The Lord of the Rings: Return to Moria is an adventure game in the Lord of the Rings universe, the events of which develop in the world of Middle-earth during the Fourth Age. In the game you can meet characters from the original work. For example, Gimli appears at the beginning of the story. He leads a company of dwarves, leading them to Durin’s Doors. The plot centers on the dwarves, whose task is to reclaim Moria and restore the entire kingdom of Khazad-dum under their rule.

item.title: Core Keeper
item.description: Game Description Going on an adventure inCore Keeper, you are immersed in an atmosphere of the unknown, requiring exploration on behalf of an archaeologist who wants to discover as many new relics and ancient artifacts as possible. Waking up in an unfamiliar area that resembles a cave, the protagonist will have to fight through a variety of monsters and obstacles that impede progress in order to achieve his goals. Taking control of the main character, who finds himself in a pixel world filled with the spirit of adventure and precious treasures, you have to survive and explore the dangerous environment.

item.title: PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1
item.description: Game Description PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1 is a journey through many worlds as Phil goes on a quest for justice. This is an exciting adventure in which gamers must return what was stolen by a strange race of invaders. The story touches on themes of friendship, love and the essence of humanity. Users mine resources, fight enemies and choose between direct combat and stealth. Gameplay involves jumping on platforms, shooting, and solving puzzles.

item.title: The Land of the Magnates
item.description: Game Description The Land of the Magnates tells the story of fallen prince Shahbaz, who is tasked with restoring a kingdom shrouded in darkness. The project does not hand the players a sword, but instead puts a sitar in their hands. This is not a hack-and-slash adventure game. No, this is a journey of melody and power, where puzzles replace sword fights. Shahbaz’s adventure takes place through fantastical landscapes. The black forest, the damned expanses, tests your courage.

item.title: Marmoreal
item.description: Game Description In Marmoreal, you need to do everything possible to stop the evil army of the undead, led by the Necromancer. His goal is to take over the world, exterminate all good warriors and the common population, and then, controlling his army, become a completely immortal Lich. This cannot be allowed under any circumstances. Therefore, it is necessary to organize powerful resistance that will plunge the enemy forces into oblivion.

item.title: Rum and Gun
item.description: Game Description Rum and Gun uses a pirate theme as its setting. The hero travels through the lands located in the Indian Ocean, fighting on land with people and monsters. He is trying to stop the captain, who has enlisted the help of evil forces. He also has to learn the secrets of the Drunken God. The plot is presented with jokes and self-irony. History is divided into acts. This is an isometric shooter and action game with role-playing elements.

item.title: Before They Wake
item.description: Game Description Before They Wake takes place in the summer of 1984 and tells the story of Alfred, who is confined to a wheelchair. Trapped in an orphanage overrun by sound-sensitive mutants, Alfred navigates a path of survival and escape. His wheelchair squeaks with every movement, adding to the stress as he navigates the dangerous environment. The mechanics boil down to controlling the noise level so as not to attract the attention of mutants.

item.title: Selene's Unbearable Night
item.description: Game Description Selene’s Unbearable Night is a third-person survival horror game that immerses gamers in a tense and atmospheric atmosphere. The title tells the story of Selena, a woman who finds herself in a difficult situation and is forced to overcome various dangers in order to survive. Users will have to search for key items, solve complex puzzles and confront numerous threats in order to complete the game. Selene’s Unbearable Night’s narrative unfolds through dialogue and cinematography, offering a deep dive into the characters' motivations and backstories.

item.title: 3 Minutes to Midnight
item.description: Game Description 3 Minutes to Midnight is a casual indie adventure with all kinds of puzzles, filled with satire and parodies of modern society, humor (sometimes dark and rude) and unpredictable plot twists. This project uses a side view, which allows movement in two dimensions. The backgrounds are detailed and made in three-dimensional style. Control is available using a controller from any manufacturer for maximum convenience. The story campaign tells the story of a strange night explosion somewhere in Mexico that changed the life of a young girl named Betty Anderson.

item.title: Finding Mosey
item.description: Game Description InFinding Mosey, your feline companion Mosey has mysteriously disappeared. You go in search of him, and your path will depend on the choice you make. Developed by youpiepoopie, this single-player third-person RPG offers a refreshing blend of exploration, storytelling, and whimsical interactions. The search begins. Imagine waking up during a peaceful hike to find Mosey nowhere to be found. This seemingly simple premise turns into an exciting adventure. The landscape is rife with secrets, and whether your character’s path is destructive or peaceful will determine how the quest unfolds.

item.title: Tactical Breach Wizards
item.description: Game Description Tactical Breach Wizards is a tactical role-playing adventure with an isometric camera that allows you to better assess the situation in the location to make the most successful decisions. The user will be transported to an alternative universe, where a distant futuristic future has arrived. The gamer takes control of a group of soldiers who have magical abilities that allow them to be combined with shots from firearms.

item.title: Wild West Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Wild West Dynasty takes place in 1800s America. The player’s task is to build his own ranch, providing himself with wealth and food. Over time, other settlers, workers and friends will join the main character. Each minor character has their own qualities, characteristics and mannerisms. Many of them will turn out to be bandits, and only the gamer can decide who is sent to the gallows. Having become determined, the central character set out to build a Wild West dynasty, moving further across the Pacific region of America.

item.title: Sunset Hills
item.description: Game Description Sunset Hills plays out like a hand-drawn narrative puzzle game in the style of a novel. Nico, a writer, travels by rail through the post-war world. Here users play the role of Niko, visiting former comrades in different cities. Users encounter a variety of characters and events as they unravel Niko’s life story through clever puzzles. The world is a serene Victorian landscape. Tall buildings contrast with vast open spaces.

item.title: Who is Abby
item.description: Game Description Who is Abby begins with Tom, a man determined to find his missing sister. The title immerses users in an intense psychological thriller where mystery and exploration go hand in hand. With every step, Tom plunges deeper into the mystery of Abby’s disappearance, revealing a story shrouded in mystery and darkness. As you take on the role of Tom, the journey becomes personal, with each discovery adding another piece to the puzzle of Abby’s life.

item.title: Black Myth: Wukong
item.description: Game Description Black Myth: Wukong is a role-playing game based on the famous Chinese novel Journey to the West, written back in the 16th century. The gameplay is a journey through a semi-open world, reminiscent of a metroidvania. The developers cite the Souls series as their main source of inspiration. The story centers on a hero named Sun Wukong, who is also known as the Monkey King. He travels through a fantasy world, simultaneously fighting with various phantasmagoric creatures.

item.title: Crime Scene Cleaner
item.description: Game Description Crime Scene Cleaner is an unusual simulator in which you clean up traces of a crime. As soon as the customer calls you, and usually this is the mafia boss, you need to rush to the crime scene and wield a brush, a mop and many other tools. If you find yourself in a room full of corpses and blood, pull yourself together and do the job professionally. Don’t give investigators a chance to find the killer.

item.title: Dark and Deep
item.description: Game Description Dark and Deep begins with Samuel Jajj, a listener of a conspiracystoal podcast with the same name. Transfer themes penetrate his world, transferring the hero to a new landscape filled with threats. This first -person horror is concentrated on the study and resolution of puzzles. The key task is to survive in an altered reality and reveal a conspiracy that underlies it. Samuel has to withstand the inhabitants of this place, moving around the environment in search of answers.

item.title: Bearnard
item.description: Game Description Bearnard sends the player on a campaign to return onions and protect his native forest. A single journey runs through a variety of landscapes, offering to encounter numerous enemies and solve puzzles based on physics. The combat system is a step -by -step tactic using a deck of cards that requires a strategic approach to defeat hostile creatures. Promotion in the plot includes the study of locations in search of secrets and artifacts, as well as improving onion shooting skills while managing cards in the hand.

item.title: Five Nights at Freddy's: Into the Pit
item.description: Game Description Five Nights at Freddy’s: Into the Pit immerses players in time-bending horror. Oswald, bored with everyday life, stumbles upon a portal to the past in the ball pit of an old pizzeria. His desire for thrills quickly turns into a nightmare when he finds himself trapped in a deadly game of cat and mouse. The player will have to move between different eras, piece together clues and elude relentless animatronic pursuers.

item.title: Retail Company Simulator
item.description: Game Description Retail Company Simulator puts you in the middle of retail chaos. A humble store awaits you - a blank canvas for your entrepreneurial spirit. Sign contracts with leading brands, fill shelves and transform your space. The computer will become your faithful assistant, a tool for unpacking boxes, arranging goods and determining prices. The market dictates, and you adapt. Shirts, jackets, shoes, hats - a varied assortment to keep customers happy.

item.title: SHADOW MANSION
item.description: Game Description SHADOW MANSION is a journey deep into an ominous family estate, where the protagonist will have to face a long-forgotten curse. The walls of this abandoned mansion are saturated with dark secrets, and every corridor hides traces of demonic rituals that are the key to unraveling the tragic history of an entire family. Psychological tension is created thanks to hyper-realistic graphics and carefully crafted sound, making you feel the invisible presence of otherworldly forces that are watching every step of the uninvited guest.

item.title: JIANGHU CHRONICLES
item.description: Game Description JIANGHU CHRONICLES throws you headlong into Jianghu, a world steeped in the legends of Chinese martial arts. Forget about choosing a favorite warrior - here you are the head of a clan, managing a growing group of fighters. The heart of JIANGHU CHRONICLES beats in time with the management of the clan. You will recruit students, each of whom has their own strengths and characteristics. Some may be a martial arts prodigy, while others may have a keen tactical mind.

item.title: 7 Days to Die
item.description: Game Description In7 Days to Die you will need the ability to loot, kill other players, take loot, build buildings, craft items, shoot accurately and keep track of time, because in the open world there is a night in which zombies and other undead sharpen their attention . A horror first-person shooter that combines city building, multiplayer, survival, tower defense and character leveling in an RPG style. Despite the fact that a severe epidemic has struck the world, you will be able to kill animals to take their meat and skin.

item.title: Pigromance
item.description: Game Description Pigromance tells about the efforts of one pig to avoid turning into a food product, this is a story about the escape contrary to the established expectations. The action starts on a farm, where the piglets were previously behind the fence, in the usual environment. Over time, this design of the content succumbed, initiating the mass departure of animals from the agricultural limits in search of an alternative to their prepared role.

item.title: Into the Radius 2
item.description: Game Description Into the Radius 2 throws users headlong into a chilling world. Whether you prefer solo exploration or thrilling squad adventures, Radius promises danger and secrets in equal measure. A project that will allow gamers to experience the disturbing atmosphere first hand. Forget about fancy graphics and pomposity. Into the Radius 2 boils it down to the bare bones of survival. Radius himself is a character, a mysterious and hostile force dictating your every move.

item.title: Valley Peaks
item.description: Game Description Valley Peaks is an excellent first-person climbing simulator that takes you on an exciting adventure through stunning mountain landscapes. Unlike any other game on this theme, here you will use your climbing skills to solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to install radio towers for the frog inhabitants of this beautiful mountain paradise. Each mountain peak is a puzzle waiting to be solved, with challenges like crumbling rocks, dangerous spikes and moving minecarts that will test your climbing abilities.

item.title: Ashes of the Union
item.description: Game Description Ashes of the Union features a world torn apart by cataclysmic upheaval. The once-mighty Soviet Union lies in ruins, the victim of tectonic forces that have split the land and created a hostile, mutant-infested landscape. Human survivors cling to existence in underground bunkers - isolated remnants of humanity. Above the ground, as far as the eye can see, a deserted wasteland stretches. Ruined cities overgrown with vegetation serve as eerie monuments to a bygone era.

item.title: CONSCRIPT
item.description: Game Description CONSCRIPT is a horror game set in the First World War. It’s 1916. The player controls a French soldier who moves through the trenches, collecting various supplies and solving many puzzles to help him overcome the thorny and winding path. The protagonist is trying to survive in extreme conditions, being involved in one of the most brutal conflicts in human history. The game mechanics combine classic horror with modern survival games.

item.title: Exophobia
item.description: Game Description Exophobia is a first -person pixel shooter in which you will go to explore a spaceship. The shuttle fell to the surface of an unknown planet. Here you will encounter the hordes of alien opponents. The game is made in retro-stylistic, drawing inspiration in arcade shooters of the 80s. Explore the station and find out the background of the inhabitants of the planet, as well as try to find out what caused the shipwreck.

item.title: Escape Memoirs: Safe House
item.description: Game Description Escape Memoirs: Safe House invites gamers to become members of a shadow organization. The task is to infiltrate the safe house and take away the most important equipment. But here’s the catch? The boss of the safe house has gone missing. No keys - no problem. It’s hacking, but with a corporate twist. Puzzle lovers rejoice. This game is a real bonanza for the brain. Safes, codes and riddles galore.

item.title: Acre Crisis
item.description: Game Description Acre CRISIS transfers players in 1992, placing them in the AKR area in the jungle of the Amazon. The Brazilian Military Police Brigade is going to this area to investigate a series of deaths caused by wild animals, as well as reports of a meeting with cryptids. Upon arrival, the soldiers were in direct confrontation with a group of hungry dinosaurs, which was very different from their initial task.

item.title: Dungeons of Hinterberg
item.description: Game Description Dungeons of Hinterberg is not your typical dungeon crawl. Sure, there are monsters and loot, but this game adds a plot twist - the idyllic Austrian Alps. Yes, you heard right. Just imagine: fresh mountain air, charming townspeople and… oh yes, dungeons teeming with monsters. Welcome to Hinterberg, a tourist hotspot with a hidden side hustle: monster slaying. So, you are Louise, a savvy lawyer, ready to ditch your corporate routine for a vacation with a twist.

item.title: KRITIKA: ZERO
item.description: Game Description Kritika: Zero is not your average MMO. It’s a high-octane dance of blades, bullets and acrobatics, where every fight is a choreographed spectacle. Think Diablo and Devil May Cry, as well as Dynasty Warriors. You have to choose a warrior from a diverse list, each of which has its own fighting style. Sword-wielding berserkers cut through enemies with brutal efficiency, while alchemical sorcerers unleash a barrage of arcane weapons from afar.

item.title: Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus
item.description: Game Description Bo: Path of the Teal Lotus is a bright platformer that invites you to play as a charming heroine who is a heavenly flower. The girl has acrobatic abilities, and her deadly weapon is an earring. Together with the girl you will need to explore a mysterious world inspired by Japanese mythology. The game features many colorful and memorable characters with whom you can interact. The gameplay combines elements of classic 2D platformer and metroidvania.

item.title: Nekokami - The Human Restoration Project
item.description: Game Description Nekokami - The Human Restoration Project places the player in a future space where cats rule the universe. Here you will play the role of a Planetary Architect, an employee of Nekokami Co., tasked with constructing entire worlds and managing them in numerous star systems. The key mechanic is the strategic placement of tiles to form different environments, from pristine natural biomes to urban settlements needed for a reborn humanity.

item.title: Knight Fall
item.description: Game Description Knight Fall is an asymmetrical confrontation where each gamer chooses a side in an eternal battle. Controlling unique heroes endowed with special powers becomes the key to victory. The Fire Knight is able to surround enemies with flames, while the Bonecrusher summons skeleton minions to help. All actions are performed by playing cards from the hand, with each card offering several options for use. The battlefield, which is a monastery, is assembled from special location tiles, providing a unique layout for each session.

item.title: Riven
item.description: Game Description Riven evokes thoughts of forgotten puzzles and worlds shrouded in a secret. Here users are on the era of Riven, the accumulation of islands, whispering secrets in the wind. Lush jungles meet with the reverence of caves, and each environment is carefully worked out and suggests itself for research. But this is not an excursion tour. This is Adventure, which throws a glove, demanding from gamers to become masters of puzzles.

item.title: ASKA
item.description: Game Description ASKA is a 3rd person action role-playing game in which you can build an unforgettable Viking settlement and survive together with your inhabitants. Your ships land in an unfamiliar world that is constantly changing and full of secrets. You will have to fight, build, repair, fight, grow crops and swim the waves in order to survive the fight against an ancient enemy in the cold winter… You will have to create a self-sufficient tribe, work, create, fight, hunt and lead the people to prosperity.

item.title: Everafter Falls
item.description: Game Description Everafter Falls combines a heating simulator with elements of role -playing adventure. Gamers grow crops, bred animals and catch fish in a serene rural area. However, there is a more gloomy background. Terrible creatures that require combat skill live in the dungeons. A unique development system replaces traditional experience with mysterious cards. Gamers feed these cards to a mysterious creature, contributing to the growth of the character. The project encourages cooperation.

item.title: Chained Together
item.description: Game Description Chained Together throws you into the depths of hell so you can escape. But there is one peculiarity: you are chained to your comrades. That’s right, teamwork (or at least some serious coordination) is essential if you want to survive the scorching heat and treacherous platforms. Play through the game alone or take up to three friends for a chaotic co-op adventure. Each world presents new challenges, testing your ability to navigate the chain.

item.title: Blade and Sorcery
item.description: Game Description Blade and Sorcery is a first-person fantasy action game focused on realistic hand-to-hand combat physics. You play as a hero who knows how to fight with melee and long-range weapons, as well as magical abilities. There are three classes to choose from: Warrior, Ranger and Wizard. The gameplay is adapted for virtual reality helmets Valve Index, HTC Vive, Oculus Rift and Windows Mixed Reality. The gameplay is based on body physics and fair hitboxes.

item.title: Jrago II Guardians of Eden
item.description: Game Description Jrago 2 Guardians of Eden offers players to unite in a company up to 4 people for battle with a revived darkness. Heroes form a detachment of guards in order to exterminate demonic forces and return the light to their world. The gameplay combines two -dimensional platforming and elements of the role action on a spacious card. This project, which is a direct continuation of the Jrago The Demon Hunter, expands the basic Hack and Slash mechanics within the framework of a large metroid that focuses on joint actions.

item.title: Legend of Mortal
item.description: Game Description InLegend of Mortal you have to become a nobody in the Tang Man sector. Not a prophetic hero, not a legendary warrior - you’re just trying to survive in a world on the edge of the abyss. But even lowlifes have it tough, right? This is what Legend of Mortal is all about: your decisions determine the fate of you and those around you. Think of it this way: every meeting, every battle, every seemingly insignificant conversation is a twist in the kaleidoscope.

item.title: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance
item.description: Game Description Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance throws you headlong into a deserted Tokyo. Remember that school life? Gone. It was replaced by Daath - a nightmare kingdom infested with demons. You, an ordinary teenager, in one minute turn into Nakhobino - non-human and non-demon. With a mysterious savior at your side, you navigate the treacherous landscape of Da’ath, caught between warring gods and demonic tyrants vying for dominance. This expanded re-release offers a buffet of options.

item.title: Ad Fundum
item.description: Game Description Ad Fundum takes you deep into the world of dieselpunk, where exploration, resource gathering and survival are the key to success. In the title, you control a massive mech tasked with digging through layers of rock to discover valuable minerals and hidden secrets. However, the journey will not be easy. Each step requires close attention to the condition of the ‘Mech, as overheating, lack of fuel or even falling debris can lead to an abrupt end to the expedition.

item.title: Monster Hunter Stories
item.description: Game Description Monster Hunter Stories fills a unique niche within the franchise. Developed by CAPCOM, this role-playing game first released on Nintendo 3DS in 2016. It has since expanded to mobile devices, captivating gamers with taming monsters and the familiar hunting formula. Forget about huge weapons and epic carving sessions. Here you are a Rider who develops relationships with the very creatures you usually hunt. Explore vast landscapes and dungeons, encountering a wide variety of monsters.

item.title: The Feathered Serpent
item.description: Game Description The Feathred Serpent immerses in the lost world, where battles with dinosaurs, magic goals and giant beetles are coming. The contract with the Death Deity guarantees resurrection after each failure, allowing you to make new attempts to achieve the only goal. Each revival brings other objects, accidentally generated levels and the development of history. The main task remains unchanged throughout all cycles - to defeat the powerful creature that gave the name to this title.

item.title: Wayfinder
item.description: Game Description Wayfinder is an online action role-playing adventure game in which gamers become Wayfinders, using unique abilities to fight the hostile force that has taken over their world. The game emphasizes co-op, allowing users to team up with friends to enhance their abilities and manage their adventures. The world of Evenor, in which the action takes place, has been destroyed, and gamers will have to navigate it, collecting valuable materials and creating items that will help them in their search.

item.title: Jesus Christ Simulator
item.description: Game Description In Jesus Christ Simulator, gamers find themselves in the role of Jesus, who has to solve the problems facing humanity. The action takes place in a huge American city where users use their divine abilities to create miracles and bring positive changes to people’s lives. These forces include flights, exorcism and various supernatural abilities that allow users to interact with the environment and its inhabitants in unique ways.

item.title: Tiny Terry's Turbo Trip
item.description: Game Description Tiny Terry’s Turbo Trip takes you deep into Sprankelwater, a bustling city teeming with life. You’ll take control of Terry, a dreamer with wild plans. This is not your typical sightseeing simulator. Sure, you can explore every corner of Sprankelwater, but Terry has a one-way ticket to space in mind, and you have to hit the road. The residents of Sprankelwater are a quirky bunch, each with their own story.

item.title: Nine Sols
item.description: Game Description Adventures inNine Sols take players into an oriental fantasy setting where they will have to fight against 9 Sols. The game is a 2D platformer with soulslick elements, where you have to face unique bosses. Events take place on the territory of New Kunlun, which is a refuge for survivors. The ancient gods abandoned mortals, forcing them to confront dangerous monsters. A hero named Yi has arrived from the distant past to defeat mythological creatures.

item.title: JustAxe
item.description: Game Description JustAxe is the adventure of a young girl named Marta, who must save her sister from the clutches of mysterious creatures that have invaded her hometown of Novy Sovetsk. Having received a mysterious letter indicating the path to salvation, the heroine arms herself with her grandfather’s ax and sets off on a dangerous journey. Her path runs through picturesque but dangerous locations: from forests and mountains to a gloomy other dimension from where the invaders came.

item.title: The Rainman
item.description: Game Description The Rainman takes place in the small town of Crystalpine Grove, where tranquility once reigned. However, the city has recently been gripped by a series of chilling murders, all of which point to a mysterious killer known only as Rain Man. He attacks when it rains, hiding in the shadows and leaving a trail of violence and fear. Local authorities are baffled, and residents are left wondering who the next victim will be.

item.title: Taora: Survival
item.description: Game Description Taora: Survival throws you headlong into a huge open world. Forget about sightseeing, this is pure survival. You’ll navigate a treacherous landscape, dodging threats around every corner. Building a defensible base and managing resources are your top priorities, a harsh reality check, right? But the problems go beyond the elements. This world is teeming with nasty enemies, so you’ll need sharp tactics to both fight and strengthen your defenses.

item.title: Duck Detective: The Secret Salami
item.description: Game Description Duck Detective: The Secret Salami is not your average investigation. Here you trade your cape for feathers and become a down-on-his-luck duck detective with a knack for sniffing out clues. This narrative mystery adventure throws you headlong into a world of intrigue, tasking you with unraveling a complex case. Forget about chasing shadows - it’s all about using your noodles. You’ll interview suspects, collect evidence, and piece together the puzzle, all while keeping an eye on the details.

item.title: Hauntii
item.description: Game Description Hauntii is an action-adventure title that places gamers in the shoes of a ghost as they navigate the mysterious and ever-changing realm of Eternity. It’s clear from the start that this is no ordinary ghost story. The world in which you live is full of secrets and mysteries, everything in it seems accessible, but at the same time remains inaccessible to understanding. As a ghostly creature, you interact with your environment, control creatures, and discover new paths to explore while uncovering pieces of a forgotten past.

item.title: Senua's Saga: Hellblade 2
item.description: Game Description Senua’s Saga: Hellblade 2 is a continuation of the role-playing action game about the Celtic warrior Senua. The events of the sequel are transferred to Iceland, and the story directly continues the previous part. The main idea of ​​the game is to show your vision of shamanism in the Nordic lands. The game draws on Celtic and Norse mythology. In the center of the story is the heroine of the previous part - Senua.

item.title: Songs of Conquest
item.description: Game Description The hero of Songs of Conquest is developing his own kingdom and mercilessly destroys any enemies that stand in his way. A mix of turn-based strategy and RPG, you can become the head of a huge army that uses not only weapons, but also magic in battle to conquer distant territories in order to assert their own power. The game features a level editor, 4 factions to choose from, and the ability to go on a solo adventure or challenge a friend to battle locally or online.

item.title: Aeruta
item.description: Game Description Aeruta begins after an explosion caused by the main character, Chaya, which leads to her commitment to rebuild the bakery. Set in a deserted town, she works with shop owner Effie in a world where baking is all but forgotten. The smell from the oven helps rediscover this delicacy, starting the process of revitalizing the settlement. To achieve this goal, the player sets out to explore the world, fight monsters and obtain ingredients, using them to transform the city.

item.title: Cozy Caravan
item.description: Game Description Cozy Caravan invites users to a single adventure, combining craft, trade and research. Gamers lead a caravan for picturesque landscapes, opening a mobile market in each city. Advencura is focused on human relations and simple pleasures. Gamers develop relations with residents of cities. The craft includes mini-games for the production of items for trade. Each character offers quests and stories, deepening the involvement of the user. The charm lies in her ability to transfer players to the serene world.

item.title: Ghost of Tsushima DIRECTOR'S CUT
item.description: Game Description InGhost of Tsushima DIRECTOR’S CUT the twilight of the 13th century begins. The Mongol Empire massacred many peoples as part of a campaign whose goal was to conquer the East. Between mainland Japan and the mighty Mongol fleet, commanded by the legendary General Khotun Khan, lies only the island of Tsushima. And he is conquered, small villages are destroyed. Samurai Jin Sakai remained the last of the great clan.

item.title: Violet
item.description: Game Description Violet immerses you in a haunted castle, an atmospheric adventure filled with secrets and spine-chilling horrors. Inspired by classic survival horror, the game promises an unforgettable journey through shadows and secrets. Unravel the Markwell legacy by going back 20 years to the events of TRAUMA Broken Paradise. Take control of Katherine Markwell, a key figure in the dark history of Siren’s Well, and explore her mysterious past. Witness the chilling events that unfold before you as you guide Catherine through a terrifying journey of mystery and danger in this prelude to the tragedy of TRAUMA Broken Paradise.

item.title: Asleep - ATO 1
item.description: Game Description Asleep - Ato 1 is a psychological horror movie in which the boundaries between reality and nightmares are erased. The main character, Ana Lsia, is in a city covered by shadows, and tries to understand what is happening, focusing in a terrible environment. Struggling with a loosening mind, she encounters an unfriendly world, filled with creatures, which, it seems, become only sinister than darker. The user rises in its place, exploring the place where each corner is fraught with a potential danger or hint to unraveling mystery.

item.title: You are peter shorts
item.description: Game Description You are Peter Shorts immerses users in a tense situation, when Peter suddenly captures during grilling on a lazy Saturday day. A secret agency comes into business, which takes him to the mysterious cloning center. In the role of Peter, gamers should navigate in this strange, hostile environment, trying to escape with the help of newly created clones. The game, made in the style of Metroidvania, has many rooms that need to be explored, and a number of shock clones that have to fight with.

item.title: 1000xRESIST
item.description: Game Description 1000xRESIST is a unique interactive adventure that will take you on a journey through time and space. You will be able to explore different eras and places, meet personalities and learn their stories, look at the past and future through the eyes of the game’s heroes. However, do not forget that this world is not a place for weaklings. You will have to make difficult decisions that will affect the fate of not only your heroine, but also future generations.

item.title: ANIMAL WELL
item.description: Game Description InANIMAL WELL players must explore a vast labyrinth created in pixel art. Players will interact with the interactive environment, pick up objects and combine them with each other, solve spatial puzzles, overcome landscape obstacles and much more. The character has to move around two-dimensional locations with a side view, periodically encountering dangerous monsters. It is necessary to illuminate dark areas on the map by lighting special candles. In the process of passing ANIMAL WELL, users have to explore the world, which consists of a large number of intricate riddles and labyrinths.

item.title: Little Kitty, Big City
item.description: Game Description Little Kitty, Big City will help you learn about all the difficulties that street cats face. Despite the fact that animals seem to people to be foolish and unable to live without humans, they have their own hierarchy, connections, and they support communication between species. Often, even dogs and cats team up for common survival or give advice to new recruits. The main character is a teenage black kitten who got lost in a big city and now has to urgently find his way home.

item.title: Rabbit and Steel
item.description: Game Description Rabbit and Steel is a co-op action roguelike that will take you into epic battles. Choose your class, gather your bunny friends and fight to the top of Moon Peak. Months ago, all ties with the Moonlight Kingdom were severed. It is reported that the city’s residents are attacking all newcomers. Exploratory expeditions are repulsed or go missing. Every night, a huge white tower appears in the center of the city, reaching towards the stars.

item.title: V Rising
item.description: Game Description Waking up inV Rising, the hero as a vampire must hunt for blood, while simultaneously avoiding direct sunlight. The survival slasher film puts you in the shoes of a bloodsucker who wakes up in his own castle and must regain his possession and authority while operating in a vast open world full of secrets. Here you have to conquer the lands of the living, unite with allies to complete the task.

item.title: Chrono Ark
item.description: Game Description Chrono Ark is a classic Japanese-style RPG adventure that supports high-resolution textures, but uses similar camera views and turn-based dialogue and battle system rendering. The story campaign is available for completion only in single-player mode; multiplayer is not provided in this project. The gameplay is based on gathering a team, which includes 4 characters, for further leveling up and creating an invincible squad, ready to fight on equal terms with all opponents presented in the locations of the bizarre Distorted World.

item.title: Footgun: Underground
item.description: Game Description Footgun: Underground throws you into a chaotic mix of football and roguelike action. You emerge from cryogenic sleep into a strange post-apocalyptic future, equipped with a cybernetic leg, a ball and amnesia. This underground world is infested with mutants, and your trusty ball is your only defense. Footgun: Underground offers a unique twist. Instead of swords, guns or magic, you rely solely on your ball skills. Think classic roguelike: explore procedurally generated rooms, fight a variety of creatures, and upgrade your gear.

item.title: Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition
item.description: Game Description Class of Heroes: Anniversary Edition puts you back in the shoes of a freshman at Particus Academy. This is not an easy school - you must assemble a team of students, carefully train them and choose the perfect class, skills and items to give them an advantage in the ferocious dungeons. Enemy hordes can be waiting for you around every corner, so strategic planning is vital. A good hero knows when to fight and when to cut his losses and run!

item.title: Manor Lords
item.description: Game Description Manor Lords is a strategy game set in the Middle Ages. The game mechanics center on the realistic process of constructing buildings and intense fights with the enemy army. The building element is based on historical data about cities and villages. All buildings presented in Manor Lords are as authentic as possible. Landscapes and types of terrain influence the process of settlement formation. Create trade routes, establish market relations with neighboring cities and promote the economic prosperity of the settlement.

item.title: MoonLight Pulse
item.description: Game Description MoonLight Pulse is an adventure action, the action of which takes place inside the biological systems of a colossal cosmic turtle. The player will send a team of healing agents in the surrealist world, protecting the arrangement of the alien parasites. The basis of the gameplay lies in instant switching between the heroes, which allows you to tactically apply their special movements and battle skills. The task will fail if at least one agent perish, but the members of the detachment can save each other out of dangerous situations.

item.title: Nordic ashes: Survivors of Ragnarok
item.description: Game Description Nordic ashes: survivors of ragnarok - Dynamic adventure with elements of action and simplified cuckle. The plot is inspired by Scandinavian legends and motives. The main character finds himself in a dangerous environment in which he will face hordes of enemy and deadly creatures. He needs to stay alive among hundreds of opponents and traps, gradually pumping his abilities and finding more powerful equipment. The central character will move between worlds, fight with powerful bosses, overcome traps and find objects of equipment.

item.title: POOLS
item.description: Game Description POOLS offers an unconventional gaming experience. Forget about blowing up aliens or conquering kingdoms. This is where exploration and atmosphere come to the fore. Imagine yourself in a huge, eerily empty water center. Sunlight barely breaks through the humid air, casting long shadows on the deserted tiled floor. The only sounds are your steps, reflected from the damp walls, and rare drops of water. There are no monsters or puzzles to overcome, just unsettling silence and frightening architecture.

item.title: Another Crab's Treasure
item.description: Game Description Another Crab’s Treasure is an exciting underwater adventure created by AGGRO CRAB. You take on the role of a hermit crab named Creel, who goes on a dangerous treasure hunt to get back his stolen shell. In this unique underwater kingdom, on the verge of destruction, garbage is not only part of life, but also a valuable resource used to create fashionable outfits and weapons. However, with the garbage comes a mysterious danger - “slurry” - which threatens to destroy the entire ocean.

item.title: Minicology
item.description: Game Description Minicology drops you into a universe of tiny planets after a crash landing. This interstellar survival sandbox features crafting, combat, and automation. Travel through a procedurally generated universe, visiting a variety of planetary clusters with unique biomes. Build a base, defend against invaders, and even change the planets themselves using terraforming. Minicology encourages creative problem solving, from growing crops to fighting enemies. Gather resources, automate processes, and protect your water source.

item.title: The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty
item.description: Game Description The Hungry Lamb: Traveling in the Late Ming Dynasty is a visual novel set in China during the turbulent reign of the Chongzhen Emperor. Players take on the role of Liang, a former merchant turned bandit tasked with escorting four girls to the prosperous city of Luoyang. The journey is fraught with danger and moral problems. Liang struggles with the truth behind his mission when one of the girls, Sui, reveals a terrifying secret: their goal is not a luxurious life, but an encounter with a monstrous pig demon.

item.title: Dead Island 2
item.description: Game Description Dead Island 2 is a continuation of the first-person zombie action game of the same name. The events of the game start a few months after the end of the first game. The virus has reached sunny California. The entire territory was cordoned off by US troops. Dead Island 2 includes many features that expand on the ideas of Left 4 Dead. The hero finds himself in the center of a zombie apocalypse and somehow miraculously survives.

item.title: No Rest for the Wicked
item.description: Game Description No Rest for the Wicked immerses players in a world ravaged by death and despair. Developed by Moon Studios, the creators of Ori and the Blind Forest, this action RPG promises challenging combat and deep human storytelling. The kingdom mourns the death of King Harol, leaving his untested son Magnus on the throne. Meanwhile, an ancient plague known as the Blight returns, corrupting the land and its inhabitants. Amid the chaos, Madrigal Celine, hungry for power in the church, seeks to use the crisis for his own selfish purposes.

item.title: Next Jianghu 2
item.description: Game Description Next Jianghu 2 offers a single-player adventure in an open martial arts world. The title emphasizes freedom of action through character development in a sandbox format, offering a plot of over 1 million words with dozens of possible endings. Gamers begin their journey by choosing one of a variety of unique backgrounds: scion of a general exploring the world, diligent scholar, wandering fighter, or young lady escaping an arranged marriage, with each line providing a significant, independent story.

item.title: Rauniot
item.description: Game Description Rauniot is an adventure quest presented in an old-school isometric perspective. Events take place in a post-apocalyptic alternative world of the past. Explore the mysterious lands of Northern Finland. In 1975, a large-scale disaster occurred that dealt a huge blow to civilization. Humanity has never recovered. Massive conflicts and wars have turned the once powerful human race into mere slaves of nature. The continents have been flooded by the oceans, and the remaining parts of the land are under poisonous waste from nuclear power plants.

item.title: The Planet Crafter
item.description: Game Description The main character ofThe Planet Crafter was sent to a hostile planet to make it suitable for human life. Alone, he will have to extract resources, use existing technologies, found a small settlement and develop technologies. In the future, it will be able to heat the planet and create an atmosphere with a normal amount of oxygen. This will help redirect a large part of the population to the new world.

item.title: Underspace
item.description: Game Description Underspace is an adventure action in the open world. The gameplay proposes to explore the open spaces of the open space, fighting with other combat shuttles, alien creatures, etc. Take the trading and pumping of your own ship. Openvorld Underspace is fully created manually. Each star system includes its own characteristics and biomes. You have to explore the galaxy called CROFT. You can go to the adventure as alone, so with friends.

item.title: The Lost Village
item.description: Game Description InThe Lost Village you have to restore a once great sect. You take on the role of the heir to a leader who has returned to an abandoned mountain and is tasked with restoring it to its former glory. The game combines a management simulator with roguelike elements. Gamers will guide students by collecting resources, building structures and cultivating the land. Students have unique personalities and talents, allowing assignments to be specialized.

item.title: Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures
item.description: Game Description Moorhuhn - Crazy Chicken Traps and Treasures is a fast-paced arcade adventure full of danger and ancient secrets, set in an impenetrable jungle. On the way to his cherished goal, the main character is confronted not only by ingenious traps, but also by a whole string of colorful opponents. The path is blocked by evil gorillas, ferocious crocodiles, mysterious shamans and even forest spirits, along with aliens stuck in the thicket.

item.title: SILENT BREATH
item.description: Game Description SILENT BREATH is a new survival game that takes gamers into a mysterious forest. Here, the unknown lurks around every corner, making exploration a tense and uncertain experience. Users take on the role of search engines tasked with finding missing people in this mysterious forest. The journey will not be a cakewalk; it requires strategic thinking and nerves of steel to overcome the challenges that lurk among the trees.

item.title: Quit Today
item.description: Game Description QUIT TODAY is a 2D sid-screen in the action genre with a setting of a corporate workplace. The plot starts on ordinary morning, when the central character enters the office and finds out that all colleagues are confident in his imminent dismissal. Employees perceive this as a betrayal and communicate with him. First, the hero fights off his portfolio, trying to figure out what is happening. Upon learning of the dark affairs in the company, he decides to break through all departments with a battle in order to submit an application for care.

item.title: Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy
item.description: Game Description Touhou Hero of Ice Fairy introduces the user to a fairy-tale universe inhabited by beautiful princesses, fairies, majestic heroes and, of course, very dangerous universal evil that is unable to leave the world alone. The main character is a warrior named Tuohou Cirno - he serves the very kind heir to the throne of Gansoke. She is such a bright person that even birds and butterflies dance around her when she goes out into nature.

item.title: Mouthole
item.description: Game Description Mouthole - adventure game combines the study elements with complex tasks, requiring navigation from confusing routes to open and unraveling secrets from gamers. The project will require people to manage temporary resources, while solving everyday problems. The fundamental prerequisite includes literal penetration into its own mouth. Inside, the Mouthole environment offers a variety of directions for the action of the user and their consequences. Individuals determine how to spend their limited time, choosing specific classes and research lines.

item.title: Saviorless
item.description: Game Description Saviorless is an impressive action-platformer set in a fantasy setting, featuring unique characters, beautiful hand-crafted graphics, and a gripping story. You will go on a difficult adventure to save your life on the mysterious and dangerous Smiling Islands. Immerse yourself in a world filled with mystery and darkness, where you will find incredible enemies and many mysteries to solve in order to survive. You will be able to enjoy stunning animation and an emotional soundtrack that will accompany you throughout your journey.

item.title: Content Warning
item.description: Game Description Content Warning throws players into the world of horror content creation. Team up with friends, create your own pixelated face using the in-game ASCII customizer, and grab your gear. Then descend into the spooky Old World using the diving bell. The Old World is crawling with creepy, physics-based monsters and cursed relics just waiting to be captured on camera. Capture as much creepy content as you can before you run out of oxygen, your camera dies, or worse, your friends become fodder for the monsters.

item.title: Carpathian Night Starring Bela Lugosi
item.description: Game Description In Transylvania, Carpathian Night Starring Bela Lugosi immerses in the world of 1451, captured by the army of Prince Dracula. The horde of zombies, werewolves and demonic creatures threatens to establish eternal night on Earth. To confront this darkness, two champions appear, ready to perform justice. Abbot Dorin, a monk-warrior, unites with Irina Dracula-a vampire-pyroman and a descendant of the very lord to whom they hunt. Their task is to drop the army of the dead and challenge Dracula in his own castle.

item.title: Knowledge, or know Lady
item.description: Game Description Knowledge, or know Lady throws you into the heart of a unique dating simulator. As the only guy at an all-girl university, you’ll find yourself caught up in a whirlwind of romance and college life. Will you succumb to the charms of the beauties around you or forge your own path to become a campus legend? Ladies School Prince unfolds through your eyes, offering a first-person perspective. Your

item.title: The Devil of Decline
item.description: Game Description The Devil of Decline is a traditional turn-based RPG set in the world of Gensokyo, where gamers can immerse themselves in a story filled with mystery and strategy. The title puts users in the shoes of one of the four main characters: Reimu, Yukari, Byakuren or Mailing. Each of these characters has a unique set of abilities and characteristics, which is very important as gamers go through a series of increasingly difficult challenges.

item.title: AutoForge
item.description: Game Description In AutoForge, you will find yourself in the shoes of Otto, a magical golem awakened in a desert world.
