Your former masters have left, leaving you with a big question mark and a vast, unexplored land. But don’t be afraid, Otto! This is not just a sandbox adventure. AutoForge will allow you to unleash your inner factory master. Build a humming network of mana-eating machines, automate your production process, and mine resources at breakneck speed.

item.title: Rise of Gun
item.description: Game Description Rise of Gun invites gamers to immerse themselves in a post-apocalyptic world where survival depends not only on finding food or fighting zombies, but also on the ability to create weapons from garbage. After a global epidemic turns most of humanity into mindless undead, the protagonist, having lost everything, sets off on a journey to find other survivors. Along the way, he stumbles upon a settlement in which there is hope for the restoration of civilization.

item.title: Dragon's Dogma 2
item.description: Game Description Dragon’s Dogma 2 takes players on a single-player adventure, immersing them in an action-packed action RPG where choices define the path. Players are encouraged to customize their experience, from the appearance of their Arisen to strategic decisions in combat and party composition. Throughout the quest, players are accompanied by pawns - mysterious creatures that simulate the multiplayer experience of a single-player adventure, enriching the gameplay with a variety of perspectives.

item.title: Momo and the Mine
item.description: Game Description Momo and the Mine sends a mole-protagonist to a dangerous, abandoned network of dungeons for collecting matches. The player will have to conduct a character through a series of difficult jumping tests, where accuracy is the key to survival. The gameplay requires accurate movement through the hostile surroundings filled with ghosts of tunnels. Success directly depends on mastering responsive controls to overcome each obstacle in the dilapidated structure of the mine, which creates a constant test of skill.

item.title: Horizon Forbidden West
item.description: Game Description Horizon Forbidden West – continuation of the adventures of the hunter Aloy, from the Nora tribe. In this part, the heroine finds herself on the coast of the former United States, where she will encounter new obstacles and deadly machines. You will have to use your bow and your ward’s abilities to confront your opponents and find out the secret of the islands. Watching Aloy from a third person, the user navigates the open world, completing main and side quests.

item.title: Scott Whiskers in: the Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw
item.description: Game Description Scott Whiskers in: the Search for Mr. Fumbleclaw is a point-and-click adventure game based on the adventures of cat and science fiction lover Scott Whiskers. The story begins with the mysterious disappearance of Mr. Fumbleclave, a distinguished cat who is scheduled to compete in an upcoming feline beauty contest. This situation prompts Scott to go on a quest, during which he passes through various locations, each of which has its own characteristics.

item.title: Lightyear Frontier
item.description: Game Description Lightyear Frontier offers farming in a completely open world. In the farmer simulator, you are asked to explore the planet, create your own home, upgrade your transport, growing various non-standard types of plants in order to provide yourself with resources. Multiplayer is implemented here with a capacity of up to 4 gamers. The game has a well-developed storyline, where you will learn about the mysterious past of the world by studying the ruins of buildings created by unknown creatures.

item.title: Barbotine
item.description: Game Description Barbotine is an experimental horror, the plot of which tells the story of the creepy seven-day transformation of the protagonist. After an unfortunate incident at a party, the hero falls ill and his body begins to undergo grotesque changes. In parallel with the physical mutations, the surrounding reality is also distorted: the familiar apartment becomes an increasingly strange and hostile place every day. Surreal visual images and a disturbing atmosphere plunge you into a state of increasing anxiety, making you feel alienated from your own body and the world around you.

item.title: Between the Stars
item.description: Game Description In Between the Stars, a space simulator, the gamer discovers new territories, fights with numerous opponents and upgrades his own ship. The hero’s goal is to save the Interstellar Republic. The game has procedural generation of the environment, enemies and stations. The protagonist’s universe is suffering from attacks from the Children of the Sun clan. Enemy representatives have appeared from other worlds and are trying to capture these spaces.

item.title: KeepUp Survival
item.description: Game Description KeepUp Survival is a realistic survival simulator set on a long-abandoned island. The main characters, brother and sister, traveled with the crew on a large ship transporting containers. As a result of a storm, the ship is in distress and the protagonists are thrown ashore, after which they lose consciousness. Then one of them disappears, and the second must be found. But the task is not so simple, because the island is teeming with dangers.

item.title: The Outlast Trials
item.description: Game Description The Outlast Trials - first-person horror game in the Outlast universe. The difference from the main series is that you can play both alone and in a company. At the center of the story is the Murkoff company, which is engaged in inhumane and sadistic experiments. You will play as one of these crazy organizations. You can join forces with up to 4 people and try to survive this nightmare together.

item.title: Secrets of Grindea
item.description: Game Description Secrets of Grindea is an interesting adventure game in which you will need to take control of a hero and go on a long journey through a huge fantasy world in search of new adventures. The game begins with character generation. You will have to create it, change its appearance using an advanced editor, and then decide on the basic skills. After this, you can begin to explore the world around you.

item.title: Sons of the Forest
item.description: Game Description Sons of The Forest is a first-person multiplayer horror game with survival elements. The game is a sequel to the acclaimed hit The Forest. As in the previous part, you need to explore a mysterious forest inhabited by bloodthirsty monsters. Survive by hiding from enemies and carefully study the surrounding areas. Arm yourself with powerful weapons to face numerous opponents. The story centers on a special forces soldier with a Fight Demons tattoo.

item.title: Last Epoch
item.description: Game Description Last Epoch is an action-adventure game with a deep leveling system in a dark style, gameplay repeating the legendary Diablo. The camera view is also taken from there, it is isometric for a better overview of the surrounding areas. The story campaign for one person (multiplayer is not provided) invites you to explore the rich world of Eterra, with various picturesque places and dark dungeons. It contains many different oddities, secrets, many demons and other fiends of hell.

item.title: Myth of Empires
item.description: Game Description The goal ofMyth of Empires is to teach the user to fight for their own place in a huge world. The game is positioned as a multiplayer sandbox in which the user creates an Empire, forming troops that participate in massive battles and sieges of cities, and also builds their own fortresses for defense. The action takes place in the East during the era of antiquity, when many states constantly fought among themselves, which led to chaos, famine and destruction.

item.title: Pacific Drive
item.description: Game Description Pacific Drive is an atmospheric car survival adventure in the Olympic Exclusion Zone. Here you will not find the usual racing tracks, but there will be supernatural dangers waiting for you that will make you very tense. The only chance of salvation is your car, which will have to be strengthened and improved throughout the game. You will have to look for resources in abandoned laboratories, set up a base in the garage, research new spare parts and construct new stations.

item.title: Fossilfuel 2
item.description: Game Description Fossilfuel 2 throws players into a flooded research center in Alaska, teeming with prehistoric predators. Jack Allen, a participant in the ill -fated expedition, must pave his way through dangerous puzzles, flooded tunnels and frightening darkness. Armed with the arsenal of deadly weapons, gamers pave their way through dinosaurs in terrible details on the Unreal Engine 5 engine. Equipment for underwater swimming becomes necessary when players plunge into underwater sections, confronts water threats along with their ground colleagues.

item.title: Nightingale
item.description: Game Description Nightingale takes you on a dangerous journey through the fantastical kingdoms of the fairies. As a Realmwalker, you’ll explore, craft, build, and fight across a variety of environments, alone or with friends. This open world survival game takes you through a labyrinth of beautiful but treacherous kingdoms. Stranded after the destruction of a network of portals, you must reach Nightingale, the last human bastion. Open portals and travel through wild forests, treacherous swamps and shimmering deserts.

item.title: Medieval Machines Builder
item.description: Game Description Medieval Machines Builder transfers players to the era of constant siege, where their innovative valor is their greatest weapon. As a novice ballistic engineer, you must develop a concept, collect resources and build the most powerful and destructive machines known in the Medieval War. The fate of many conquered castles will depend on the effectiveness of these devices. You start from scratch, but as your inventions come true and prove their effectiveness in battle, you get experience.

item.title: Nexus Defenders
item.description: Game Description Nexus Defenders involves deploying a varied arsenal of towers to stop invading enemy forces. The player augments these stationary fortifications with special abilities such as napalm strikes, EMP blasts, and orbital lasers. Real-time tactical action combined with a visual novel structure. By making decisions in branching dialogues, you can directly influence the development of the plot and its central conflicts, thereby shaping the further course of the narrative. The story of Nexus Defenders follows a newly minted captain tasked with protecting the planet after the Spinal Nexus is suddenly compromised.

item.title: Blaz Blue Entropy Effect
item.description: Game Description BlazBlue Entropy Effect is a 2D adventure game set in the BlazBlue universe, but with a different genre and style than previous fighting games. It features roguelite elements such as procedurally generated maps, permadeath, and character customization. There is also a rich plot with several endings depending on the choice of the gamer. In the game you can choose one of seven unique characters, each of which has its own abilities and character.

item.title: Smalland: Survive the Wilds
item.description: Game Description InSmalland: Survive the Wilds the player takes on the role of a hero who has been diminished under unexplained circumstances. The protagonist woke up in the forest, not knowing whether other people had the same fate. With a head full of questions, he begins a struggle whose goal is not only to find out the truth, but, above all, to survive in a new inhospitable world. The player watches what is happening from the first person.

item.title: Skibidi Toilets: Invasion
item.description: Game Description Skibidi Toilets: Invasion throws you into a whirlwind of cyborg toilet chaos. Play as a secret agent armed with an arsenal of weapons tasked with quelling a toilet rebellion. Unleash your fury in seven diverse environments, from desolate cityscapes to chilling graveyards, each presenting unique strategic challenges. Welcome to a world where porcelain turns into brawl. This exciting FPS will pit you against rebel toilets, each of which has more firepower than a regular toilet plunger.

item.title: Tomb Raider I-III Remastered Starring Lara Croft
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider 1-3 Remastered Starring Lara Croft is a nostalgic gift for adventure game fans, which contains the original adventures of the legendary Lara Croft. The set includes the first three parts with all the extras and secret levels, now updated with improved graphics and performance, allowing players to seamlessly switch between classic and modern visuals. Join the main character on a journey around the world in search of ancient artifacts and unraveling secrets, encountering enemies, puzzles and challenges that require players to have acrobatic skills and mastery of weapons.

item.title: Airhead
item.description: Game Description Airhead differs from other metroidvanias in that you have to play with two creatures at once. The plot is told through silent cutscenes. The body falls into the abyss and ends up in the caves. A mysterious humanoid, while exploring a dungeon, suddenly finds a dying head after being attacked by a machine. And not simple, but airy and living separately. He teams up with her and becomes Airhead.

item.title: Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost
item.description: Game Description Touhou Danmaku Kagura Phantasia Lost is a rhythm -game built on the foundation of his predecessor. Two different rhythm games have to be passed: traditional and innovative. In Kagura, players check their skills in repulsing the fingers of notes, sequentially hitting six paths. Combinations accumulate with each successful press, which leads to high points. This mode presents more than 160 popular arrangements at four levels of complexity, which will allow you to cope with the task of both beginners and experienced rhythm veterans.

item.title: Legendary Hoplite
item.description: Game Description Legendary Hoplite uses a setting inspired by Greek mythology. The project has its own history, lore and secrets that are revealed as you earn achievements. In the story, Odysseus, who returned from Troy, did not rule Ithaca for long, because he was killed by his own illegitimate son. After this, the city-state was besieged by legions of the dead. Dio volunteered to defend the policy. The young commander can build objects, summon units, use ordinary equipment and use artifacts blessed by the ancient gods themselves.

item.title: Chushpan simulator
item.description: Game Description The chushpan simulator puts you in the place of an ordinary guy in Uryupinsk. It’s not a life of luxury - you start out squalid in a shabby apartment and forced to hustle to make ends meet. But you are determined to climb the social ladder, one way or another. The game unfolds through a branching quest line that takes you through various locations. Every choice you make - moral or not - determines your destiny.

item.title: Granblue Fantasy: Relink
item.description: Game Description Granblue Fantasy: Relink - an adventure in the vastness of the Heavenly Kingdom, where islands soar among the vast azure expanses. As the captain of a skyship, you’ll embark on a journey full of mystery, magic and camaraderie. Together with your faithful companions, such as the energetic dragon Virn and the mysterious Lyria, you will go to Estalucia - a mythical island shrouded in legends. You have to assemble a team of four people, which will include a variety of sky wanderers who own unique weapons and fighting styles.

item.title: GU LONG FENGYUN LU
item.description: Game Description GU LONG FENGYUN LU is a massive martial arts RPG based on the classic works of Gu Long, the famous Chinese writer. The plot tells about the turbulent times of the end of the Ming Dynasty, when various heroes and factions fought for power and glory. The main character is Feng Yun, a young martial artist traveling across the country, encountering friends, enemies, love, hate, loyalty and betrayal.

item.title: Corsairs Legacy - Pirate Action RPG and Sea Battles
item.description: Game Description Corsaires Legacy - Pirate Action RPG and Sea Battles is a pirate adventure in the open world, which makes it possible to become a real corsar, exploring the seas and oceans, as well as fighting with numerous enemies both on land and at sea. Events develop on Barbados. Playing for an adventurer, it is required to become not only a thunderstorm of the seas, but also a whole tropical archipelago.

item.title: Murders on the Yangtze River
item.description: Game Description Murders on the Yangtze River takes you to early 20th century China. Think “Ace Attorney” and historical detective. Channel your inner Sherlock Holmes as you unravel a series of mysterious cases along the banks of the legendary Yangtze River. Step into the shoes of John Shen, a law student turned detective. Grief and a thirst for justice force him to return to China after his brother’s mysterious death is ruled a suicide.

item.title: Twilight Oracle
item.description: Game Description Twilight Oracle invites users to embark on a whimsical journey of adventure and discovery. This point-and-click fantasy comedy game puts users in the shoes of Leo, a student with an unusual talent for underwater breathing. As Leo, the quest begins on a desert island, gradually uncovering layers of secrets surrounding his school’s hidden past. The action takes place in a richly detailed world that offers a combination of exploration and puzzle solving.

item.title: A night at the Watermill
item.description: Game Description A Night at the Watermill represents to gamers a narrative experience unfolding in an old water mill. Waking up, the players find themselves in an unfamiliar environment, fighting amnesia about their arrival. The task is to navigate in space, solve puzzles and collect a plot line that connects the protagonist with a water mill. Each interaction reveals more information about the circumstances of the character’s life and the secrets surrounding him.

item.title: Rogue Fable IV
item.description: Game Description Rogue Fable IV is the latest installment in the long-running rogue series. This iteration manages to strike a balance between complexity and brevity, offering gamers a focused yet deep experience. The goal is simple: navigate the Dungeons of Fate, a dangerous labyrinth full of traps, enemies and secrets, in pursuit of the legendary Cup of Yendor. This cup, a coveted artifact, is believed to grant immortality or drive madness to those who seek it.

item.title: Underdogs
item.description: Game Description Underdogs - this is the Title in virtual reality, in which gamers fall into the very heart of the gloomy Cyberpanovsky world, where the fight of the furs reigns. The project does not hold back itself, pushing you with fierce enemies in cruel contractions. From the very first minutes, gamers plunge into the world of risk, where every step can mean the difference between life and death. Here you need to not just fight, but survive in conditions when the danger lurks around every angle.

item.title: Anomaly Agent
item.description: Game Description Anomaly Agent is a fast-paced 2D action platformer that places players in the heart of a bustling cyberpunk metropolis. As the titular character, Anomaly, players take on the role of an agent on a mission to investigate and eliminate temporary anomalies wreaking havoc on the city. The narrative unfolds gradually, revealing a complex web of interconnected areas with their own unique challenges and mysteries. At the core of Anomaly Agent’s appeal is its innovative combat system, which relies on Anomaly’s unique ability to manipulate time.

item.title: Enshrouded
item.description: Game Description Enshrouded is an exciting game set in the kingdom of Embervale, taking players on an exciting journey through a land once devastated by a devastating magical plague. The user will have to explore the remnants of the lost kingdom, fight mutated creatures and unravel the mysterious secrets of the ancient Flame. One of the distinctive features of the project is the emphasis on the independence of the hero.

item.title: Stargate: Timekeepers
item.description: Game Description The events of the Stargate: Timekeepers project take place within a separate universe called SG-1. It all begins with the Battle of Antarctica, where Commander Eve McKine leads the battle against Anubis' fleet. After this, the user will be able to take control of a squad subordinate to this very Eve in order to penetrate behind enemy lines and complete a number of dangerous tasks. The outcome of the war depends on this, so no one has the right to make a mistake.

item.title: UltraNothing
item.description: Game Description UltraNothing is about a philosophical journey to a state of absolute peace called divine nothingness, and getting rid of the metaphorical noise. The project challenges conventional ideas about the genre, organically combining elements of platforming and deep strategic planning. It’s all about solving puzzles, where the end goal is often to get a specific item to a terminal. Gradually, the mechanics of turn-based command of units, construction of structures, and even survival in an abstract environment are integrated into the gameplay.

item.title: Palworld
item.description: Game Description Palworld offers you to find and use friends as helpers in a huge and dangerous world. The multiplayer survival game has elements of crafting, and the creatures themselves, discovered by the user in the process, become his pet friends, which help him at all stages of the passage, including the ability to move on them, construct buildings, engage in farming, production, and explore dungeons. The user finds himself in a virtual universe inhabited by bizarre animal creatures, which in this world are simply called Friends.

item.title: House Builder
item.description: Game Description House Builder begins with a monologue about how a person must do three things in life: plant a tree, conceive a son, and build a house. In the gameplay you cannot grow plants and have children, but the main character is able to build countless houses, mansions or other establishments. The player will play the role of a builder and will build houses: typical African huts or ultra-modern architectural wonders.

item.title: Winter Memories
item.description: Game Description Winter Memories invites players to once again join Yui, Rio and Miyuki, the trio who created unforgettable summer moments just six months ago. As the seasons change and the snow melts, a new chapter opens in your story. Rediscover a serene coastal village and reconnect with loved ones during this cold season. The past gives rise to the present, but what new experiences await you this winter? Winter Memories is the sequel to the 2020 game Summer Memories, developed by Dojin Otome.

item.title: Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout
item.description: Game Description Dino Hazard: Chronos Blackout - an adventure action in which a group of people falls on a tropical island equipped with high -tech objects. The territory is governed by AI, which produces a huge number of combat robots and artificially nurtures of dinosaurs. The game is made in the Cyberpanus setting and contains elements of metroid. Once on the island, it must be examined by opening the results of a monstrous experiment.

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description: Game Description Ready or Not is a tactical shooter that positions itself as a special forces simulator. The project is designed for fans of SWAT 4. The creators tried to focus on realism and cruelty. The game has single player, co-op and PvP. The main gameplay consists of conducting a special operation within the campaign or individual missions. Before you begin, you need to listen to the briefing, study the map of the building, decide on points for the assault and select equipment.

item.title: HunterX: code name T
item.description: Game Description HunterX: code name T is an action-adventure game in which players take on the role of Tayo, a devil hunter who is destined to hunt devils and unravel his own identity. The game features fast and stylish combat mechanics in which players use a variety of weapons and magical abilities to destroy enemies, creating a fast-paced and fun experience. The dynamics of the battle are simply breathtaking. Responsive controls allow players to easily create combos and perform special moves, enhancing the thrill of battle.

item.title: Arizona Sunshine 2
item.description: Game Description Arizona Sunshine 2, the anticipated sequel to the VR sensation, is set to deliver a whirlwind of blood, guts and laughter. As you set foot in the post-apocalyptic landscape of Arizona, the undead, affectionately known as Freds, lurk around every corner and resources are in short supply. To navigate this world, you will have to test your wits and skill while fighting hordes of zombies. But don’t be afraid, because you won’t be wandering the wasteland alone.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Rogue Trader is an isometric role -playing game made based on the cult universe of a fighting hammer. In her setting, the Grimard is mixed with science fiction. This product offers to travel through space on a huge ship, visit different places, chat with colorful non -pains, pump, perform quests, participate in battles. All the battles here are step -by -step and tactical. They are divided into 2 types.

item.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley
item.description: Game Description Disney Dreamlight Valley is a life simulator with adventure elements. Title is designed for fans and fans of Disney cartoons. He is replete with references and fanservice. Moreover, Walt Disney is not limited to the brainchild of Walt. The project can also please the fans of the Pixar studio. The character editor allows you to create a hero or heroine and go on a trip. Your protagonist can be customized.

item.title: Soulash 2
item.description: Game Description Soulash 2 is an intriguing RPG in which you step into the shoes of an exiled god seeking revenge. The expansive procedurally generated world is a playground replete with simulated history, a dynamic economy, and a huge number of races, factions, and creatures just waiting to be interacted with. The power to conquer and rebuild this world lies in the hands of the player, who wields divine powers and abilities.

item.title: Svarog's Dream
item.description: Game Description Svarog’s Dream stands out as a fascinating RPG that immerses the intriguing depths of the underground world. Appearing as a soul looking for themselves, players travel around a huge open world, solving personal secrets and moving through the constantly changing landscapes that determine this mysterious kingdom. A diverse environment varies from lush forests to towering mountains, desert plains and noisy cities. Each location is unique trials and awards, prompting the players to go in search and reveal secrets hidden in every corner.

item.title: Tunnet
item.description: Game Description Tunnet offers a unique gaming experience. Its core mechanics differ significantly from traditional games. Gamers move through a digital space devoid of familiar landmarks. The lack of clear goals forces introspection. This minimalist approach invites exploration rather than dictates direction. The world is unfolding gradually. Every interaction, every piece of the puzzle contributes to the overall tapestry. The title resists linear progression. Instead, users create their own paths.

item.title: TEVI
item.description: Game Description TEVI is a fun 2D platformer that combines various gameplay elements such as Metroidvania, bullet hell and spectacular action. The action takes place in a vast interconnected world, which is characterized by conflicts and strife. As the protagonist, you have to explore this place and discover the secrets hidden in it. A vast cast of characters is featured, including angels, demons and adorable big-eared animals. You can upgrade your equipment and collect new ones to expand your capabilities.

item.title: Below The Stone
item.description: Game Description Below The Stone is an exciting indie game that immerses in the depths of the mysterious kingdom. Taking the role of a brave gnome, the user will go to insidious searches for rare resources, reveal ancient secrets and create formidable equipment. However, it is worthwhile to beware of dangers that are in wait for as an adventurer descends further into the abyss. Covering more than 25 different biomes that differ in visual and design, the project offers a variety of enemies, treasures and dangers in each area.

item.title: Astral ascent
item.description: Game Description Astral Ascent transfers gamers to the modern phenetesic world, where everything looks completely different from in reality. Here, the main characters were imprisoned in an astral prison called the garden. At first glance, it seems that cute lawns and paths do not conceal anything dangerous in themselves, but in reality this is not so. There are 12 strong bosses called zodiacs as guards. Moreover, at every step there will be small enemies that can deliver a lot of trouble.

item.title: SUPER CRAZY RHYTHM CASTLE
item.description: Game Description SUPER CRAZY RHYTHM CASTLE will take you to a bizarre world filled with absurdity and frivolity. The mission is clear: defeat the eccentric King Ferdinand and restore rhythmic order to the kingdom. The game features a motley crew of unlikely heroes who must overcome bizarre challenges. From launching beans in an ancient summoning ritual to drowning out a colossal eggplant DJ and smearing gravy on tiny meat people - all while keeping the beat - the journey is a surreal mixture of music and adventure.

item.title: Cuisineer
item.description: Game Description Cuisineer is a delightful mix of dungeon crawling, cooking, and restaurant management that takes you into the captivating story of Pom, an energetic adventurer who must save her family’s diner in Paella. Armed with her culinary skills, she travels beyond her hometown, engaging in culinary battles with monsters and collecting ingredients to prepare delicious dishes for her visitors. Offering a variety of culinary adventures with an extensive repertoire of over 100 recipes spanning the globe, from savory Popiah rolls to sweet Kaya jam and crispy chicken delicacies.

item.title: Of Blades and Tails
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric adventures in Of Blades and Tails take gamers into a fantasy world where the main character is a sly fox. The game is made in the genre of role-playing adventure, which is drawn in old-school pixel graphics. A cunning and savvy fox named Riff sets off on a long journey due to the events that have occurred that affected his native clan and other inhabitants of the kingdom living in the territory of a large state.

item.title: Polylithic
item.description: Game Description Polylithic takes players into the heart of the Paleolithic/Neolithic era, where survival depends on cunning, resourcefulness and ingenuity. As the newly minted leader of your tribe, you’ll face the daunting task of leading your people through a vibrant, low-poly wilderness teeming with both opportunity and danger. You will spend the first days in a frantic struggle for survival. Hunger gnaws at your belly, the elements threaten your fragile existence, and every rustle in the underbrush can attract a predator.

item.title: SANABI
item.description: Game Description SANABI is a pixel action game with retro style and unique locations. The game takes place in the distant future, where cybernetic prosthetics have become the norm, even if the person has not lost a limb. After all, they can be equipped with various useful technical devices and overcome human abilities. But it has also become a convenient opportunity for criminals to gain easy access to sophisticated weapons.

item.title: Redgar: The Space Viking
item.description: Game Description Redgar: The Space Viking places the player in a setting that combines elements from different time periods. The character navigates castle-like starships and neon fortresses from above. This universe is an alternate history where futuristic technology and medieval aesthetics coexist. The action takes place over a series of levels, including spaceship corridors and dungeons. The main activity is to navigate these locations and confront hostile inhabitants. Combat encounters in Redgar: The Space Viking offer straightforward method choices.

item.title: Living Cell
item.description: Game Description Living Cell is a dark adventure game with survival elements that immerses you in the atmosphere of Samosbor - a dystopian world where residents live in endless apartment buildings called “Gigahrushchevkas”. In this exciting story, you will take the place of the liquidator, who is entrusted with the responsibility of maintaining order and security in the quarter. At the beginning of the story, players find themselves the only survivors in block G-326 after a mysterious incident.

item.title: The Elephant Collection
item.description: Game Description The Elephant Collection is a collection that features the blue elephant in ten different games. These adventure games span a variety of genres, including puzzle platformers and fast-paced arcade games. Gamers are faced with various mechanics, each of which offers its own set of obstacles and challenges. An overarching narrative runs throughout the collection, tying the individual adventures together and creating a cohesive experience for those who immerse themselves in the game.

item.title: Ebenezer and the Invisible World
item.description: Game Description Ebenezer and the Invisible World lets you take on the role of one Ebenezer Scrooge, the once miserly character from Charles Dickens' timeless classic A Christmas Carol. Featuring breathtaking handcrafted artwork, this 2D metroidvania transports you to a reimagined Victorian fantasy world. In this enchanting world, Scrooge transforms from a miser into an unlikely hero. The story takes place in steampunk London, dominated by wealthy industrialist Caspar Malthus and his formidable personal guard.

item.title: Achilles: Legends Untold
item.description: Game Description In Achilles: Legends Untold, users are included in the image of the famous mythological character, which goes to the next fateful adventure. This time, Achilles is in the center of the conflict between Aid and Ares. Its main goal is to defeat phobos - the child of the god of war. But this does not mean that he himself will come and offer to converge in the battle. To find it, you will have to go a long way, faced with the most dangerous and vile creatures that have ever existed on Earth.

item.title: Magicraft
item.description: Game Description Magicraft throws you into a world overrun by ancient gods. As a lone hero, you wield a legendary staff - your only hope for salvation. This roguelike focuses on spells that can be combined to create devastating effects. The developers themselves admit that the number of possibilities exceeds their own imagination! The game world is strange and whimsical, filled with unusual creatures and riddled with a ridiculous plot. Magicraft doesn’t take itself too seriously, but rather offers a light-hearted adventure with an emphasis on fun and flashy combat.

item.title: You Will Die Here Tonight
item.description: Game Description You Will Die Here Tonight is an action role-playing game with turn-based elements. Finding yourself in a mysterious mansion, you will have to face the real horror of the estate. You Will Die Tonight is a chilling horror film made in the spirit of the original Resident Evil parts. Face evil spirits in the depths of an ancient estate and try to get out of the mansion alive.

item.title: Mining Mechs
item.description: Game Description Mining Mechs invites players to the intriguing world, where they take control of the latest mining fur and reveal their inner world of Shakhtar. The game allows you to plunge into the depths of the underground subsoil, extract valuable resources and modernize your fur for more significant extraction. Regardless of whether you prefer single adventures or joint actions, up to 7 friends can participate in the network multiplayer cooperative game.

item.title: Peaks of Yore
item.description: Game Description Peaks of Yore is an exciting action-adventure game that immerses you in the complex world of mountaineering. Set in 1887, at a time when mountaineering was in its infancy and craze, it offers a unique experience for anyone who embarks on a virtual climb. Players explore the breathtaking landscapes of the Great Gauls, a region reminiscent of the majestic Alps. Here they meet fellow climbers who share their desire for adventure and conquering peaks.

item.title: Visco Collection
item.description: Game Description Visco Collection presents 7 arcade titles from the 1980s and 1990s. This collection contains projects of several genres, including Shoot ‘Em Up, fighting, sports and racing. The presented software supports single and local multiplayer modes for competitive or joint passage. Each Title demonstrates the special style of the arcade gameplay of that time with unique goals and mechanics that players have to study. The Visco Collection contains Andro Dunos-Side-Squash Shoot ‘Em Up, which encounters you with elaboration ships and large-scale bosses.

item.title: Black Lily's Tale
item.description: Game Description Black Lily’s Tale is a story about feelings torn apart by the noose of tragedy. The story revolves around a girl whose love for another student on the eve of graduation turns into a series of bitter events. The early black lily’s curse forces her to experience misfortunes over and over again, testing her pure intentions. The only way to break this vicious circle is to directly intervene in the narrative fabric, changing the intended course of things.

item.title: Dark Envoy
item.description: Game Description The role strategy Dark Envoy offers to go to the world of tactical battles with a deep history. Actions take place in a fictional dimension, where the empire of people fights against the ancient races. In this war there is no good and evil, but only dark magic and mystical technologies. In all this chaos, Cale and Kayros are trying to prove themselves. They repair the parent ship and fly out in search of treasures.

item.title: Slay the Princess
item.description: Game Description Slay the Princess is a dark and daring adventure that will put your skills to the ultimate test, combining the genres of psychological horror and dating simulator. Your mission is simple: kill the princess and save the world from destruction. But don’t be fooled by her charms and promises. She will stop at nothing to stop you from completing your task. Make your way through the dense forest and find the hut at the end of the path.

item.title: Farmer's Life
item.description: Game Description The main character Farmer’s Life was Kashmir - a middle -aged bachelor living in the outback of Eastern Europe. It contains a small farm and is often applied to the bottle. The realism of what is happening does not end there. The character of the character is affected by the change of seasons and wild animals. Help Kashmir cultivate the land and survive in a harsh environment. Perform the hero’s natural needs, making sure that he is always fed, filled and laid to sleep.

item.title: Out of Orbit
item.description: Game Description Out of Orbit offers space experience, focused on the liberty of the player in accidentally created universes. Gamers design, build and command their own starships, or can attack, disassemble or capture the vessels of others. People base planetary bases to expand the influence and extraction of materials. The actions of the gamer affect the game world and have long -term consequences. Any ship met can be taken on boarding and destroyed.

item.title: Alaskan Road Truckers
item.description: Game Description ALASKAN ROAD TRUCKERS - A car simulator in which you will become a driver of huge trucks, being a trucker in snowy Alaska. Call a challenge of one of the most severe and dangerous environments that could only be in such simulators. Test your strength and try to survive in a harsh environment. At the same time, you will have the opportunity to see the stunning beauty of this northern region.

item.title: Kona 2: Brume
item.description: Game Description Kona 2: Brume sees how, in the harsh conditions of Northern Quebec in 1970, a close-knit mining community becomes enveloped in an inexplicable and eerie phenomenon known as Brume. As you delve into the game’s twisted narrative, you take on the role of detective Carl Fobert, tasked with unraveling the mysterious origins of the mysterious fog. Your path takes you through a snowy landscape marred by the aftermath of a devastating avalanche, where you will encounter both unconscious victims and survivors.

item.title: Empty Shell
item.description: Game Description Empty Shell will send you to the very heart of a dark and dangerous industrial environment at a secret facility on the Japanese island. You have to perform a “recovery operation”, which you know a little about, but this is only the beginning. You will find yourself at an object that was abandoned for decades, but something is wrong in it. Solve dark secrets, dig in the documents and magazines of the 1950s and find out the stories of the people who worked there.

item.title: Mosa Lina
item.description: Game Description Mosa Lina challenges the established rules of the immersive sim genre, where the tools often directly correspond to the obstacles. This title uses deliberate randomization, meaning there is no predetermined way to progress through the hand-crafted stages. Gamers move through these locations with the task of collecting fruit, which opens a portal to the exit, but the means of achieving the goal are not predetermined. The gameplay forces improvisation, relying on unpredictable elements and physical interactions.

item.title: Lords of the Fallen
item.description: Game Description Lords of the Fallen invites gamers to the gloomy world of Fantasy, where you will become one of the legendary dark crusaders and will fight against the Demon of Adira. Lords of the Fallen is an epic adventure in a vast territory, which is five times more than the world of the original game. Adir tormented the country for many centuries, and now it needs to be overthrown again.

item.title: Athos
item.description: Game Description Athos is an immersion into the harsh realities of survival in a wild and dangerous world. Finding themselves in an unpredictable environment, migrants are forced to create living conditions from scratch. The construction of a fortified outpost from available materials, such as stone and wood, becomes a priority task for protection from aggressive fauna. To counter threats, you must constantly learn new skills and collect blueprints that allow you to create more advanced weapons and armor.

item.title: Midnight Girl
item.description: Game Description Midnight Girl is a point-and-click adventure. The game takes place in France in the mid-1960s. Its history, atmosphere and stylistic decisions originate in the city of Paris, and are also influenced by Belgian comics and cinema of the sixties. Gamers are immersed in this narrative primarily through investigation and exploration of the environment within a 2D side-scrolling perspective. Midnight Girl is available for single player playthrough on mobile platforms, computers and console systems.

item.title: Saleblazers
item.description: Game Description Saleblazers offers to enjoy the exciting experience of survival in the multiplayer action, in which you have to create a store and survive in a dangerous world filled with various dangers. On this dangerous island you will have to build cozy cafes or huge shopping centers in the company with other players. The whole world of the game is a reactive sandbox, where each buyer has his own character, tastes and preferences.

item.title: Super Buff HD
item.description: Game Description Super Buff HD is a high-octane shooter that plunges you into a world of absurdity, where battles with bizarre bosses await. The player will have to overcome a tower with sculpted biceps, crush a sword-wielding garbage can titan, or turn a mushroom king into mince with a belly-fall attack. To combat this madness, an arsenal is available, including a rotating potato cannon with basketball bombs and a hammer that invariably returns to the hands after a throw.

item.title: Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos
item.description: Game Description Harvest Moon: The Winds of Anthos invites you to embark on an exciting journey through the enchanting world of Anthos. From the very beginning, you’ll be introduced to the quirky inventor Doc Jr. and a host of other characters who will become your companions on this adventure. What is your task? Revive the dormant Harvest Goddess and the Harvest Sprites, and reunite the scattered villages of Antos. Antos was once a tranquil kingdom under the watchful eye of the benevolent Goddess of the Harvest and her faithful Sprites.

item.title: Rus against lizards
item.description: Game Description Rus vs. Lizards is a game in which users go on a journey to Ancient Rus' - a world plagued by an invasion of lizards and unholy creatures. In this epic adventure, you take on the role of a blessed hero, charged with the sacred duty of protecting the holy places of the Ancestors from the green plague. In the game you will find intense battles with hordes of lizards and other evil spirits, in which you will be able to show your heroic strength in the name of the Ancestors.

item.title: El Paso, Elsewhere
item.description: Game Description El Paso, Elsewhere immerses players in dynamic shootings with werewolves, vampires and other evil spirits that make his way to the surface of the planet. Events transfer to the territory of a small Texas settlement under the name El Passes, where he will have to fight terrible opponents. The main character finds himself in a small three -story hotel hiding the secret deep underground. Players will have to go down to dark basements to go through 46 combat missions and destroy hellish creatures.

item.title: Payday 3
item.description: Game Description Payday 3 - The second continuation of the original multiplayer game dedicated to the life of robbers and their sorties to dangerous crimes for making money and respect in gang circles, an analogue of levels from other projects. By increasing authority, new types of weapons and customization items will be unlocked, allowing you to create a unique appearance of the protagonist. This part of the franchise uses the Unreal Engine 4 engine.

item.title: Moonstone Island
item.description: Game Description Moonstone Island is a life-sim with collecting creatures, immersing you in a huge open world full of adventures. The game has 100 islands to explore, promising an exciting journey like no other. As someone who has visited this enchanting world, I can say that Moonstone Island offers a truly unique and exciting experience. You step into the shoes of a novice alchemist, following village traditions. Your task is to undergo alchemy training on a floating island in the sky.

item.title: Lies of p
item.description: Game Description Lies of P was inspired by the famous story about Pinocchio, but demonstrates a more cruel and gloomy version of the fairy tale. To become a person, kindness and love are not enough, because the human essence also has bloodthirsty features, where everyone is ready to fight for power or place under the sun by any means. Much has to be built on lies, the main thing is not to get confused in it so that the protagonist is not declassified.

item.title: The Backrooms: Last Expedition
item.description: Game Description The BackRooms: Last Expedition is a cooperative in the horror genre, in which from 1 to 4 gamers are united in teams to survive in an alarming world. The main attention is paid to the passage of a series of dangerous, constantly changing levels, each of which is filled with mysterious creatures. Together, players should try to escape from the horror surrounding them, using their collective forces to resist the unknown.

item.title: Galaxy Pass Station
item.description: Game Description Galaxy Pass Station, a comical space station colony simulation, takes players on a whimsical journey into the bustling world of intergalactic hospitality. We will take on the role of the first stationmaster, who will provide excellent service and build the most wonderful center in the galaxy for a variety of alien guests. Here are 13 alien races, each of which has its own quirks and characteristics: the mysterious Tintukians, funny Zubenoids, curious Martians, mischievous Slu, incomprehensible Grays and many others.

item.title: Starfield
item.description: Game Description Starfield opens a new chapter in the gaming universe after a quarter-century hiatus. Bethesda, known for such outstanding projects as The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim and Fallout 4, offers an expansive next-generation role-playing game set in outer space. In 2330, humanity expands far beyond the boundaries of our solar system: pioneers colonize distant planets, turning into a space-faring civilization. Join the ranks of Constellation, a group of intrepid space explorers on a quest to find elusive artifacts scattered across the galaxy in Bethesda’s most ambitious endeavor to date.

item.title: Chants of Sennaar
item.description: Game Description Chants of Sennaar is an adventure game with peaceful gameplay, set in an incredibly beautiful universe. It is incredibly reminiscent of Ancient Babylon in the years of its dawn. In this fantasy world, there are several powerful ethnic groups and for a long time they interacted with each other and shared knowledge. These tribes call themselves the Peoples of the Tower and are gradually weakening every year due to hostility.

item.title: Girl Genius: Adventures In Castle Heterodyne
item.description: Game Description Based on the beloved graphic novel series of the same name by the talented duo Phil and Kaya Foglio, Girl Genius: Adventures In Castle Heterodyne invites you into the luminous fantasy world of Girl Genius™, plunging into the turbulent journey of Agatha Heterodyne as she makes her way through the treacherous corridors, catacombs and kitchens of her ancestral fortress - Castle Heterodyne. As the lost heiress of a crazy and mysterious family, Agatha strives to restore the ancient fortress to its former glory and take its rightful place as a “true heterodyne.

item.title: Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder
item.description: Game Description Shalnor Legends 2: Trita of Thunder tells about the journey of a young orc named Madren after his ship crashes off the coast of the Thunder Island. There he finds an artifact, melting in himself significant power, which forces him to go through a series of trials to disclose all the capabilities of the find. The island is the main game location for a study filled with its population and secrets.

item.title: Dogu the Adventurer
item.description: Game Description Dogu the Adventurer tells the story of a protracted confrontation in worlds filled with ancient technology. The main character, Dogu, finds himself embroiled in a conflict with ruthless bandits who pursue him at every turn. The deceptively cute style of the locations hides serious threats: from traitorous pigs to ancient demons and powerful bosses guarding secrets. The survival of the protagonist directly depends on improving his equipment and timely repair of equipment.

item.title: Looper Tactics
item.description: Game Description Looper Tactics is a card role-playing strategy, the gameplay of which is built around exploring the world and revealing the secrets of an ancient civilization. With the advent of the human faction, gamers have new tactical options at their disposal based on 5 unique combat mechanics. These skills allow you to temporarily unite creatures, sacrifice some fighters to strengthen others, and activate special skills when calling allies. This race is led by a hero named Jester, and some units even receive the status of immortals, which radically changes the approach to battles.

item.title: Sunkenland
item.description: Game Description Sunkenland is a fun adventure game that offers a unique take on the survival genre. The game immerses us in the world of the water element, which is both beautiful and dangerous. It involves mining resources, crafting items, building bases, trading and fighting pirates to survive in an aquatic environment plagued by hunger and violence. The game features a variety of locations such as sunken cities, atolls, floating bases and abandoned structures.

item.title: Blasphemous 2
item.description: Game Description Blasphemous 2 returns players to the dark and scary world of The Penitent One, the protagonist of the first part. This highly anticipated sequel to the critically acclaimed action-platformer once again delves into a nightmarish realm of brutal combat, twisted religious themes and terrifying visuals. Continuing the events of the Wounds of Eventide DLC, the plot delves into the story of the Penitent One who confronts the Miracle, a mysterious force that has tormented him throughout his journey.

item.title: Orbo's Odyssey
item.description: Game Description Orbo’s Odyssey offers to become in place of the eccentric Orbo of Stetson, an ordinary personal assistant with unusual abilities. This 3D platformer will send you on a surreal journey through the office of your boss, where running, jumping and drilling is just an iceberg top. A project with notes of comedy and oddities promises a unique experience. Adventures begin with the fact that Orbo and his colleague Pibe are locked in the office of his boss due to a malfunction of the door to open the door.

item.title: Bomb Rush Cyberfunk
item.description: Game Description Bomb Rush Cyberfunk is a dynamic 3D platformer that invites you to explore the world of the near future. Cyberfunk has a huge number of techniques, including high speed movement, parkour, dancing, tags, stunts and much more. This is funkstyle! Find your unique handwriting and font. Fight against law enforcement officers and claim your rights to compete in a huge dystopian metropolis. The game is distinguished by a cartoon style, made to look like a comic book.

item.title: Daisy Flies to the Moon
item.description: Game Description Daisy Flies to the Moon takes you on a journey beyond Earth, set in the year 2083. The title tells the story of Daisy, an engineer who, after an unfortunate failure in her studies, ends up at a lunar outpost. She originally went there to study lunar rock formations, but the yearlong internship turns into a much longer ordeal when the outpost loses contact with Earth. Over time, the colony is divided into those who remained uninfected and those who were consumed by a strange virus of plant origin.

item.title: Labyrinthine
item.description: Game Description Labyrinthine is a first-person horror game that you can play alone or with friends. You find yourself in the mysterious labyrinths of a mysterious mansion on the outskirts of the forest. Try to find a way to escape from these cursed lands. Collect useful items, solve puzzles and run away from bloodthirsty monsters that are always on your heels. The main goal is to survive! Team up in co-op and play with up to three players as you try to unravel the mysteries of this cursed forest and find a way out of the mystical Heppiesburgh Hedge.

item.title: Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew
item.description: Game Description Shadow Gambit: The Cursed Crew is a unique stealth strategy game about cursed pirates in the Dark Caribbean! In this alternate version of the Golden Age of Piracy, the curse of lost souls hangs over a chain of islands ruled by evil inquisitors who try to burn all unusual pirates. You must assemble a crew of 8 cursed pirates, each with their own personality and supernatural powers, to recover Captain Mordecai’s mysterious treasure and defeat the army of the Inquisition.

item.title: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2
item.description: Game Description Ship Graveyard Simulator 2 is a fascinating and realistic first -person construction simulator. If you are ready to pick up a cutter and a hammer again, then it’s time to go to the new coast with the largest cemetery of ships in the world and start dismantling huge details of ships. In this continuation, you will find new, even larger vessels, new gaming mechanics, functions and improvements, as well as improved mechanics that you loved in the first part.

item.title: Eon Fighter
item.description: Game Description Eon Fighter is an action game with a top view with Roguelite systems where the player pilots the fighter through the hostile sectors of the cosmos. The gameplay is focused on a collision with continuous waves of opponents and collecting resources for promotion. In the role of the last representative of mankind, it is necessary to carry out tasks, confronts the constant enemy. The structure of the Shoot ‘Em Up genre requires continuous movement and tactical ingenuity to survive in the conditions of the onslaught.

item.title: Sengoku Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Sengoku Dynasty tells the story of difficult life in feudal Japan. To convey everything with maximum accuracy, the developers consulted with a historical group, which provided valuable advice and confirmed records with information about the life of that period. The player will have to become the leader of one of the villages and lead it to prosperity and expansion in one of the ways. The player will have one, almost abandoned settlement at his disposal, which he will have to restore and provide the inhabitants with everything they need.

item.title: VIDEOVERSE
item.description: Game Description VIDEOVERSE invites gamers into a nostalgic digital realm that echoes the early days of online social networking. Set in the fictional online community Videoverse, it follows Emmett, a young gamer and aspiring artist. Gamers navigate a landscape rich with interactions, choices, and character development that are central to the unfolding narrative. Emmett’s journey isn’t just a game; it explores the intricacies of friendship and the weight of decisions. Each choice can lead to different consequences, allowing users to shape the story in different ways.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3
item.description: Game Description Baldur’s Gate 3 is a continuation of the cult turn-based RPG in which you take control of a small squad consisting of unique characters. Each party member is of great importance to tactics and represents an individual with his own character, history and abilities. Baldur’s Gate 3 invites you to explore the large open world of the Forgotten Realm. The plot does not act as a direct continuation of the previous part, however, illithids appear in the narrative - they are also mind flayers.

item.title: Baldur's Gate 3
item.description: Game Description Baldur’s Gate 3 is a continuation of the cult turn-based RPG, in which you will take control of a small squad consisting of unique characters. Each party member is of great importance to tactics and represents an individual with his own character, history and abilities. Baldur’s Gate 3 invites you to explore the large open world of the Forgotten Realm. The plot does not act as a direct continuation of the previous part, however, illithids appear in the narrative - they are also mind flayers.

item.title: Cornucopia
item.description: Game Description Cornucopia is a 2.5D farm life RPG that uniquely combines pet combat, animal breeding, and lush cropping. With over 49 NPCs to interact with and 200+ recipes to master, there’s never a dull moment. You’ll be able to form lasting relationships, master exciting mini-games, and enjoy holiday celebrations as you uncover the fascinating secrets of this dynamic world. By focusing on love, family, and agriculture, you can find true love, create a thriving family, and grow a variety of vegetables, fruit trees, and berry bushes.

item.title: Punch Club 2: Fast Forward
item.description: Game Description Punch Club 2: Fast Forward is a 2D action fighting game for real fighters who are not afraid of difficulties and are ready to fight their way through life’s challenges. You, as the main character, have spent 20 long years patiently waiting for your moment in your mother’s cramped garage, dreaming of a better life and searching for your missing father. But life doesn’t give you anything for nothing, and there will be many obstacles and troubles on your way.

item.title: Ember Knights
item.description: Game Description Ember Knights is a multiplayer roguelite with dynamic gameplay. Each run allows participants to create new synergistic attacks, customizing their character’s equipment and leveling up their abilities. As you progress, you gain access to new skills, relics, and spells that can impact every match. There is a network cooperative for up to 4 participants and the creation of a room online. The combat system focuses on slashing attacks, dynamic techniques and fast movements.

item.title: My Friendly Neighborhood
item.description: Game Description My Friendly Neighborhood immerses users for the role of a simple repairman Gordon, which is forced to cope with gloomy and revived puppets attacking the hero during the play “Our friendly neighborhood.” The protagonist is forced to survive and cope with various puzzles to find a way out of the trap. The MFN game is an action horror where you have to cope with dynamic levels, using a variety of weapons for self -defense.

item.title: Viewfinder
item.description: Game Description More than just a first-person puzzle platformer, Viewfinder is a true immersion into a world of mystery and mystery in a bizarre, surreal environment. You will have to use the camera to change reality and question your perceptions. This single player game will be a real challenge for your intellect and imagination, captivating you for many hours. You’ll bring paintings, screenshots, and postcards to life as you uncover long-forgotten secrets and explore connected worlds.

item.title: Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners 1
item.description: Game Description Survival and Horror: Mortanis Prisoners #1 occurs in the Nazi concentration camp, where the main characters are prisoners who are going to execute for participation in the conspiracy of the rebels. However, they soon find out that death is not the worst thing that can happen to them, because they will find an even more terrible fate. They must find a way to escape from the nightmare that awaits them in the camp.

item.title: Dave The Diver
item.description: Game Description Dave The Diver - a sea adventure about a diver named Dave. Events take place in a mysterious place called the Blue Hole. During the day, the protagonist explores the ocean, diving to the very bottom in search of treasures, and at night he manages a sushi restaurant. Dave is partnered with 3 charismatic friends to help him on his adventures. Each character has an individual character, introducing dynamics into the relationships between the characters.

item.title: Life Not Supported
item.description: Game Description Life Not Supported is a survival simulator for the brave and courageous! You are the only survivor, stuck in vast empty space orbiting a mysterious planet that could become your new home. However, things don’t go as planned, and you’re tied to what’s left of your ship. With limited resources and time running out, you must scavenge nearby debris and assemble a makeshift vessel to escape the dangers of space and uncover the truth behind the ship’s malfunction.

item.title: SLUDGE LIFE 2
item.description: Game Description SLUDGE LIFE 2 is a graffiti adventure that will make you laugh, think and splash. The sequel is bigger, badder and dirtier than ever, with a huge open world full of secrets, jokes, strange characters and places to check in. But there’s one catch: your best friend and rap star Big Mud has disappeared, and you must find him. You play as Ghost, a graffiti artist who is on Big Mud’s trail at Ciggy City Suites, a luxury hotel complex owned by the evil GLUG corporation.

item.title: Feed All Monsters
item.description: Game Description Feed All Monsters invites you to join a team of hardworking delivery people who are trying to deliver delicious food to all the little monsters. These creatures are always patiently waiting for someone to come and feed them, but not all of them remember to take lunch with them. Luckily, you’re here to help! As the proud owner of a monster food delivery service, you must dispatch your trusted team of three to visit all the floating islands and feed all the monsters with delicious food.

item.title: The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales
item.description: Game Description The Bookwalker: Thief of Tales invites players to take on the persona of a book traveler. He is a thief whose special ability is to immerse himself in the worlds of books. In his interpretation, they look like dreams, but at the same time they are completely material. Due to this, the hero can take things directly from dreams and drag them into the real world, which is his main task.

item.title: Miwa: The Sacred Fox
item.description: Game Description Events Miwa: The Sacred Fox begin during the Canaloa festival when night ghosts come out of the ocean shells. These processions move to desecrated sacred places, and this time the village of Kamijima becomes their goal. Sima Nobu, one of the survivors, remembering the cries of dying friends, sets the goal of sanctifying his native settlement again. To fulfill this mission, it is necessary to unite with a holy fox named Miva in order to explore the dark caves and ruins of ancient cities in the world, drawing inspiration from Japanese-Gawaian myths.

item.title: Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure
item.description: Game Description Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure is a virtual adventure, the plot of which is built around the confrontation between two heroines and the villain Cyblin Lord. The narrative is split between two realities. In one of them, the protagonist is Dot, a character in the in-game world, and in the other, her creator named Bug, an Atari employee. The antagonist interferes with Bug’s past, trying to change her creative plans and prevent the creation of a happy universe for Dot.

item.title: Age of Fear: Total
item.description: Game Description Age of Fear: Total is a comprehensive package that combines the titles in the series into a single whole. It brings together past releases, future updates and downloadable content - all designed to provide a rich experience. Whether you’re a longtime fan or a newcomer, the set offers a unique opportunity to delve into the series' expansive universe. Over 100 hours of gameplay promise a world filled with different characters, factions and challenges.

item.title: Nocturnal
item.description: Game Description Nocturnal is an exciting action platformer in which you will plunge into a world of mysterious mysteries and dangers. You play as Ardeshir, a warrior of the Unquenchable Fire, who has returned to his home island of Nakhran, only to find his land engulfed in a dark haze. Your task is to uncover the secrets of this mysterious darkness, defeat it and return your people to the light. Caution is your main ally in this campaign.

item.title: Driftwood
item.description: Game Description Driftwood is a fascinating journey into the world of high -speed descent on Longboard. The main character is Eddie, a cool sliven who loves to ride in beautiful landscapes. This game provides an ideal balance of speed and control, bringing a feeling of relaxation and calm, despite a high -speed action. The project offers minimalistic experience, focusing on skating on magnificent landscapes, and not on building a story campaign.

item.title: Tale of Immortal
item.description: Game Description Tale of Immortal, an open-world sandbox deeply rooted in Chinese mythology and cultivation, invites players into an immersive experience where the path to immortality is paved through strategic choices and the conquest of mythical monsters from the Classic of Mountains and Seasons. Your journey as a novice Qi Refinement Stage cultivator begins in Yukong Village. A world filled with unpredictable monsters, mystical kingdoms and treasures waiting in the wings will open before you.

item.title: Elypse
item.description: Game Description Elypse is an atmospheric metroidvania, which is a mixture of classic platformer and 2D action. The action takes place in the very depths of hell. The plot tells how every 10 years it is necessary to sacrifice people to the Abyss in order to protect oneself from the mystical Abyss - an otherworldly force with destructive power. Unfortunately, the main character was chosen to become a victim. There is always a chance of salvation: if you manage to pass all the tests that the Abyss has prepared, then you can continue your life.

item.title: Hand of Doom
item.description: Game Description Hand of Doom takes you on an exciting journey as an apprentice wizard who is faced with the difficult task of defeating the Doom Lords, the supreme rulers of reality itself. However, be careful, because your mentor may not be as reliable a figure as you think at first glance, and the fate of the entire Universe depends on your decisions. This fun RPG pays homage to the nostalgic feel of the early ’90s, capturing the essence of games that combined heavy metal aesthetics with lively FMV and addictive gameplay.

item.title: Superfluous Returnz
item.description: Game Description Superfluous Returnz is a delightful point-and-click adventure game that combines humor, brain-teasing puzzles and a charming storyline. The action takes place in the quiet French village of Foshuny, where a mysterious theft of apples from local orchards takes place. Entering the story is Harpagon Lonyon, a wealthy and eccentric man who takes on the role of Super Odd, a superhero devoid of any real powers or talents. Together with his assistant Sophie, they set off in search of a solution to the mystery of the apple theft.

item.title: Occupy Mars: The Game
item.description: Game Description Colonizing a planet in Occupy Mars is a challenging but fun task. Here the player will have to build his own base, explore the expanses of the red desert, extract water, grow food and find new ways to obtain oxygen. An open world with great sandbox potential will allow you to seriously immerse yourself in the role of a pioneer on Mars. Using advanced technologies, Occupy Mars will create a developed network of buildings.

item.title: Voidtrain
item.description: Game Description In the fairy-tale world of Voidtrain, you need to survive by train. Here the player awaits a journey between unique worlds filled with dangers and adventures. The main characters were mechanics who were sorting out the rubble of a war-torn laboratory in Koenigsberg. Here they find secret Nazi documents pointing to strange research. They lead the mechanics to a portal to the Interworld - a parallel reality filled with wonders.

item.title: Death, Soul and Robots
item.description: Game Description Death, Soul and Robots is a new exciting game in the Metroidvania genre, which immerses users on an unusual trip on the planet, which is on the verge of disappearance. In the role of the main character - a charming cat - you have to find the soul of planet 42, which is the only chance to save the Earth from imminent destruction. However, you can’t cope with this task alone, because you will meet many companions and opponents on the way.

item.title: Staffer Case: A Supernatural Mystery Adventure
item.description: Game Description Staffer Case: A Supernatural Mystery Adventure is a supernatural mystery adventure set in a fictional London in the 1960s, where people with unique skills, known as staffers, find themselves at the center of increasingly strange incidents. The user will have to take the place of Notrik, a detective from the Mana affairs department, who is tasked with unraveling a series of crimes. Unlike ordinary criminal investigations, this title requires a different approach.

item.title: Honkai: Star Rail
item.description: Game Description Honkai: Star Rail is a role -playing adventure in which you can play for one of the four characters. Heroes travel around the world with a team. Each member of the detachment is represented by a unique class and fights using individual abilities. An open world and various dungeons with strong bosses and valuable loot are available for research. The fighting is represented by a step -by -step system in the spirit of classic Japanese role -playing games.

item.title: Teslagrad Remastered
item.description: Game Description Teslagrad Remastered invites you to embark on an epic adventure through a unique universe full of dangers and mysteries, where you will have to uncover the secrets of the ancient technology of Teslamancy and save the kingdom of Electropia from a cruel tyrant. In this thrilling remake of the 2D action platformer, you’ll use electromagnetism to jump over chasms, solve challenging puzzles, and take on multiple enemies. Moving through hand-drawn locations, you will explore the mysterious Tesla Tower and immerse yourself in the atmosphere of steampunk - a dark and inhospitable Europe, where the spirit of industrial progress and technological development collided with a dystopian future.

item.title: DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters
item.description: Game Description DE-EXIT - Eternal Matters is an adventure in which you explore the other world, trying to uncover the secrets of a lost memory. The game is filled with humor and mysticism. The graphic style is represented by an unusual voxel design. You will need to control the protagonist from a third party. Sometimes a game can change perspective, turning the gameplay on its head. Together with the hero you will have to save the world from the impending threat.

item.title: Rusted Moss
item.description: Game Description Rusted Moss is a dynamic platformer that stands out with swiftness and hardcore complexity. Actions are developing in the world of post -apocalypse. Life has long died, and everything was rusting around. Fight with rebellious machines covered with rust. The heroine Rusted Moss can jump, shoot and cling to the protrusions hook-cat. The visual side is made in a stylish pixel art with a retro-atmosphere. Game mechanics relieve on the old-school platformers of the 90s, but at the same time introducing many modern elements.

item.title: Wartales
item.description: Game Description Wartales is an open-world role-playing adventure that lets you lead your team of mercenaries on a treasure hunt. Events take place in a medieval fantasy world. You need to travel across continents, recruit party members, explore ancient tombs and collect rewards. The plot begins with the fall of the great Edoran Empire. The kingdom is engulfed in a plague, killing every living thing in its path. In connection with this, banditry, theft, murder and looting increased.

item.title: The Library of Babel
item.description: Game Description The Library of Babel is a stealth platformer, the actions of which are transferred to the world of the future in the jungle of futuristic Babylon. The main character is Louis - a detective investing in the murder case. He has to solve the secret why Babylon’s library was closed many years ago. What did the creators try to hide there? The plot line is inspired by the work of Horhe Borges.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: DREDGE
item.description: Game Description The single-player adventure DREDGE invites the player to travel through the depths and gradually uncover their secrets while fishing. As you progress, the main character will have to improve his ship and explore the bottom more thoroughly in order to obtain long-buried secrets. The event takes place in the middle of a mysterious archipelago of islands, where many mysteries and dangers are hidden. The protagonist begins his journey by taking the helm of a fishing trawler and setting sail.

item.title: Saga of Sins
item.description: Game Description Saga of Sins is an atmospheric action role-playing game in a dark setting in which you take on the role of demonic creatures to fight the deadly sins and free the village of Sinwell from the infection. In this action-packed adventure, you play as Cecil the priest, who can enter people’s minds and transform into unique demons, each with their own individual skills and abilities. Fight enemies, collect gold and upgrade your demons to become even stronger and face new challenges.

item.title: RAIDBORN
item.description: Game Description RAIDBORN is a first-person fantasy action RPG that will satisfy your thirst for adventure and immerse you in a highly detailed and atmospheric world. Featuring dynamically generated dungeons and quests that will keep you on your toes as you plunder a world strewn with treasure. Explore challenging quests and quirky characters, all accompanied by epic fantasy music and voiceovers for key dialogue. The combat is intense and satisfying, offering a variety of exciting combat techniques and a varied arsenal of melee and ranged weapons to choose from.

item.title: Resident Evil 4 Remake
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 4 Remake is a full-fledged remake of the cult fourth part, which is rightfully considered one of the best in the series. The developers took into account the criticism of fans after the release of the remake of the third game and did not stray far from their roots, adhering to the course taken with Resident Evil 2. The plot has not undergone drastic changes, however, some storylines have been added that were not in the original, the arcs of minor characters have expanded and, Of course, the controls have been improved and the graphics have been significantly updated.

item.title: The Wreck
item.description: Game Description The adventures in The Wreck follow the life of a failed screenwriter named Junon as she tries to cope with the challenges of adulthood. Players will follow a 36-year-old woman who experiences a turning point that derails her aspirations, career, and personal life. The game is a 3D visual novel that will showcase a melancholy story about sisterhood, motherhood, grief and survival in a cruel world. The storyline in The Wreck will develop gradually through episodes that immerse the protagonist in the past.

item.title: Mato Anomalies
