item.description: Game Description Mato Anomalies takes players to Mato. This is the name of the ancient neo-futuristic city. According to the plot, strange incidents began to occur in this metropolis. Several factions are involved in them. And the settlement began to be threatened by demonic creatures. The story follows the adventures of private detective Doe and an exorcist named Graham. They investigate unusual incidents, battle demons in the rifts between worlds, and try to save a populated area from destruction.

item.title: The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker
item.description: Game Description The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker is an immersive, atmospheric role-playing adventure that takes you into the fictional world of Imbertal. The game focuses on classic old-school mechanics, allowing you to venture into a dark and dangerous dark fantasy setting. The main character is a cursed lord named Rothar Aekrest, who must deal with problems on his land, facing various obstacles and participating in difficult combat encounters with monsters. When going to The Black Grimoire: Cursebreaker, you have to complete a large number of tasks and gain experience that allows you to upgrade and improve your character’s characteristics or add new skills and abilities.

item.title: Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling
item.description: Game Description Looking Up I See Only A Ceiling is a short but thought-provoking psychological visual novel that explores the difficult life of a student. The action takes place in hand-recreated locations, and unique characters immerse you in the seemingly measured world of textbooks and routine study. As they progress, players will have to make difficult choices that can change the fate of the main character forever. The plot revolves around the concept of reaching the “point of no return”, a critical moment that can make or break the protagonist’s life.

item.title: Meg's Monster
item.description: Game Description Meg’s Monster is a fun indie RPG adventure where you take on the role of a grumpy ghoul from the underworld tasked with helping a lost little girl find her way home. But don’t be fooled by her creepy-cute aesthetic, because if this girl cries, your whole world will collapse before your eyes. Entering a twisted dungeon world where humans are just breakfast for the monsters and mutants that roam its lands, you will meet Roy, a huge ogre who has no interest in feeding on people.

item.title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak
item.description: Game Description The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak immerses players in the bustling world of the Kalvard Republic. Van Arkrid, a spriggan ready to take on any job, finds himself embroiled in a story that will shake the entire country to its core. This latest installment in the Trails series goes beyond expectations with an updated AT combat system that seamlessly blends field skirmishes and turn-based combat. Xipha, the sixth generation tactical orbital pistol, revolutionizes gameplay, offering a new twist on the franchise’s signature style.

item.title: DREADFUL River
item.description: Game Description DREADFUL River is an arcade rafting simulator on the river on a raft with elements of role -playing play, action and tactics. The project was carried out in medieval setting. The plot tie begins with the attack of enemies on the kingdom. While the enemies are storming the castle, the king with a small group of the most faithful guards goes in search of an eternal crown, about which different legends go.

item.title: We are screen!
item.description: Game Description We are screen! - This is a scientific and fantastic action with elements of a cirow, in which you will find yourself in the pilot’s chair in order to save multi-sized from death. Are you ready for an exciting joint game, like which has not yet been? But beware, chaos reigns in here, and it is your team from 4 space cadets to restore balance. After the theft of great forks, the fabric itself is put on the map.

item.title: The Pale Beyond
item.description: Game Description The Pale Beyond is a survival visual novel where every choice has a solution. The Arctic is harsh and cruel to anyone who decides to enter its territory, and explorers must always be prepared for unforeseen circumstances. But even they can be broken by some kind of misfortune and being on the verge of death from lack of food and terrible cold. Several years ago, the ship Viscount set out in search of the absolute South, but failed and never returned.

item.title: Plains of Pain
item.description: Game Description Plains of Pain is a dark, post-apocalyptic multiplayer action game that takes you into a world of survival where hope has faded and all that remains is the ultimate end of days. This is no ordinary game - it’s a journey into a sun-scorched dystopian world that will push you to the brink of your sanity. The backstory is chillingly real. When the planet was engulfed by monstrous solar flares, Earth’s wealthiest people fled Earth as part of a secret government initiative, leaving the remaining population to fend for itself.

item.title: DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION
item.description: Game Description DR LIVESEY ROM AND DEATH EDITION is an adventure game set in fictional territories. The plot centers on Doctor Livesey and his popular squad. He goes on a journey with them, wanting to unravel the many mysteries on Treasure Island. However, behind the back of the main character, a conspiracy occurred that began right on the ship. They want to kill some members of the team and the Doctor himself.

item.title: Hogwarts Legacy
item.description: Game Description Hogwarts Legacy is a role-playing game based on the famous books about the boy wizard “Harry Potter”. The events of Hogwarts: Legacy take place long before the birth of the main character of the books and films. The story dates back to the 19th century, specifically in the 1800s. The game takes place in the same universe and in the same school, so fans of the original saga will find many references and meet some familiar characters.

item.title: Risky Woods
item.description: Game Description Risky Woods invites gamers to a breathtaking, adrenaline-filled arcade adventure! Are you ready to take on the biggest test yet? As the fearless warrior Rohan, you must fight your way through treacherous forests and dark caves. But beware - the path is full of dangers, from stomping Skeletons to insidious traps and face-snatching flying devils! Arms in hand, you must navigate treacherous terrain, free petrified monks, and defeat the evil Draxos once and for all.

item.title: Pizza Tower
item.description: Game Description Pizza Tower stands out with its pixel graphics and animation. The art imitates old cartoon series from the end of the last century. The project also boasts an energetic soundtrack. It is a 2D side-scrolling platformer. This title is the spiritual successor to the video games from the Wario Land series. In it you can walk left and right, run, accelerate, jump, make dashes, break some obstacles, ride mounts, and turn into monsters.

item.title: Hi-Fi RUSH
item.description: Game Description Hi-Fi RUSH tells the story of the adventures of a guy named Chai. This music lover without one arm decided to take part in the Armstrong project. Vandeley Technologies provides implants to people with physical disabilities, but in return requires them to work for themselves. The hero was supposed to become a scavenger after receiving a mechanical prosthesis. However, during the operation, a music player is accidentally implanted into his chest and gives him new powers.

item.title: Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game
item.description: Game Description Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game lives up to its name. This is an indie survival horror. The project was made in the setting of the First World War. It uses the first-person view familiar to the genre. If you turn the camera down, the protagonist’s legs and arms will be displayed on the screen. The events take place in 1917. In Trenches - World War 1 Horror Survival Game you will play as soldier James.

item.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game – Complete Edition
item.description: Game Description Scott Pilgrim vs. The World: The Game - Complete Edition is a whirlwind arcade action-adventure game based on the plot of the famous series of graphic novels and the movie of the same name. In addition to the original game, equally exciting add-ons Knives Chau and Wallace are also available. Players can choose to play through many of their favorite characters, such as Scott Pilgrim himself, Ramona, Knives, Stephen Stills and others.

item.title: EXOME
item.description: Game Description EXOME may be of interest to lovers of playing games with friends. The multiplayer is designed for 2-4 users. For those who like single more, there is an opportunity to play alone. This is a cooperative shooter with a third person with elements of survival and horror. When using optical sights, the camera angle during firing for a short time changes from the eyes. The project is made on the Unreal Engine 5 engine.

item.title: Lil Gator Game
item.description: Game Description Lil Gator Game from the first minutes creates a positive atmosphere and invites you to completely immerse yourself in this friendly world. Here, users take on the role of a little crocodile who wants to make new friends. But they need help, so the character will have to get down to business, completing their quests and instructions. And given that the main location in the game is a national park, you will have to spend a lot of time exploring individual areas and finding solutions.

item.title: High on Life
item.description: Game Description High On Life is a humorous first -person shooter with metroid elements. It is made in a science fiction setting. Moments with the action alternate with more calm episodes, where you need to chat with hasty characters, fulfill their instructions and solve puzzles. The rich arsenal includes unusual and diverse weapons with two types of shooting - the main and alternative. There are analogues of pistols, shotgun, machine guns and so on.

item.title: Chained Echoes
item.description: Game Description Chained Echoes is a turn-based role-playing game in which you will not only pick up a sword, but also sit in the cockpit of a huge robot! In the world of Valandis, technology and magic go hand in hand. The visual style is made in the spirit of classic JRPGs. A special feature of the setting is that dragons and flying robots are commonplace in the world of Chained Echoes.

item.title: SAMURAI MAIDEN
item.description: Game Description SAMURAI MAIDEN may be of interest to fans of isekai and yuri anime. This game takes place in Japan. The plot takes Tsumugi, who is passionate about fencing, from the modern 21st century to the Sengoku era. She must destroy the Demon Lord, who was sealed by her ancestor many centuries ago. Someone came into the distant past to unseal this creature and seize its power. Also, 3 ninja girls from different worlds went there.

item.title: Spire of Glory
item.description: Game Description Spire of Glory is a pixelated action roguelike that will take you on a climb to the top of this majestic mountain to prove your worth. Start your journey from scratch and make the right choices to become strong enough to overcome all the challenges of the Spire. To survive, you will have to fight enemies and collect crystals to purchase and upgrade items, as well as expand your team.

item.title: HELLSEED
item.description: Game Description The gloomy atmosphere inHELLSEED is filled with riddles and secrets that the protagonist must cope with. The main character finds himself in Italy in 1980, in the small province of Turin. Users will take on the role of a private investigator who is investigating a strange case. Doctors from a psychiatric hospital are worried about a missing employee who was last at home. Players will explore the estate of the missing doctor, starting from the rooms of his desolate apartment, studying objects and analyzing the situation.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: In Nightmare
item.description: Game Description In Nightmare allows gamers to plunge into a dark atmosphere where they have to take control of a boy who has lost his beloved. The protagonist will make his way through dangerous locations where monsters live. The project is a horror adventure game with elements of an action platformer, where you need to overcome various obstacles on the hero’s path, solve puzzles, deal with monsters and look for the right path out of the frightening kingdom of darkness.

item.title: Valkie 64
item.description: Game Description In Valkie 64, users get to enjoy the adventures of the guard Valkie, who will roam the fantasy world. You have to save the kingdom of Celis by going down into dark dungeons with monsters. The project is a three-dimensional action adventure game where you have to move through levels and destroy various creatures that will be aggressive towards the character. The heroine will be able to face ordinary opponents and dangerous bosses that await at the end of each dungeon.

Game Description The sandbox 171 stands out against the background of other GTA clones with its entourage. The action takes place in Brazil. The creators offer to ride on the suburbs of San Paulo. Poor areas with narrow streets, graffiti on the walls, dirt and garbage add a special flavor of the local atmosphere. The player controls his character with a third -person view. During shooting on the street, the camera is transferred by the hero’s shoulder.

item.title: Torii
item.description: Game Description In the Torii, gamers have to go to the study of surreal locations, where many strange creatures will be released. The heroine is a girl named Ipa, who has lost her loved one and is now forced to go through the adoption process. Players have to enjoy the introspective adventure, where you need to deal with the fears of the protagonist and search for the missing younger sister. The project is an indie header, where a colorful artistic style is used for the design of the environment.

item.title: Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten
item.description: Game Description Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten is an opportunity to immerse yourself in rich fantasy adventures, where gamers get to enjoy the gameplay mechanics of classic JRPGs. Players will travel through the small province of Ennakamuy, which is located on the border with the Yamato Empire. The protagonist lives an ordinary life until he becomes forced to investigate a mysterious violation. The guy eventually meets the girl and learns more details about the events taking place in the world.

item.title: ZERO Sievert
item.description: Game Description Plunging intoZERO Sievert, you will have to go on dangerous journeys through the post-apocalyptic expanses of a dying world, taking you to the terrain of a desolate alternative race. Taking control of one of the characters, you have to go on dangerous adventures, delving into creepy and gloomy places filled with strange phenomena and creatures that live beyond the limits of human vision. Adventures in ZERO Sievert immerse you in an atmosphere of loneliness and independent survival in wild conditions, full of unexplored places and unexplored locations through which the protagonist will have to wander and look for useful items for life support.

item.title: Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration
item.description: Game Description Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration takes gamers on an interactive adventure that follows the development of the video game industry over fifty years. Users will watch a variety of arcade projects in which they will take part. You will be able to enjoy a variety of gameplay mechanics that underlie the following projects: Swordquest, VCTR-SCTR, Neo Breakout, Quadtank, Yars' Revenge Reimagined, Haunted Houses, etc. Users of Atari 50: The Anniversary Celebration will have a wide variety of opportunities to immerse themselves in pixelated arcade games made in the spirit of old-school retro games from the 90s.

item.title: Shadows Over Loathing
item.description: Game Description Shadows Over Loathing is a slapstick comedy-adventure RPG featuring mobsters, monsters, and secrets. You go in search of your Uncle Murray, who has been invited to his antiques store in Ocean City, but when you arrive there, you find that the old man is nowhere to be found. Your investigation leads you to shadowy conspiracies and dangers that threaten to bring about the end of the world. Explore a massive open world filled with danger, quests, puzzles, and minifigures in this single-player comedy RPG set during the Prohibition period in the Abomination universe.

item.title: The Exorcist's Story
item.description: Game Description The Exorcist’s Story is an atmospheric 2D adventure game in which you will find yourself in the shoes of a young priest, Antonio, who had experience in performing exorcism rituals. But one day everything went wrong and a girl died during the ceremony. You escaped prison, but you promised yourself never to perform such rituals again. But a few years later, strange things begin to happen in your small town and Asmodeus, the demon you once encountered, challenges you again.

item.title: A Castle Full of Cats
item.description: Game Description A Castle Full of Cats allows players to go on a colorful journey where they need to squeak objects in a surreal world. The project is a classic visual puzzle where you need to carefully examine locations that are drawn in a cartoony and bright style. You will find many hidden cats that are being held captive. The project combines elements of a metroidvania and a point-and-click quest, where you can look for different ways to solve riddles.

item.title: Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime
item.description: Game Description Fabular: Once Upon a Spacetime allows users to go to the study of the galaxy by taking space knights. The game is a role-playing adventure with elements of Rowl, where you have to move along the retro-futuristic universe in order to save the kingdom from the Lords of the abyss that abducted the sun. The protagonist will be a noble traveler, which is the last hope for the salvation of mankind.

item.title: Lunistic
item.description: Game Description Lunistice may be of interest to those nostalgic for early 3D platformers. The graphics in this project are specially made in a low-poly style and in low resolution. This retro platformer imitates the console hits that came out on fifth-generation consoles in the 90s. He suggests exploring the memories of the main character named Hana. In the story, she is trying to get to the Moon. Her adventures consist of linear levels.

item.title: Silver Nornir
item.description: Game Description Silver Nornir invites gamers to plunge into an exciting world where the fate of the entire world is at stake. This is an exciting old school RPG in a fantasy setting. Survivors of two disasters are ready to fight to the end to stop the end of the world. But they need your help! Exciting adventures and exciting battles using magical gems and combo techniques with friends and allies await you.

item.title: Plot of the Druid
item.description: Game Description Plot of the Druid is a point-and-click adventure that allows you to make earthquakes, turn night into day, and become a small furry animal. And all because the Druids have enormous power! The game will delight all lovers of true British humor and classic quests. Taking on the role of a druid apprentice, go on an exciting journey across the continent in order to restore the power of love and wisdom.

item.title: Out of Ore
item.description: Game Description In Out of Ore, gamers have to take control of a variety of heavy equipment, with the help of which they can mine ore, move earth, dig holes, build or repair buildings, and much more. You have to try yourself as a driver of construction equipment, which is designed for a variety of purposes. The main character goes according to the plot to the very north of the country, where a small base from the Company Mining Corp.

item.title: The Classrooms
item.description: Game Description The Classrooms is a retro-styled psychological indie survival horror game with a first-person perspective and a VHS filter overlaid on top of the screen. The project stands out for its procedural generation of levels. They are liminal spaces. The map is created anew with each new playthrough. According to the developers, their creation can generate billions of possible variations. The point of the gameplay is to explore the entities that live in the stages.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror filmSIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: USAC: Code Breach
item.description: Game Description USAC: Code Breach is a unique co-op experience based on the French cyberpunk universe. You and your partner will have to investigate the sudden shutdown of a scientific center. The protagonist will have to act in a difficult situation, where every step can lead to death. It’s the middle of the 21st century - the world is going through big changes. The climate and energy crisis is being felt around the world.

item.title: Mount and Blade 2: Bannerlord
item.description: Game Description Mount and Blade 2 Bannerlord is a role-playing game with elements of medieval wars, the action of which takes place 200 years before the start of Part 1. In this sequel you will find an improved combat system and an enlarged game world - Calradia. Fight with hundreds of troops under your command and take direct part in the battles as one of the soldiers. You can storm enemy fortresses and destroy fortifications with siege weapons in Mount & Blade II: Bannerlord.

item.title: Faith: The Unholy Trinity
item.description: Game Description Faith: The Unholy Trinity is an indie chorror with an unusual presentation. The project has a minimalistic pixel graphics in retro style. At the same time, there are full-fledged KAT scenes using rotoscopy. The creators also added synthesized computer speech. The plot is dedicated to the confrontation between the minister of the church and the satanic cult, trying to call a powerful demon. The action takes place in the 80s in Connecticut.

item.title: Persona 5 Royal
item.description: Game Description Persona 5 Royal is the official expansion for the fifth part of the Japanese role-playing video game of the same name, which contains even more unique personas, as well as a lot of interesting quests and items. The plot centers on a seemingly ordinary high school student who goes with his family to Tokyo, where he enrolls in a new school. Soon the main character begins to see inexplicable dreams, in which someone tells the guy that a monstrous catastrophe will befall him in the near future.

item.title: Backrooms: Escape Together
item.description: Game Description Backrooms: Escape Together is an atmospheric horror film designed for cooperative play, where in a group of 4 real users you need to find a way out of another dimension and return to the normal world. The scientists who were sent into these mysterious labyrinths almost completed their mission and were supposed to return back, but the mechanism broke down and they lost the opportunity to return. They know about one more exit, but it lies through the most separated levels, through which only a few managed to get through.

item.title: Jennifer Wilde: Unlikely Revolutionaries
item.description: Game Description Jennifer Wilde: Unlikely Revolutionaries is an adventure game set in 1921, against the backdrop of the great revolution in Paris. The main character, young French artist Jennifer Chevalier, has the opportunity to meet her idol, Oscar Wilde, whose soul is connected to a pendant found in the hotel where her father died. The protagonist is convinced that her father was killed, and using her gift of communication with spirits, she tries to summon his spirit.

item.title: Cat Saves Halloween
item.description: Game Description Cat Saves Halloween is a game where a magical cat has to face an invasion of monsters on the eve of All Hallows' Day. The furry hero has the right to fight this threat or simply cause chaos in the city. His arsenal of skills includes both ordinary cat habits such as running and climbing, and supernatural skills, including witchcraft and control over people. The protagonist is also able to use hairballs, which creates another level of interaction with the world and its inhabitants.

item.title: The Case of the Golden Idol
item.description: Game Description The Case of the Golden Idol will allow you to become detectives, but not in the modern world - but in the past. The events take place in the 18th century and mostly in an aristocratic society. The plot revolves around the murders of 12 people that occurred over a period of 40 years. During this time, law enforcement agencies were unable to find the suspect, and even moreover, they believe that these crimes are in no way connected with each other.

item.title: LEGO Bricktales
item.description: Game Description LEGO Bricktales is a puzzle game designed in the now popular LEGO style. This means the entire virtual universe is built from the toy blocks that make up the construction set. The characters also look quite funny - they have cute limbs and boxy bodies. This fascinating story revolves around the fate of a once popular amusement park. Now he is going through far from the best times. It is owned by a kind old man, who will suddenly lose everything he has built throughout his life.

item.title: 1428: Shadows over Silesia
item.description: Game Description 1428: Shadows over Silesia is a dark adventure where real historical events are intertwined with fantasy ones. There is a place here for those who worship the devil, who committed real crimes in his honor, as well as demons and other mythical creatures capable of attacking travelers. If a player accidentally finds himself in the minority, then we can say that this is certain death, since tactics cannot defeat creatures strongly, but you can learn from your own mistakes and save a larger squad at the right time.

item.title: Salt 2: Shores of Gold
item.description: Game Description Salt 2: Shores of Gold tells the story of the complex life of a lone pirate who travels on a small sailing ship. Unlike other games on a similar theme, this project does not focus on sea battles or robbing other ships. The player will have to spend the bulk of his time constantly exploring the vast expanses of water and searching for treasures. The main character feels that the ocean is his real home.

item.title: Card Survival: Tropical Island
item.description: Game Description Card Survival: Tropical Island – takes you into the atmosphere of tropical islands, on which the protagonist will have to survive and settle down. Players gain experience managing the time and resources available to build the structures and tools needed to live a solitary life in the wild. Being in an area filled with various materials and natural objects of the environment, you will have to search and collect useful elements that allow you to live in an area unfavorable for humans.

item.title: Metal: Hellsinger
item.description: Game Description In the hellish shooter Metal: Hellsinger, you need to destroy crowds of enemies in time with the music. Half human, half demon, the main character travels to the most terrible places of the underworld in search of revenge. There, hordes of demons, their lords and the legendary Scarlet Judge are waiting for him. On his bloody path he will be accompanied by heavy metal sounds and a varied arsenal of devilish weapons.

item.title: CHEMISTS: Area of ​​infection
item.description: Game Description CHEMISTS: Area of ​​Infection is a 3rd person shooter that will take you to an alternate reality full of dangers and mysteries. Years have passed since a global catastrophe, and you wake up in a hospital, remembering nothing from the past. Now your task is to survive in this harsh world and find out what happened. Players will have to rely on their experience and navigate the environment, remembering every corner so as not to get lost.

item.title: Taiji
item.description: Game Description Taiji combines two genres. This is a mixture of a puzzle game and an adventure game. This indie project has two-dimensional graphics in the style of pixel art. The camera is located at the top and at an angle. There are a huge number of puzzles here. They consist of grids of tiles, and are built around the need to turn these squares on or off. The main feature of the title is that absolutely all puzzles use a single interface.

item.title: Brok The Investigator
item.description: Game Description Brok The Investigator is an adventure role -playing game that combines the elements of the action, quest and detective. In the center of history, anthropomorphic creatures. You play for a crocodile-drinker named Brock, investigating a mysterious case. During the game, you have to use not only the bright mind, but also the fists. Choose a detective that has to play. You can be a good cop, trying to resolve conflicts with the help of a good word, or you can knock out information through rough power.

item.title: Queen's Wish 2: The Tormentor
item.description: Game Description Queen’s Wish 2: The Tormentor may be of interest to fans of classic RPGs on PC. This indie project is made in the old school style. It was created by a studio that had previously made several series of budget RPGs. This title is set in a medieval fantasy setting. It has 2D graphics with a top view. To understand the plot and lore, it is not necessary to go through the first part first.

item.title: Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack
item.description: Game Description Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack is a representative of the point-and-click adventure genre. It emulates classic 2D escape games. The video game is about time travel. The plot outline is as follows. Scientist Justin cannot fully recover from his breakup with Julia. One day, a portal appears due to a broken microwave. As a result of this incident, the scientist finds himself in the Stone Age, and the caveman Klut is transported to his time and takes the place of the hero.

item.title: Kalinur
item.description: Game Description Kalinur sends a player on a trip to a huge castle to confront a wizard who plunged the kingdom into suffering. It is necessary to explore the nonlinear card in order to find the sorcerer and put an end to its influence. The main task is to return the world by overcoming the source of disasters. The adventure is built on overcoming serious trials, bringing awards and contributing to advance to the final battle with a powerful magician.

item.title: Spirit of the Island
item.description: Game Description Life simulator Spirit of the Island places the player on a tropical island, offering to grow crops, take care of pets, help the locals and much more. Spirit of the Island will require turning the deserted Archipelago into a populated tourist center. However, this requires a lot of effort and a thorny path from a small farm to a noisy city. The danger comes from pirates who are also hunting for treasure and exploring the tropical paradise.

item.title: Rollerdrome
item.description: Game Description The Rollerdrome shooter combines dynamic and vibrant battles, smooth graphics, third-person view and tactical mechanics that allow you to influence the outcome of the battle even with lower chances of winning. The player will have to participate in fierce battles with a variety of opponents. By killing opponents, the main character restores health and replenishes ammunition. During the fight, you can perform spectacular tricks, dodges, or use various tactical movements to eliminate opponents.

item.title: Escape the Backrooms
item.description: Game Description Atmospheric horrorEscape the Backrooms offers cooperative gameplay for up to 4 gamers. A group of people find themselves in a huge and very strange room, from where it is not so easy to find a way out. Users are required to actively interact with each other via voice chat to coordinate actions. It is very important not to separate - you need to move in such a way that users can see each other.

item.title: Marvel's Spider-Man Remastered
item.description: Game Description Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered is an open-world action-adventure game set in New York City. Supervillains break free in the form of characters such as Mister Negative, Rhino, Scorpio, Vulture and Electro. But before he can track them down, Peter Parker contacts William Fisk. After he arrests a businessman, a gang war breaks out. Now only Spider-Man can stop the crime raging in the city. Marvel’s Spider-Man Remastered includes an extensive expansion for The City That Never Sleeps.

item.title: Cult of the Lamb
item.description: Game Description InCult of the Lamb, finding himself in the lands belonging to the false prophets, the gamer is invited to found his own cult, creating a powerful community of admirers. In an adventure game with roguelike elements, the player needs to spread his word to the forest dwellers, gradually making various forays into countries and regions in order to try to expand the sphere of influence of his religion, making it cover all regions.

item.title: Bear and Breakfast
item.description: Game Description In Bear and Breakfast, the good-natured witch opens his own hotel, which is located in the thicket of the forest, where he plans to serve delicious dishes. Soon in the manager simulator it turns out that there is some dangerous secret behind the building that the user needs to reveal. Here you are asked to independently build a hotel, selecting the location of rooms, furniture and decor, as well as attract customers, complete tasks, which allows you to advance through the plot, and collect the necessary items.

item.title: As Dusk Falls
item.description: Game Description As Dusk Falls is an interactive movie game that will allow you to fully immerse yourself in the atmosphere that will take place here. You will be able to see different situations and literally experience them, diving deeper and deeper. You will need to choose, perform various kinds of actions that will allow you to better unravel the tangled tangle of the storyline. But you need to understand that all this, sooner or later, will have its weight.

item.title: Stray
item.description: Game Description Stray takes the player to the distant future, the world of cyberpunk. The story follows the adventures of a lost cat looking for his way home. A stray animal found itself in the fortified city of Kowloon, from which it is not easy to find a way out. People have not lived here for a long time, and the streets are filled with robots. Find out the secrets of a long-abandoned settlement.

item.title: Rune Factory 5
item.description: Game Description Rune Factory 5, like previous parts of the series, crosses a role-playing game with a farm simulator. The events take place in the border town of Rigbart and its surroundings. At the very beginning, you can choose a girl named Alice or a guy named Ares to play the role of the main character. This sequel uses the amnesia plot twist. The protagonist loses his memory and joins the SEED organization.

item.title: Monument Valley 2: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley 2 is an isometric adventure and puzzle game. What is posted here is not the original version, but a re-release called Panoramic Edition. It contains all previously released additional content. The project was initially released on mobile devices. When transferring the title to PC, the developers adapted the controls. They also added support for ultra-wide monitors and improved the visual component, which can now be admired in Full HD.

item.title: Monument Valley: Panoramic Edition
item.description: Game Description Monument Valley can please connoisseurs of meditative projects. This is a calming puzzle game with hand-drawn graphics in a minimalist style. The title is made in isometry. Video games help develop spatial thinking. All the puzzles in it are based on optical illusions. The puzzles are of moderate difficulty. The cards are made in the style of imp art. In the game you can activate mechanisms and change camera angles.

item.title: Neon Blight
item.description: Game Description Neon Blight is an isometric metroidvania in a cyberpunk setting in which you will manage your own underground weapons store. When collecting unique weapons, you need to sell them at a high price. The game features a huge number of locations. The battles will take place in the scenery of the metropolis of the future, in dense forests, warehouses of large corporations, etc. Most of Neon Blight’s elements are procedurally generated, changing the placement of items and some location details.

item.title: Alaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms
item.description: Game Description Action RPGAlaloth: Champions of The Four Kingdoms takes the player into the magical Middle Ages. The story begins in the Valley of Storms - a place where four legendary peoples intersect: Humans, Elves, Dwarves and Orcs. It is here that the cruel god Alaloth is imprisoned. From the very kingdom of the dead, he poisons all kingdoms with his evil. Soon monsters, storms, diseases and mighty dragons will strike this world.

item.title: Surroundead
item.description: Game Description Surroundead is a survival simulator in the open world where the apocalypse happened. In the indie project, you can switch between the view from the first and third-party. Its three -dimensional graphics are made in Low Poly style. According to the plot, a zombie virus appeared on Earth. For 5 years, people fought to him unsuccessfully. As a result, the planet has changed forever. Along the devastated streets, living dead began to roam, and civilization in its level of development rolled back to dark times.

item.title: Last Days of Lazarus
item.description: Game Description Last Days of Lazarus is an excellently executed adventure adventure game, especially in visual terms, the events of which take the gamer to the territory of post-Soviet Russia. The main character is a member of an ancient family who, after a long absence from his homeland, returns home. The reason for this was the suicide of the mother. The protagonist came to support his only relative - his sister Lyudmila.

item.title: Raft
item.description: Game Description Raft is a first-person survival sandbox in which the player will have to survive on a small raft and explore new lands. The main character will begin his journey by waking up hungry and dehydrated on a small wreck of a ship. Get food and drink by catching garbage floating past the hero on the waves. To catch the item, you can use the hook. Find useful items and materials to craft a mug, light a fire, and filter sea water.

item.title: Neon White
item.description: Game Description Neon White is a first-person adventure platformer with card game elements. The gameplay stands out for its incredible dynamics and speed. It is necessary to quickly react to situations and the environment, because enemies, traps, obstacles and other dangers await you at every turn. Events develop behind the pearly gates of Paradise. The task in the game is simple and trivial - you need to destroy all the demons in Heaven.

item.title: Souldiers
item.description: Game Description Souldiers takes place right during the battle, where the forces of good are trying to defend their own right to exist. But at one point, an entire army ends up in Terragaya. This is a mystical country inside the underworld. They didn’t die, but they still had to get out of here to decide the outcome of their own battle. And to do this, you must first find a guard who will show the way to another world.

item.title: Nemesis: Lockdown
item.description: Game Description Nemesis: Lockdown immerses users in dark adventures that are designed for multiplayer playthroughs with a team. Users will survive and fight off the monsters that are in the dark. You have to cooperate with your partners or go into solo mode. The project is a survival horror game where you need to perform step-by-step actions and think through your moves in advance. The game is based on a board game, which shows a sci-fi setting.

item.title: Kao The Kangaroo
item.description: Game Description Kao The Kangaroo is a three-dimensional platformer with a huge amount of action scenes. The game uses cartoon graphics to transmit the beauty of a fictional universe, in which the events of a single -user story campaign take place. Casual management allows players of different ages to quickly remember the keys used and enjoy the versatile mechanic used in the gameplay. The project, developed and published by the TATE Multimedia India, combines elements of constant fights with both small opponents and large, dangerous bosses, and a thoughtful plot with some dramatic turns that make virtual personalities experience.

item.title: Fabled Lands
item.description: Game Description Fabled Lands is an old-school RPG adventure. A large open world is presented, available for exploration. The setting immerses you in a fantasy world, in which you have to complete a huge number of main and secondary quests, fight, trade and level up your character. You need to explore an entire continent, taking on the role of a merchant, priest, scientist, thief, magician or soldier. The accumulated funds allow you to buy ships, townhouses, temples and much more.

item.title: Outward
item.description: Game Description The third-person RPG Outward features some challenging survival aspects. Your traveler will go into the open world, where he will have to monitor his own temperature, the availability of water, food and energy. Without the proper level of these factors, the character will die faster. For example, you may get a cold if you don’t find a cure in time, and bad food will give you an upset stomach, so choose what you eat carefully.

item.title: Lost Nova
item.description: Game Description Lost Nova is an isometric adventure about a trip to space. A spaceship with the main character crashed. The girl was on an alien planet called Lost Nova. Left alone, the protagonist should explore the surface of the planet, collecting useful objects, creating tools, building a base and much more. All this is necessary in order to find the way home. The heroine is the name of Mia. She decided to spend a vacation outside the Earth, but could not even imagine what kind of disaster it would turn out.

item.title: We Were Here Forever
item.description: Game Description Waking up in We Were Here Forever in the dangerous Castle Rock, the hero must figure out how to get out of an ominous place from which there is no way out. In an adventure game with puzzle elements, the protagonist and a friend will have to face dangerous dark forces in order to get out of the trap, or they will remain here forever. The game features a cooperative system that is designed for 2 players, where each puzzle needs to be solved together, performing separate roles, communicating through walkie-talkies and trying to convey to a partner all kinds of information about what they saw and heard.

item.title: HunterX
item.description: Game Description Gamers in HunterX will wander through dark dungeons, exploring a fantasy universe. The project is an action adventure game where you have to fight a variety of monsters. Players will move through side-view locations, encountering hardcore soulslick-style gameplay mechanics. You will have to use the protagonist’s abilities, various fighting stances and magic in battles. The heroine will use a variety of weapons for close combat, delivering slashing and piercing blows.

item.title: Metal Mind
item.description: Game Description Metal Mind is a 2D action roguelike that gives you the opportunity to control a mech that has a mind. The gameplay combines many mechanics and various physical quantities: weight, heat, power, etc. Metal Mind contains elements of looting. It is necessary to look for pieces of armor, improved weapons and create useful items. You have to transform the robot using hundreds of different assemblies. Events take place in a science fiction world where people have been able to build self-developing artificial intelligences that have managed to become self-aware.

item.title: Skabma - Snowfall
item.description: Game Description Skabma - Snowfall immerses you in a mythological setting, where users will take control of a young boy named Áilu. The hero will travel through the Scandinavian regions, encountering mystical creatures and monsters from ancient legends. The game is made in the form of a three-dimensional action-adventure game, where the main emphasis is on the deep storyline of the protagonist. The boy will face difficult challenges, fight enemies and solve various puzzles.

item.title: Crystal Project
item.description: Game Description Crystal Project is an atmospheric adventure where users will go to explore a fantasy world. The game is a non-linear role-playing adventure game where you will have to collect crystals scattered across the map, discover new abilities and specializations for the character, and also participate in dangerous battles with bosses, developing your own strategy. The hero will have to fulfill an ancient prophecy to restore balance in the territory of Sequoia.

item.title: Knights of the Chalice 2
item.description: Game Description Knights of the Chalice 2 immerses users in a fantasy world where they can assemble a squad of 6 adventurers. The heroes are forced to explore dark dungeons, fighting against monsters. The gameplay is made in the form of old-school role-playing adventure games with a top-down view, where you need to give instructions to characters on an isometric map. The rules are based on the tabletop role-playing game Dungeon & Dragons 3.

item.title: From Lex to Rex
item.description: Game Description From Lex to Rex is an atmospheric adventure in a medieval setting, where you take control of a treacherous character named Lex. The hero wants to take a place in an aristocratic family, taking power away from Rex by deception. The gameplay is a point-and-click quest where you interact with interactive objects on the screen to solve intricate puzzles. The game is made in old-school pixel graphics, where you can visit many thematic locations.

item.title: Dawn of the Monsters
item.description: Game Description Dawn of the Monsters takes place in the distant future. According to it, humanity has achieved a certain technological progress. But everything turned out to be not so rosy. Evil and cruel invaders have arrived on Earth and are ready to do anything to enslave humanity. They are called Nephilim. True, the little people also have aces up their sleeves. The global network of the defense alliance decides to engage them in battle, and is even ready to sacrifice lives.

item.title: Iron Lung
item.description: Game Description Gamers in Iron Lung will plunge into dark adventures aboard the Iron Lung submarine. The game is designed as a horror adventure where players need to make their way through the ocean on the surface of an alien moon. Users will move as a first-person character through various locations, represented by corridors and rooms on the ship. You will have to navigate the environment using the central window, as well as monitoring the data on the dashboard.

item.title: Buccaneers!
item.description: Game Description Buccaneers adventures! takes gamers to a pirate setting, where they can become a fearless captain and go in search of lost treasures. You will have to face enemy ships, change the course of history and join one of the unique factions in order to seize full power over the Caribbean Sea. There are 4 sides in the game: British, French, Spanish and the formidable Pirate League. Each group will have unique abilities, appearances, and fighting styles during the battle at sea.

item.title: HordeCore
item.description: Game Description HordeCore is a dynamic scrolling shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. You can play alone or join forces with other players to survive together in a city plagued by a zombie epidemic. Explore, fight, survive, craft, customize, etc. Become the leader of a group that is constantly growing with new people. Try to find as many supplies as possible, develop your team’s skills, and make traps and various devices.

item.title: Pets at Work
item.description: Game Description Pets at Work is a colorful arcade puzzle adventure game designed for local multiplayer that revolves around a group of funny animals who have lost their owners in an office building. To find people, pets must interact as a team using boxes, mats, buttons and climbing on shelves and tables. Dozens of levels have been implemented, each of which has more than six different mechanics, which provides players with exciting and dynamic gameplay.

item.title: Firelight Fantasy: Force Energy
item.description: Game Description Firelight Fantasy: Force Energy is an action-adventure game that gives you the opportunity to engage in energetic sword fights with the enemy and plunge into an interesting story. The game is created on the basis of Scandinavian mythology, describing many non-standard legends, gods and their powers. The gamer will have to pick up a sword and gain strength that was previously only possessed by the celestials. The protagonist can immerse himself in a fascinating story and learn more about the bloody battle between Thor and Grungnir.

item.title: Dying Light 2: Stay Human
item.description: Game Description Dying Light 2: Stay Human starts 15 years after humanity became infected with a terrible virus. Many have turned into zombies who scour in search of living flesh, and the few survivors wage a daily struggle for existence. People are divided into several warring factions, which during the day make forays from shelters to find resources, and at night they hide from bloodthirsty monsters. The world has returned to its primitive state, where everyone fights only for their own lives.

item.title: Chaos Chain
item.description: Game Description Chaos Chain is a role-playing project, which takes place in a dystopian world, where every alley hides danger, and every corner is fraught with the possibility of betrayal. The plot takes place in Slade City, a gloomy metropolis where crime, corruption and constant struggle for power reign. As a gamer, you step into the well-worn shoes of a citizen caught in the suffocating grip of this city. This place is not for the faint of heart.

item.title: Hidden Deep
item.description: Game Description Hidden Deep is a sci-fi thriller with shooter and puzzle elements. The scene of action is an oceanic underwater base located at a depth of 1.6 kilometers. The single-player campaign, which takes 20 hours to complete, begins with the recording of anomalous activity on the territory of the research laboratory. A group of rescuers was sent to reconnaissance of the situation and stayed there for more than a year, after which contact with them was interrupted.

item.title: Mirror 2: Project X
item.description: Game Description Mirror 2: Project X follows the adventures of Dinkudin Naoto, who collaborates with the FBI (Federal Bureau of Research and Conservation). The hero searches for mystical manifestations and otherworldly creatures that sometimes appear in the world. The plot begins with a story with a Demon that infects the body of one of the victims. During the proceedings and investigation of the case, the protagonist will find out the motivations and goals of the creatures in order to make a choice to support or destroy the monster.

item.title: God of War (2022)
item.description: Game Description God of War 2022 is an action-adventure game with a third-person view. This project is both a sequel to the previous part and a restart of the entire universe of the famous, cult slasher about the adventures of Kratos – a Spartan warrior, the protagonist of all 8 games in the “God of War” series, fighting against various gods and mythical creatures in a fit of rage and revenge.

item.title: DeadPoly
item.description: Game Description The DeadPoly universe has undergone colossal changes that have turned the lives of humanity upside down. A disaster occurred due to problems in the laboratory, where scientists did not keep track of the spread of the terrible virus. The planet gradually began to become infected, and people mutated into the walking dead, aggressively opposed to any other forms of life. The user takes control of a character who is destined to find himself in a brutal post-apocalyptic environment, where many factors besides creatures pose danger.

item.title: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance
item.description: Game Description Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance may be of interest to fans of Norse mythology. The plot of the indie project is based on the legend of Sigurd’s betrayal. The entire story, including descriptions, dialogues and monologues, is presented in text form with a demonstration of local beauty in the background. This is a fantasy slasher film with a third-person perspective. In this game, the user controls a warrior who looks like a Viking.

item.title: Brutal Orchestra
item.description: Game Description Immersion in Brutal Orchestra allows users to venture into a brutal world filled with insidious demons and grotesque monsters. The game is designed as a turn-based strategy with roguelike elements and deck building. Players will be exploring levels, searching for ancient artifacts and fighting treacherous monsters. You have to make deals with the devil and try to find a way out to save your own soul. The protagonist in Hieronymus Bosch’s Brutal Orchestra dies and finds himself in purgatory, where he must wander through mysterious locations and cope with difficult challenges.

item.title: Mon Bazou
item.description: Game Description While repairing a car inMon Bazou, players have to deal with a variety of everyday problems that affect the life of the main character. The protagonist is a guy who dreams of turning his old car into a racing car that can compete with professional drivers and reach great speed. The game is made in the form of a simulator, where users have to take on the role of a novice racer who will live the everyday routine and do simple things, trying to earn a living.

item.title: Savage Lands
item.description: Game Description Savage Lands is a fantasy survival game on PC in a medieval setting. Before starting the game, you are invited to customize your character a little: hair, skin color, face, tattoos. Next, you appear on the shore of the island. The wreckage of a boat is visible in the water. The only thought in my head is: “What am I doing here?” The interface is very simple: in the right corner of the screen there is a guide or tasks that you can complete.

item.title: One Hand Clapping
item.description: Game Description One Hand Clapping is a musical puzzle game where you need to overcome obstacles with the help of your singing. The structure is a familiar platformer, where the heroine travels through fictional and unusual worlds. Moreover, all puzzles and puzzles are solved directly thanks to the voice. The intensity of singing affects the structure of the world. This game is about how you can find confidence and freedom both in your voice and within yourself.

item.title: Breakwaters
item.description: Game Description In Breakwaters, the player will reconnolate the procedurally generated world with monstrous ocean depths and huge titans that change the method of interaction with water. Water is replaced by powerful crystals obtained in the mine. The user is able to delve into its bowels to collect rare objects, build obstacles to restrain the ocean or block waves, and help people after destruction. Titans, creatures of an extinct submarine race, wander around the world, causing cataclysms.

item.title: Battlefield 2042
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 2042 is a tactical action game, the main conflict of which is the confrontation between Russia and the United States in the world of the near future. Humanity has exhausted almost all of the Earth’s resources. Now the mighty superpowers have entered the race for the planet’s last fossils. Germany lost ground and the EU collapsed. The world is in the midst of a Second Great Depression. The gameplay is a first-person shooter.

item.title: Gunfire Reborn
item.description: Game Description The shooterGunfire Reborn contains elements of a roguelike and role-playing game. The player can choose to control several heroes with individual abilities. The game has a huge amount of randomness, from procedurally generated locations to dropped guns and loot. Gunfire Reborn is designed for both one and a company of up to 4 people. The game features 100 different types of items. Various mechanics will encourage you to study each fighter presented, who are more or less suitable for a specific situation and location.

item.title: Dysmantle
item.description: Game Description Dysmantle offers gamers to survive on the island and find a way to get out of this place. The local post -apocalyptic world is not gloomy. There is no atmosphere of hopelessness here either. The game has a bright cartoon graphics with juicy colors. During the end of the world, the protagonist hides in an underground bunker. Once the hero crawls out and discovers that people and animals have turned into evil creatures similar to zombies.

item.title: Urge
item.description: Game Description Urge is an exciting and addictive game that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic environment where users take on the role of a car accident survivor. The plot revolves around a mysterious drug called fog that has corrupted the world. This substance reacts to actions, shaping the environment and influencing the behavior of enemies encountered. The game mechanics offer a fun experience while allowing you to make strategic choices. Making short work of enemies by shooting them in the head may seem like a viable option, but it comes with consequences.

item.title: Forza Horizon 5
item.description: Game Description Forza Horizon 5 is a racing game that focuses on multiplayer racing and free-roaming in an open world. This project includes many aspects from Forza’s previous games. More than 200 original cars from real-life companies are presented, with realistic driving and clutch physics. There are high-quality graphics, effects and other elements that completely immerse users in a believable environment. While riding around the world, the player is able to collide with other gamers or ordinary cars controlled by artificial intelligence.

item.title: Kathy Rain: Director's Cut
item.description: Game Description Kathy Rain: Director’s Cut is an expanded version of the original project, in the center of which Kathy Rain finds herself on a deadly and interesting adventure. The gameplay has undergone many changes, and innovations have also appeared. The story has been expanded, many locations and new puzzles with previously non-existent mechanics and objects for interaction have been added. The event takes place in the 1990s. The game is a rethinking of a standard project released back in 2016.

item.title: Honkai Impact 3RD
item.description: Game Description Honkai Impact 3RD is a role-playing game with Hak-N-Slash elements, in which players manage three heroes called Valkyrie at once. The fighting is realized in real time. You can move freely across the battle of the battle, switching on the go between the characters. Each protagonist has its own unique features and skills. Combining their capabilities, it is necessary to look for effective tactics against enemies. The project is closely related to Genshin Impact.

item.title: Escape Simulator
item.description: Game Description Escape Simulator is a first-person puzzle game aimed at cooperative play. The gameplay is a quest room in which you need to solve all the puzzles and successfully leave the room. Quests, tasks and item locations are randomly generated, thereby increasing the replayability of the project. The environment is completely interactive. You can interact with any objects, picking them up and rotating them in any plane. You can inspect objects, move furniture, break, destroy fragile vases and much more.

item.title: Inscryption
item.description: Game Description Inscryption is a card adventure with roguelike elements that focuses on the fact that the darkness still hides many unknown secrets. The strategy is made in an escape the room format, has multiple puzzles and a terrifying atmosphere. The user is transported to the goblin’s hut, where he needs to embark on dangerous adventures to find out what secrets are hidden in this building. The events take place in a forest house, where the protagonist is trapped by some sinister creature who wants the guy to play board games with him.

item.title: Evil Tonight
item.description: Game Description Evil Tonight is an action-adventure game with role-playing game elements. Take control of a brave heroine who is not afraid to look Evil in the eye. As an experienced exorcist, the girl Sylvia encounters numerous horrors of ancient estates and crypts. She has the unusual ability to materialize evil and fight it in open battle. The visual side is represented by pixel style. Face ghosts and other evil spirits as you unravel the mystery of a huge mansion.

item.title: The Riftbreaker
item.description: Game Description The Riftbreaker is a survival adventure role-playing game that has some mechanics taken straight from real-time strategy and action games. The project has dynamic gameplay, using an isometric camera to create the most convenient and complete view around the female protagonist named Ashley Novak. She has a powerful invention of mankind - a combat mech named “Mr. Riggs”, which helps to most effectively fight the various monsters that inhabit the planet Galatea-37, where the single-player campaign takes place, designed for dozens of hours of gameplay.

item.title: The Last Campfire
item.description: Game Description The Last Campfire is a project from the studio that developed No Man’s Sky. It is made in cartoonish, bright graphics, each of the landscapes is unique and creates new details of the world. The story is presented in the genre of an adventure quest. The protagonist will be a coal shining with kindness. He got lost in the forest because a strong current knocked his boat off course and washed ashore.

item.title: Urban Tale
item.description: Game Description The immersion in Urban Tale is made in the form of a role-playing adventure, where you have to go to conquer a big city. The game creates a life simulation where the main character tries to succeed in life. The user’s choices and decisions made along the way will determine what area the protagonist will go into to develop. You have to start from scratch, trying to find your way from the possible options.

item.title: Bonfire Peaks
item.description: Game Description The Bonfire Peaks user finds himself on a voxel island and faced with numerous puzzles. The mysterious place hides many mysteries and artifacts that will need to be reached by interacting with moving objects. The main character will burn his own property and face deadly traps. The world is three-dimensional and allows you to move in all directions, but strictly in blocks. The playing area is divided into squares.

item.title: Elijah and the out of this world adventure
item.description: Game Description Elijah and the out of this world adventure will show a journey through Cleveland, Ohio, where a regular night turns into an incredible nightmare. The story begins with the fact that Elijah, a simple person working in a local grocery store, is attacked by an alien creature after the end of his shift. Waking up, he sees that his hometown in chaos. The military blocked the territory, and to explain the situation they come up with a bizarre legend about the spill of chemicals.

item.title: Medieval Dynasty
item.description: Game Description Medieval Dynasty is an adventure in medieval Europe, where nobles and clergy rule. The country conducts active trade with its neighbors and is prospering. You will become a poor man who lives by hunting and farming. Go from a loner to the head of a community. Set up a small camp and turn it into your own settlement. Find food by chasing wild animals, including deer, wild boar and rabbits.

item.title: Erannorth Chronicles
item.description: Game Description Erannorth Chronicles combines an RPG and a card game. It’s also a sandbox. There is no complete single plot here. The indie title invites users to entertain themselves: explore the open world, fight monsters, upgrade their character, and participate in random events. You can also go treasure hunting or take tests. This CCG has a high barrier to entry due to the large number of deep mechanics that gamers have to figure out for themselves.

item.title: TOEM
item.description: Game Description TOEM is an adventure puzzle game made in black and white style. Go fancy. expedition, revealing the secrets of the magical world of TOEM. The visual style is made entirely in a hand-drawn monochrome manner. Meet funny characters and help solve their problems. Travel the world and take different photos. Puzzles revolve around exploring the environment and taking pictures. By taking a photo, you can find the answer to your question, thereby helping local animals with pressing problems.

item.title: Virtual Surfing
item.description: Game Description Virtual Surfing may be suitable for fans of sports games. The title offers to harness the sea and ocean waves. The project lives up to its name. This is an arcade surfing simulator. It boasts well-developed water physics. It has different weather conditions and several locations. At the very beginning, the gamer is asked to enter a name. And then the user is offered to customize the appearance of his surfer (there is a choice of gender) and customize the board.

item.title: Scrapnaut
item.description: Game Description Scrapnaut stands out against the background of other sandboxes with elements of survival with its concept. The hero has to fight for life in an open world using the surroundings of steampunk. He periodically fights steam robots and is engaged in the study of the surroundings. On the back, the protagonist wears an oxygen cylinder, so it is important to monitor the level of air. The appearance of the adventurer can be changed due to the change of clothing.

item.title: Residual
item.description: Game Description Residual is a platformer with elements of the survival simulator. The game can boast of the worked out pixel graphics and procedural generation of the world. It is made in a science fiction setting. According to the plot, the hero crashes on one of the planets in the forgotten part of the galaxy. Its task is to study alien technologies and find a way to fix a starship.

item.title: Webbed
item.description: Game Description The story ofWebbed revolves around a happy little spider who tries to save her boyfriend from a huge and annoying bird. Take control of the spider and overcome difficult obstacles until you reach the main character’s beloved. Navigate through dangerous locations where predators live or difficult deadly objects are located. Explore the dangerous desert using your character’s abilities and your wits. Visit the tropics, slums and dungeons, where you will encounter original obstacles and enemies.

item.title: Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
item.description: Game Description Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous - RPG about the fight against demons. Here the player will have to become a legendary warrior, and at the same time understand the true price of good and evil. The story will begin with a fault in the abyss. Crowds of terrible demons escaped from their imprisonment and now they want to enslave this world. The main character and his team of brave fighters with evil will be opposed to them.

item.title: Lake
item.description: Game Description Lake is a humorous open world adventure game. You need to play as a girl, Meredith Weiss, who decides to take a vacation and go to her hometown. At the same time, she volunteers to help her father with his work, replacing him for some time at the postal company. Once ready, she heads to Providence Oaks, Oregon, where a stunning lake and many locals await her. The events of the game take place in 1986.

item.title: Myst
item.description: Game Description In Myst, the user finds himself on a mysterious island about which almost nothing is known. And it is the main character who will have to unravel the mystery of this place, passing through numerous locations and solving a number of puzzles. Each puzzle will lift the veil of secrecy, allowing you to learn about what happened here before, as well as reveal details of the plot. The essence of the gameplay is to move in the indicated direction and solve current puzzles.

item.title: Carrier Command 2
item.description: Game Description Carrier Command 2 is a modern continuation of the strategy that came out back in the eighties. Compared to other titles, the sequel stands out due to its gameplay features. This is not only an RTS, but also a simulator of an aircraft carrier commander. The gamer’s task: to liberate the Telos colony located on the archipelago from the terrorists who captured it. In Carrier Command 2, the user controls a huge warship.

item.title: My Garage
item.description: Game Description My Garage is a simulator simulator with a first -person view. In it you can not only repair cars, but also ride them. During travel by transport, you can switch the camera angle. In Indo Tailet, weather conditions are changing. The change of day and night is also available. When driving in the dark, you can turn on the headlights. My Garage has an open world. It consists of mountains, forests, a field, rivers and attractions, like a lighthouse.

item.title: Momiji From Purgatory
item.description: Game Description Momiji From Purgatory is a first-person adventure in which a young student finds himself embroiled in a series of frightening events after his infidelity is discovered. The campus, which was once an ordinary place of study, is transformed into a location filled with traps and a strange atmosphere. The main task is to save your true love, making your way through a dangerous environment. The protagonist’s path is complicated by persecution from obsessed fans, creating constant tension.

item.title: PULSAR: Lost Colony
item.description: Game Description PULSAR: Lost Colony is a cooperative space simulator in which you will control a star shuttle and explore outer space. Players take on a specific role on the ship: captain, pilot, scientist, weapons specialist, or engineer. Only coordinated work will lead to victory over the enemy. While traveling through the universe, you need to scan the planets for life or useful resources. There will always be dangers along the way, so it is possible to launch a warp jump to avoid a collision and escape from the upcoming battle.

item.title: Luna's Fishing Garden
item.description: Game Description Luna’s Fishing Garden is a two -dimensional adventure, the mechanics of which are tied to research, fishing and construction. Traveling through the surrounding waters, you need to catch fish to sell it to the fox. A dream garden is being built with the proceeds. The heroine can plant trees and plants, construct water bodies, as well as populate animals on developing islands. The game process Luna’s Fishing Garden has no restrictions and timers - everything can be done at its pace, enjoying the pacifying gameplay.

item.title: Rise Eterna
item.description: Game Description The story of Rise Eterna follows Lua as she attempts to uncover the secrets of her own origins. The gameplay combines tactical elements and RPG in a Japanese animated style. The user will assemble a squad of characters with special skills and characteristics. A squad can have up to 14 wards. The heroes will go through brutal battles, dungeons and boss encounters. As the player progresses, he discovers a dark and mature story centered around the relationship between two lost souls.

item.title: Fuzz Dungeon
item.description: Game Description Fuzz Dungeon is an arcade adventure that combines elements of role-playing games, platformers, puzzles and many other genres. The plot begins when a sexy sasquatch amulet appears in the world, absorbing all living things. The main character will have to overcome 15 absurd levels to return everything to normal. As the adventure progresses, the protagonist realizes that he can create a new society in which he no longer needs to work.

item.title: Reskue
item.description: Game Description Reskue sends an agent to a silent space station in deep space to investigate the reasons for the loss of communication and salvation of scientific personnel. The main mission is to awaken scientists from cryostasis, emerging from it in a disoriented state and in need of protection. The mysterious hostile force has taken control of the object, turning the station technology against the survivors. The operative must dispose of available equipment and ammunition, moving along dangerous locations divided into cells, and controlling the ship on radioactive fuel.

item.title: Tunguska: The Visim
item.description: Game Description After the fall of the meteorite, in Tunguska: The Visitation begins the invasion of mutants. Having fallen to the ground in the Tunguska area, the alien body caused the transformation of all local residents. As a result, a special zone is formed here, the main goal in which is to survive and survive against enemies. The game often has to make a difficult choice, on the result of which its own existence depends.

item.title: Truck Driver
item.description: Game Description Truck Driver is a simulator in which you have to build a career as a truck driver. At the beginning of the game, select your character, be it a man or a woman, and get behind the wheel of a truck. Your task is to transport various goods and cargo. The better you cope with tasks, the higher the level of reputation you will have among employers. Starting from the very bottom with a simple truck, you will gradually improve your transport by buying spare parts or buy a whole fleet of trucks.

item.title: Days Gone
item.description: Game Description Days gone tells the story of Deikon Saint-Jones. The former member of the Mad Dog Motokoksluba suffers from the loss of the spouse and wanders through an almost destroyed epidemic to the open world. He is inhabited by the remaining groups of peaceful people, looters, crazy cultists, wild animals and freezers. The latter are like zombies. However, these are not revived dead, but live creatures. And these monsters move much faster than any undead.

item.title: Subnautica: Below Zero
item.description: Game Description A game about the underwater world, which became a continuation of the original game, completely borrowing the engine. The world ofSubnautica: Below Zero is inhabited not by simple creatures similar to those in the previous part, but by aliens who are more interesting to fight, and their world is much more beautiful than our reality. Adventures will be with you at every step, but do not forget that the world of the game was recognized as a real horror setting, where it is light and bright only in the first hundreds of meters of immersion in depth.

item.title: Demeo
item.description: Game Description Dark fantasy in Demeo plunges a party of adventurers into dangerous adventures where they have to fight against monsters. The game is made in the form of a role-playing turn-based adventure game, which you can play using virtual reality glasses. The project combines the dungeon crawler genre and tactical strategy, allowing you to take turns on the field and clear locations from opponents. Gamers will extract loot from enemies and strengthen their characters with found artifacts and things.

item.title: Resident Evil Village
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil Village continues the adventures of Ethan from the Seven. The Roman numeral hidden in the title on the posters hints that this is not a spin-off, but the eighth part of the series. This is already the tenth project in the main line. Winters was able to escape from the cannibal mansion and save his wife Mia. They got away from the American outback and decided to live an ordinary life.

item.title: Battle Ax
item.description: Game Description Battle Ax-arcade top-downs adventure made in retro-stylistic. Events develop on the lands of Mercia. The civilian population was hostage in the evil sorceress of Etheldred. She captured almost the entire territory of the continent, and she settled in the north of the country. Every 7 years she sends her warriors south to capture even more slaves. Throughout the continent begin to gather brave warriors, eager to join an open battle with the sorceress.

item.title: Reknum Cheri Dreamland
item.description: Game Description Reknum Cheri Dreamland starts an adventure in which Cheri’s heroine awakens from fantasies and falls into a real conflict. Her wanderings in the world of dreams will force to encounter materialized nightmares that threaten the kingdom. Progress depends on the passage of the thematic stages and the deciphering of poetic instructions of the ancestors. The study of the environment prepares for a deeper immersion in the main tests and plot lines of this game, conducting the characters through a series of difficult locations and battles.

item.title: Astrodogs
item.description: Game Description Astrodogs is an arcade action game where space dogs take part in battles. The main characters will have to save the galaxy from the WOOFER company, which controls all territories and planets. Enemy dogs attack civilians, deceive ordinary workers and commit other wrong acts, because of which the ruin of the entire civilization is on the verge. The usual antics of the suspicious organization weren’t too bad until they started attacking every planet in the solar system.

item.title: Before Your Eyes
item.description: Game Description Before Your Eye s will take users on an emotional journey from a first-person perspective.
